story:
Every tennis player wants the tennis ball they serve to shoot across the tennis court with the speed and power of a missile to leave their opponents stunned by the velocity and power of a serve they can't return in time. 

For every tennis player who wants to see their opponent's jaw hit the ground after a few sets of tennis with you, our patented Racquet Power Weights is the only way to go. 

Professional Boxers have known about this simple training method for years.  When a boxer wants to increase his punching power he doesn't just practice throwing punches or simply shadow box, he throws every punch with a barbell in his fist.  The result?  The fighter gets stronger through resistance training which makes them stronger and stronger with each passing day to devastating effect.  

Utilizing the same training principles, tennis players simply need to add the Racquet Power Weights to their tennis racquet and practice with the weights attached for a few minutes before their tennis match starts.  The result? The colossal power of a boxer throwing a punch at an unsuspecting opponent.  This transforms into an epic serve that will leave the player on the other side of the net scrambling. 



If you always wanted to be involved in a history making event, then this campaign offers you that opportunity.  This innovative device conceived nearly 50 years ago is preparing to come to the market place and you can help make it happen.  

This tennis training device has been awarded a U.S. Patent (D703283).  The name "Racquet Power Weights" has been issued a Registered Trademark.

The detachable racquet weights have been tested and recommended by the late Dr. Don Klotz, Hall of Fame Head Collegiate Tennis Coach at the University of Iowa (Letter on file).  Visit our web site, www.athletic-products.com

In order to achieve our goal of manufacturing, marketing, and administration we estimate an amount of $500,000 to meet our financial needs:

Product Molds - $20,000 - Product Inventory $30,000 - Administration $100,000 - Marketing - $350,000 (includes web site and R&D).

We currently are in the final stages of our prototypes.  This requires new molds and product inventory.  Implementing several marketing strategies requires new capital.  One strategy in particular is having a top notch celebrity tennis player to endorse our product.

Your contribution will be rewarded with a box of the weights.  The larger amounts donated will receive additional product.  Also, a portion of our annual Company's profits will go to United States Tennis Association and the Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.  If we don't reach our goal we will scale down our marketing efforts. 

If you're not financially able to donate then please tell a friend and use the Indiegogo share tools.  Tell every tennis player you know about us and help them improve their game as we make tennis more enjoyable for everyone.  

Thank you for your help.  Bob Livingston/Inventor



 

 

  

.
story_txt:
Every tennis player wants the tennis ball they serve to shoot across the tennis court with the speed and power of a missile to leave their opponents stunned by the velocity and power of a serve they can't return in time.  
For every tennis player who wants to see their opponent's jaw hit the ground after a few sets of tennis with you, our patented Racquet Power Weights is the only way to go. Professional Boxers have known about this simple training method for years.  When a boxer wants to increase his punching power he doesn't just practice throwing punches or simply shadow box, he throws every punch with a barbell in his fist.  The result?  The fighter gets stronger through resistance training which makes them stronger and stronger with each passing day to devastating effect.  Utilizing the same training principles, tennis players simply need to add the Racquet Power Weights to their tennis racquet and practice with the weights attached for a few minutes before their tennis match starts.  The result? The colossal power of a boxer throwing a punch at an unsuspecting opponent.  This transforms into an epic serve that will leave the player on the other side of the net scrambling.  


If you always wanted to be involved in a history making event, then this campaign offers you that opportunity.  This innovative device conceived nearly 50 years ago is preparing to come to the market place and you can help make it happen.  
This tennis training device has been awarded a U.S. Patent (D703283).  The name "Racquet Power Weights" has been issued a Registered Trademark.The detachable racquet weights have been tested and recommended by the late Dr. Don Klotz, Hall of Fame Head Collegiate Tennis Coach at the University of Iowa (Letter on file).  Visit our web site, www.athletic-products.comIn order to achieve our goal of manufacturing, marketing, and administration we estimate an amount of $500,000 to meet our financial needs:Product Molds - $20,000 - Product Inventory $30,000 - Administration $100,000 - Marketing - $350,000 (includes web site and R&D).We currently are in the final stages of our prototypes.  This requires new molds and product inventory.  Implementing several marketing strategies requires new capital.  One strategy in particular is having a top notch celebrity tennis player to endorse our product.Your contribution will be rewarded with a box of the weights.  The larger amounts donated will receive additional product.  Also, a portion of our annual Company's profits will go to United States Tennis Association and the Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.  If we don't reach our goal we will scale down our marketing efforts.    If you're not financially able to donate then please tell a friend and use the Indiegogo share tools.  Tell every tennis player you know about us and help them improve their game as we make tennis more enjoyable for everyone.  Thank you for your help.  Bob Livingston/Inventor        .

story:
Grape Grapes

How often have you bought fruit with little or no flavour? You're served beautiful, large and flawless looking fruit, only to bite into something that's about as tasty as cardboard.

Juicy? Yes, more often than not, but juiciness doesn't always mean flavourful. 

WE'RE LIVE: Visit blackknighttablegrapes.com to buy grapes via standard online purchasing method whilst still including the local fruit shop or green grocer.


What We Need & What You Get

We want to provide you with a premium product. That means redesigning our boxes and purchasing new stock, and preparing the product in such a way to ensure you receive a premium product.

  • Design, production and delivery of new 2kg boxes, flat pack: $34,640
  • Anticipated additional costs for picking, repacking and new liner for 2kg box $9,120
  • Costs for additional casual labour to remove offending extra shoots and bunches before harvest $8,580

Funds raised through this campaign:

If successful, the project will confirm for us that you, our consumers, really do prefer to eat fresh and tasty produce rather than what is currently offered by our discount supermarkets.

Stage 2 in 2016 will be to set up an online pre-order system for fresh produce

Perks >

We are offering a range of white and mixed 2kg boxes. The mixed 2kg box will contain 30% Flame seedless (red) grapes and our white grape is a Menindee Seedless. 

The fresh grape option is only available to our supporters in Queensland, New South Wales and Victoria at this stage. If you live outside our core supply area and would like some fresh produce, please contact us directly and we will see what we can do. If this is successful, we will expand our distribution network.

When choosing your perk, please nominate your local green grocer. Part of your purchase price includes a handling fee that we'll pay to the wholesaler and retailer, allowing you to receive your precious cargo from your independent store of choice! There's even a multi-buy discount option.

You'll be able to follow the growing process on our facebook page and we'll notify you prior to dispatch when we expect your package to be ready for collection.

Non farming perks!

We have also included some non fresh fruit perks that would help us and give something back to you too!

  • Merchandise: stubby coolers
  • Signage on our cool room
  • On farm experiences
Eyes right for details >


How it works: the Grape perk

  1. Simply choose one of the fresh grape perks
  2. Decide which of your nearest local and independent retail outlets is most convenient and provide their name to us
  3. We will manage, grow, trim, harvest and pack your premium 2kg box of grapes
  4. The grapes will be transported to our wholesale market coordinator, located in either Brisbane, Sydney or Melbourne markets
  5. Our coordinator will include your box of grapes in the shipment to your local greengrocer or corner store

Included in your purchase price are the costs for the newly designed box and all cooling, transport and handling costs for your delivery. We will notify you by the email supplied when you can pick up your box of premium, sweet and tasty table grapes.

If you chosen perk is grapes, you'll receive your fresh grapes before the end of December via your local greengrocer or fresh food outlet.

The Why

There are many ways to slice an onion as they say, and the same goes for growing grapes. Supermarket buying power has pushed the growing of grapes down a track that creates reliably high yields, with large bunches and berries and minimal flavor. Some might call it factory production but perhaps this is the world we live in.
Growing fruit with maximum taste means more time and less additives. Grapes are a delicate product and cannot be mechanically harvested or processed.


To ensure the grapes have the best chance at making it fresh to your table, we spend time on each vine, trimming leaves, removing slow growing canes and trimming bunches to ensure they have enough space to grow.

We're not after donations. Our aim is to connect with our supporters to ensure they can enjoy high quality and tasty grapes. Our aim is to offer you a superior product at a pre-production price; it will help us to prove our point that customers do actually want fresh and premium produce!

What we need is a commitment. All the time and manual labour expended throughout the growing season accounts for about 60% of our cost of production. Knowing that a percentage of our product has been presold makes that outlay more sustainable.

Our main perk for you is a box of grapes for Christmas! Delivered to your area.


That's right. Fresh, tasty, clean table grapes in a special gift box for you.

  • the funds will be used to create and purchase a new box to differentiate our premium product
  • they will be used to employ casual staff throughout the growing season to ensure that we're able to produce the premium summer fruit
  • as a reward, if you would like, you will receive a special 2kg gift box full of fresh and tasty seedless table grapes (see perks)
  • reaching the funding goal will ensure enough product is forward sold making it possible to deliver premium, fresh table grapes for years to come!
  • if successful, and if you, our customers like the service, we will launch an online forward-sale site allowing people to pre-purchase their Christmas grapes every year
  • we will also expand our production window by partnering with other premium producers in other regions - current Australian table grape production is from November to April (grapes at other times are either stored or imported)

  • if we don't reach our funding goal, we will still deliver the perks to those that supported our project: win win!


The Situation

We are not here to unfairly criticise supermarkets. Their business is to ensure security of supply and to provide their customers, you and I, with an affordable product, and to ensure profits for shareholders.

The unfortunate downside of this for table grapes is that in order to supply the supermarkets, a grower needs to supply hundreds of thousands of boxes and it simply isn't possible for them to grow that quantity to a premium standard. Their pickers offer no grade selection and every bunch is added to the box. This means you get a mixed bag of ripeness, taste and quality with each grape purchase. Who wants to take that chance??

We see this as unfortunate because the consumer is missing out on a fantastic grape eating experience, and because we think that many people love grapes as much as we do, we wanted to come up with a way to bring this loveable portable snack back to fruit bowls everywhere!

Risks & Challenges

Fresh fruit production, like most forms of farming, is fraught with risks and challenges.

The biggest risk our business faces are climate and the market.

MARKET

Through this project we aim to mitigate the market risks. Up to 80% of table grapes are sold direct to supermarkets these days. That's great for the big supermarket growers. For smaller growers and family farms, this means that there is a pool of about 20% remaining across the central market system where grapes are sold on to independent retailers, providores, corner stores and fruit stands.

The 20% window sometimes enhances volatility, but mainly it creates over supply, or a glut. This can mean great prices for consumers, but at what cost?

When prices are low, growers spend less time and money ensuring they pick the best grapes to provide a premium product. It's a simple business decision and unfortunately it leads to lower quality or mixed quality table grapes forming a glut in the market. 

It then becomes a compounding problem. The quality is lower, people are less likely to buy grapes, over supply increases, prices get lower still yet consumers don't want to buy sub-par grapes. Research shows that you won't be back to buy grapes for 6 weeks after a bad grape experience.

"The bitterness of poor quality remains long after the sweetness of low price is forgotten" - Benjamin Franklin

All this can be avoided if we enjoyed our fruit and were confident that we paid a fair price.

CLIMATE

Frost - frost at the wrong time can burn newly formed buds or shoots, causing damage to canes and severely reducing yield potential.

We manage this risk through the use of a natural gas powered frost machine. Frosts usually occur when cold air is able to pool or settle. The frost machine creates enough disturbance to prevent this and raises the ambient temperature by 2-3'C


Water - the Balonne River, at the top end of the Murray-Darling basin, has been a reliable source since we moved to the farm in 1989. Water is pumped, cleaned through sand filters and delivered to the vines through a drip system, ensuring that the vine only receives as much as it needs.

Storms - the growing season and harvest are the most crucial times when it comes to storm activity. We prefer little rain, and the heavy storms can do the most damage in the weeks leading up to harvest. A new pergola system is being trialled for our premium produce and it provides some protection for fruit hanging on vines, however it is difficult to defend against the biggest and nastiest storms when they occur. Fingers crossed!

How we'll grow your premium produce

Growing a premium product is more costly than producing quantity.

Pruning: we perform what we call selective pruning. We assess each vine individually and decide which canes are likely to provide the best quality fruit each year, and how those canes will shape the vine for years to come.

Thinning & trimming: once new growth begins and we can see the buds that eventually form bunches of grapes, we begin removing smaller and weaker looking shoots to ensure that all nutrients provided by the vine end up in the best bunches. We do this again when the bunches are fully formed and we remove bunches that are too big or small or in a limiting position. This provides us with a more uniform crop and a higher percentage of high quality fruit, but as it is done by hand it becomes very expensive.

Picking: when the fruit is ripening, we don't pick it all. Larger farms will pick everything in one pass to keep costs down however we spend time ensuring that the pickers only pick the best quality, ripe bunches. Our pickers will pick fewer kilograms per hour to achieve this, and we expect to yield fewer kilograms per vine. This leads to higher production costs but is essential for achieving the high quality we all seek!

We focus on sustainable farming, and at Camelot we believe in biological farming. We use high value high quality compost from Wide Bay Compost who use recycled materials (green waster) from Bundaberg. We apply this to the vineyard each year and feed the good bacteria with a fish hydrolysate (fishy cordial) and other kelp and seaweed products. A microscopic exam (see gallery) reveals an abundance of biological activity which converts nutrients into plant accessible food, reducing the need for chemical fertilizers (which would kill this biology). We believe this biological approach is the most economically and environmentally sustainable way to produce table grapes (most corporate farms have strictly chemical application programs).

We form workplace agreements with all casual staff that allow them to earn above the award wage. By being one of the better payers of pickers we are able to source the best staff.


We also have a Quality Assurance team re-packing (for the 2kg boxes) and checking the boxes after they are picked.


Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes you may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Share this with your network by email and social media

Sustainable food production is in all of our interests. A smaller farm is better positioned to assess need for change and adapt accordingly; but we can't compete with the factory, corporate or supermarket farms who will always win with economies of scale.

We are trialling other varieties of table grapes, and other produce types that will allow us to make better use of our infrastructure. Follow our facebook page for updates on passion-fruit, chilli, blueberry and kiwi-berry development.

Thanks for reading. We hope this also helps people understand some of the nuances involved in producing fresh produce!

story:
I love my brother Tomi - he is my big inspiration...

Hi, I am Gabriela. I have three siblings and the youngest one- Tomi- is 10 years younger than me - now 22 years old. I was 11 when he was born, my mom had to stay in the hospital for very long time while Tomi was kept in an incubator, the doctors told my mom that he may not live for too long - they said he has only few days left to live. My dad was devastated and I remember the moment when he was crying and his pain felt so unbearable. I couldn't get at this age how serious his illness was and that Tomi will never walk (current pictures of Tomi in the gallery).

He was diagnosed with Myelomeningocele - the most serious form of cystic spina bifida. The spinal cord is damaged and as a result, there is paralysis and loss of sensation in the area below his hips - no movement in his feet. He has been diagnosed with asthma, epilepsy and has other health issues he has to deal with. His chances to get a job is limited and that way he can't save the money to buy a wheelchair himself.

Tomi is currently studying human resources at Management University in Slovakia. He doesn't like when people feel sorry for him. He is the only one from our family who is studying at University and he is an inspiration for me how much one can achieve if he wants. 

He loves sport and it helps him strengthen his body and core muscles. Only recently while being at University Tomi has met an inspiring tennis instructor Mario Burda, who sees his greatness and wants to support him to be the best he can. I love Tomi and I want to support him to follow his passion. He is not scared of anything and he has always believed he can travel, have family and lots of fun. He doesn't see limitations but takes action instead. 

I feel Tomi can inspire lots of young people - with disability or not,to do things they love and go beyond their limitations. He shows me that there is no obstacles,in his words: " If you can take it, you can make it."

I see this campaign as an opportunity for him to get closer to his dream to actively play tennis, to see the world and inspire others. 

I am inviting you to be part of his story. Collected funds will be used to buy the wheelchair and pay for his tennis training.

Thank you for your contribution to make a difference in Tomi's life.

story:
Imagine if you could clear your skin at the push of a button.  If you could enjoy a clear kin without dryness or damage.

If you no longer had to worry about things like: 

  • Trying one expensive treatment after another.
  • Spending hundreds or even thousand of dollars for possible solutions.
  • Covering your skin with concealer.
  • Wondering why your skin isn’t clear yet.
  • Self doubt and poor self image.

Sounds like you just imagined life without acne.



Probiotic Action is the world’s first topical beneficial bacteria spray – which helps you get to have a clear skin – without harsh chemicals, or ineffective gimmicks.

It’s a product you spray on your skin AM, PM or at your convenience.

Sprayable Probiotic is simple, natural, straightforward, and just plain effective.

Sprayable Sleep helps you:

  • Get healthy, clear skin
  • No more acne or rosacea
  • Without the stress and anxiety. Not to mention the added self doubt and poor self imge.
  • Gets you back to healthy and gorgeous skin that you always wanted.


WHY DOES ACNE STILL EXIST?

You may already know that acne is linked to the bacterium Propionibacterium acnes, which nestles in the dark, oily, oxygen-deprived crannies of our pores. Acne is also linked to inflammation, overgrowth of the upper skin layer, excess sebum, and depression. Because the root of the problem has long seemed to be a bacterium, antibiotics have been the go-to treatment. Dermatologists are also working on developing something called “antimicrobial peptides” to kill the bacteria — anticipating the day that the bacteria outgrow our current antibiotics, and they fail us.

Still, as millions of people who have used antibiotics in failed attempts know, killing the bacteria doesn’t work for everyone. It also turns out there are different strains of the bacterium, some of which may cause the more severe cases. It might be too early to say that there are distinct “good” and “bad” strains of the acne bacteria, but it does appear that killing all of them might not be the best plan


WHY TRY PROBIOTIC ACTION?

Probiotic Action is perfect for people that want  a clear skin but just have trouble doing so. This includes:

  • Adults who are experiencing acne issues, they often overlook the root acne cause, which is usually an imbalance on their skin’s natural bacteria
  • Teenagers, hormones play a significant role in acne outbreaks among teenagers and prepubescent children
  • Blackheads, acne begin with the development of a plug of hardened sebum that stops up the opening of the follicular pores on the skin. 
  • Millions of people who have used antibiotics in failed attempts know, killing the bacteria doesn’t work for everyone


How Probiotic Action Works?

Probiotic Action is created from spores which, when mixed with water are activated to create a fantastic solution that delivers the probiotic to the proper location. These spores then attach the skin. And, even though Probiotic Action doesn’t kill the P. acne bacteria, the beneficial healthy bacteria eat the excess skin and toxins that the P. acnes need in order to thrive through “starving” the P. acnes, and gets rid of the dead bacteria, too! Also, when your skin’s bacteria are in balance, you are more likely to be protected from bad bacteria, free radicals,  and pollutants. Acne occurs when the skin  is out of balance with more bad bacteria than probiotic bacteria, so reducing the P. acnes population is an important step in controlling acne. 

Our key breakthrough was developing a spore-forming bacteria; this means that inside the bacteria cell is a hardened structure, or spore.  This hard structure safeguards the cell’s genetic material from the heat and pressure of manufacturing processes and the challenges  of shelf life.



IT IS FAST, EASY AND GENTLE

Using Probiotic Action is as easy as it is effective. 

Just spray it 2 to 3 times a day on the affected area, and let it dry. 

  • Is a natural product.
  • Do not contain harsh chemicals.
  • Are environmentally friendly.
  • Are water-based.
  • Can be used long-term.
  • Reduce the number of bacterial pathogens (agents that produces disease).
  • Do not create pathogens that will develop resistance to treatment later on.
  • Clean your skin at a microscopic level.

Why a probiotic treatment and why now? 

  • Treatment against acne has not changed for several decades, They consist of antibiotics and retinoids that are applied for several months; these can have several side effects.
  • A probiotic acne therapy consists of "good" bacteria that are part of the healthy skin microbiota. They are topically applied to the skin and should out-compete the "bad" bacterial population as seen on acne-affected skin. This treatment  have minimal to no risks of side effects. 

PROBIOTIC ACTION HAS JUST 2 INGREDIENTS

  • Purified water
  • Bacillus Ferment spore forming bacteria


WHY SPRAY?

  • Can be applied on your schedule
  • The sprayer can easily be carried in a pocket or purse for application during the day
  • Probiotic Action is unscented, colorless, you spray on your skin. 
  • Stop applying creams that contain harsh chemicals. Stop taking antibiotic that create big bugs resistant to antibiotics.
  • Is gentle since is water and no allergenic and non comogodenic 
  • Don’t dry or damage your skin in the healing process. 


HOW PROBIOTIC ACTION WORK ON YOUR SKIN

Probiotic Action work to restore the skin’s natural balance of good bacteria. By restoring this natural balance the skin is better able to cope with the daily stresses by creating a natural barrier against bad bacteria, pollutants, free radicals, and allergens. Probiotic Action use will also encourage cell turnover so that your skin looks brighter, tighter and healthier. Probiotic Action’s products are also powerful antidote against wrinkles.



BENZOYL PEROXIDE AND SALICYLIC ACID HAVE ISSUES

The FDA released a statement in April of 2014 that stated, “The use of certain acne products containing the active ingredients benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid can cause rare but serious and potentially life-threatening allergic reactions or severe irritation.” And the scary thing is, there is currently no warning of these side effects on any of the OTC labels. Is clear skin worth all of these damaging, potentially life threatening side effects? Not to us. Which is why we have found another way and it works just as well, if not better than those harsh chemicals.


THE PROBIOTIC ACTION SYSMET

Each bottle of  concentrated Probiotic Action contain 0.5 fl oz – which is 30 uses (a month’s supply with regular use) when mixed with water.

Results in as little as one week of recommended application


FAST SHIPPING

The worst thing about crowdfunding campaigns is the waiting. Waiting for the campaign to end...waiting for the product to be finalized...waiting for it to be manufactured...waiting for it to be shipped. So much waiting. That's why we've decided to offer backers the opportunity to get their perks within 3 weeks since we have received your contribution. We have an inventory of Probiotic Action and will send out starting the 1st week of March to backers that order the relevant perks. 


Testimonial

In my opinion, probiotic action is a therapeutic breakthrough in the treatment of acne and eczema.  My clinical results are still in the early stage, but they have been very positive.  Probiotic Action is easy to use and directly addresses the pathophysiology of skin disease in a way that no other product that I know of can.  Just as gastrointestinal microbiome therapy is proving to be essential for gut and immune health, I'm sure that probiotic skin treatments will become the standard of the future.

-Dr. Travis J. Elliott ND

Marie Cammerer: This product has helped me, an adult with hormonal acne, as well as my teenage daughter. I LOVE this product. I only wish I had taken "before" pictures.

Facebook Post to Page

Distinct LLC is the marketer of Probiotic Action, and our objective is to be the purveyors of this unique topical probiotic. We have 2 years educating our customers about probiotics and the benefits for skin care. The most important application is as Probiotic for Acne, which can cause an immense amount of stress and anxiety. Not to mention the added self doubt and poor self image.  

Why we need your financial support?

Since demand increased, we are at the point to expand our business, and we need your financial support for that. With your support we will improve our packing process, increase our inventory, and offer additional producst like musturizer,

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Send us email to info@probioticaction.com

Like and follow us on Facebook to be up to date with new information and offers.

Also can send us a tweet @ProbioticAction


Why your contribution is important to us and consumers?

Funding a new business is a difficult task, nevertheless technologies like Indiegogo.com facilitate the process and today the consumers have more options since more products are available because of contributions. Without contributions many good producst never will get to the hands of the consumer and the improvement of the technology, science and health never would have reached the levels that we have today. With your contribution more people will have the opportunity to try topical probiotics for healthy skin. People that suffer from rosacea, acne or excema will have relief. Doctors can treat cancer or transplant organs but unfortunately acne still exists.

Imagine if you could clear your skin at the push of a button.  If you could enjoy a clear kin without dryness or damage.

If you no longer had to worry about things like: 



Trying one expensive treatment after another.


Spending hundreds or even thousand of dollars for possible solutions.

Covering your skin with concealer.
Wondering why your skin isn’t clear yet.
Self doubt and poor self image.



Sounds like you just imagined life without acne.







Probiotic Action is the world’s first topical beneficial bacteria spray – which helps you get to have a clear skin – without harsh chemicals, or ineffective gimmicks.

It’s a product you spray on your skin AM, PM or at your convenience.


Sprayable Probiotic is simple, natural, straightforward, and just plain effective.

Sprayable Sleep helps you:




Get healthy, clear skin


No more acne or rosacea


Without the stress and anxiety. Not to mention the added self doubt and poor self imge.

Gets you back to healthy and gorgeous skin that you always wanted.







WHY DOES ACNE STILL EXIST?

You may already know that acne is linked to the bacterium Propionibacterium acnes, which nestles in the dark, oily, oxygen-deprived crannies of our pores. Acne is also linked to inflammation, overgrowth of the upper skin layer, excess sebum, and depression. Because the root of the problem has long seemed to be a bacterium, antibiotics have been the go-to treatment. Dermatologists are also working on developing something called “antimicrobial peptides” to kill the bacteria — anticipating the day that the bacteria outgrow our current antibiotics, and they fail us.

Still, as millions of people who have used antibiotics in failed attempts know, killing the bacteria doesn’t work for everyone. It also turns out there are different strains of the bacterium, some of which may cause the more severe cases. It might be too early to say that there are distinct “good” and “bad” strains of the acne bacteria, but it does appear that killing all of them might not be the best plan


WHY TRY PROBIOTIC ACTION?


Probiotic Action is perfect for people that want  a clear skin but just have trouble doing so. This includes:


Adults who are experiencing acne issues, they often overlook the root acne cause, which is usually an imbalance on their skin’s natural bacteria
Teenagers, hormones play a significant role in acne outbreaks among teenagers and prepubescent children
Blackheads, acne begin with the development of a plug of hardened sebum that stops up the opening of the follicular pores on the skin. 
Millions of people who have used antibiotics in failed attempts know, killing the bacteria doesn’t work for everyone





How Probiotic Action Works?

Is a natural product.

Reduce the number of bacterial pathogens (agents that produces disease).


Do not create pathogens that will develop resistance to treatment later on.


Clean your skin at a microscopic level.






Why a probiotic treatment and why now? 




Treatment against acne has not changed for several decades, They consist of antibiotics and retinoids that are applied for several months; these can have several side effects.

Purified water

story:
What happens when you give 3rd graders Fitness Trackers and a Challenge?


Fly (Fitness Lifestyles for Youths) Movement is the first kids’ health program to use new technology in a different way. Fly Movement provides easy-to-use fitness trackers to 3rd grade classrooms over a period of six weeks. The fitness trackers record moves and steps for each classroom. Data retrieved for the first two weeks is the benchmark as the kids are not told they will have an opportunity to earn a prize if they earn more points than the other class. After the initial two weeks, the challenge is given to the students and they learn that the classroom that has the higher number of fitness moves at the end of the remaining four weeks will win a prize. Upon learning that there is a potential to win a prize, students increase their daily moves significantly.



Why Fly Movement is Important

Compared to when we were kids, children today spend the majority of their time indoors playing video games, surfing the internet on iPads and watching TV. As a result, childhood obesity rates have tripled and today, one in three children is overweight or obese. Overweight kids are more likely to have risk factors for cardiovascular disease, high cholesterol, high blood pressure, poor self-esteem, and social and psychological problems.

Fly Movement is here to help

Fly Movement’s mission is to improve self-esteem, health, and goal-oriented habits in our children. We are a nonprofit organization founded in 2014 by Eric Melchor, an adjunct professor, civic leader, and business executive. Fly Movement’s pioneering children’s health program gives students a sense of purpose for channeling their energy toward achievement of a goal. As a result, their confidence grows and healthy habits acquired at this age are more likely to become life-long habits which are important because the way their metabolism shapes at this age will have a decisive impact in their adult life.


How is the program evaluated?

-  We measure the number of daily fitness moves for kids participating in the program. The goal is to increase daily fitness activity by at least 20% during the ‘challenge’ period of the program.

-  Teachers and parents are given a survey before and after the program to help determine if it made an impact to the kids behavior

-  We assess how many kids practiced discipline by continuously recording their daily fitness moves in the Fly Movement fitness moves tracker booklet. The goal is at least 70% of the program participants will consistently fill out their fitness tracker booklets which shows discipline.

What will the funds be used for?

Although this is a new program, Fly Movement is already working in Houston area elementary schools to respond to childhood obesity and encourage physical fitness for children. In our first official program launch with 50 students at KIPP Elementary in the fall of 2014, there was a 24% increase in overall fitness activity during the ‘challenge’ period. Our services are in demand by Garden Oaks Elementary, Brookline Elementary, and KIPP Elementary.

However, we are hampered in providing its services to all schools by not being able to raise funds to purchase necessary equipment. For instance, critical to Fly Movement's operations are "Fitness Trackers" which are given to each child who participates in the program. These fitness trackers cost $37 a piece. Funds donated will be used to purchase trackers and additional items needed such as the fitness tracker booklets that are given to each students.


Perks

To thank you for helping make our vision a reality, we're offering some perks we hope you will enjoy. We find that our supporters love to help spread the word about FLY Movement. 

We'll ship all items free of charge.

11-ounce coffee mug


About Us

Not too long ago we had a vision of creating a program that not only helps combat childhood obesity, but also gives students a sense of purpose for channeling their energy toward achievement of a goal. Taking new and available technology in the world and imagining how it could be applied in a different way, we founded Fly Movement in 2014. Learn more about use at Fly-Movement.com.

Help spread the word

We think only a small percentage of Houston knows about our project right now. So we appreciate those who talk about Fly Movement with people they meet. It helps us when people join in on our social media pages to "like", pin, comment, tweet, and Instagram. We have to give a special shout out to our wonderful friends at the schools we work with and help spread the word and move us forward. Thank you to each and every one of you!

Eric Melchor, Founder

story: My grandpa has Glaucoma and is going blind.His doctor told us his sight is of a 80+ year old man. He's in his 50s and is still too young for this to be happening. We don't have enough money for his surgery so he's just going to let himself go blind, to the point where he can't see at all. It's getting really bad. One of his eyes are almost there and it's so painful to see him go through this, it brings me and my family to tears.We don't have much money considering it will cost 10,000 dollars and insurance won't cover it.Any donation will help no matter how small, even 50 cents , anything ! It will mean so much to me, my family and him. God bless. Prayers are needed.

story:
Who We Are

Health Mission Outreach Canada (HMO Canada) is a medical outreach organization consisting of licensed health care professionals and general volunteers. We provide health care to the disadvantaged; those who are deprived of basic care due to  politics, geographical terrain and other adversities.

What we need

HMO Canada is collecting money for next clinic in Brampton, Ontario (Greater Toronto Area). We have a team of dentists and hygienists that will be providing free dental services on June 13th to those who can not afford basic dental care.

We will spend all donations towards purchasing medical supplies. In case we collect more money than we need for June 13th clinic, we will use the remaining fund to finance HMO international mission to Guatemala (Aug 21-29, 2015)

    The Impact

    Unlike other charities that spend only a small fraction of donation towards helping people, HMO Canada spend 100% of donations towards helping those in need. We have been providing clinics since 2009 and developed unique expertise in mobile healthcare. While on an International mission in Paraguay in 2013, the members of our Board of Directors worked, along with other volunteers, in high-security prison and woman penitentiary (yeah, try to find the executives from the United Way there!). 

    Visit our website to learn about other HMO missions and view photos & videos.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Money will help us to buy supplies for clinics. but your participation is priceless. Every year our volunteers contribute hundredth of hours of free dental and health services. If you are not a doctor, you can still contribute in many ways, such as:

    • Assisting with setting mobile clinics
    • Working on one of our committees
    • Sharing the word about us on Facebook and Twitter

    Photos from HMO clinics:



    Perk: sale boat (artwork)

story:
USA Yoga is a non-profit formed to develop and promote yoga asana as a sport.

Yoga Asana competitions originated in India hundreds of years ago and are still going on there today. USA Yoga is bringing this spirit of healthy competition to the United States. We believe that the sport of Yoga Asana will inspire and encourage many newcomers to take up yoga.

We are developing educational programs, rules and regulations so that the necessary competitive skills can be understood and mastered by competitors, coaches, and judges. Successful competitors need to achieve mastery of physical strength, stamina, balance, flexibility, breath and concentration. 

Today, USA Yoga sponsors annual regional Yoga Asana competitions all over the US, as well as a National competition held yearly. These competitions are open to competitors from any yoga style and all are encouraged to participate. To borrow an ancient phrase, ‘the paths are many, the sport is one.’ 

USA Yoga is the exclusive body recognized in the US as the US member federation of the International Yoga Sports Federation.


We need funding for our National Championship

  • We need $25,000 to pay for expenses related to our National Championship, including: accommodation, travel, videography, trophies, and prizes. 
  • Any funds will be helpful even if we don't reach our goal.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a difference in people's lives:

  • Yoga is so beneficial, especially in today's world. We need to make the change. The change can only come within you - within your Spirit, within your beliefs.
  • Yoga heals and an intense yoga practice heals exponentially.
  • Check out these stories of how yoga competition changes lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
In Summary

  • Our names are Riley Smith, Paige Smith and Taylor Stogryn
  • We have all grown up playing rugby for Bayside's Rugby Club
  • Riley and Paige's grandmother was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis (MS) when she was 25.  They have never seen her walk.  Taylor's grandmother was bedridden by the time he was born.  This disease is extremely prevalent in our society and deserves our support.
  • With any donation; big or small, it will help make our event a success, and in turn support the fight against MS.

What We Need & What You Get

We expect our fundraiser to be a financial success, but there are many costs to running a 7's tournament. Your donations will go towards covering costs such as:

  • Renting the fields
  • Tournament insurance
  • Buying food and drinks to sell
  • Renting portable washrooms and event fencing
  • Paying for the referees
Any extra donations will be directly donated to the MS Society.
This is also a great opportunity for you personally or your business. You are supporting the fight against a disease that affects over 100,000 Canadians.
**To donate and receive a tax receipt contact Paige Smith at paige.smith94@hotmail.com 

The Impact

  • Multiple Sclerosis is a debilitating disease, and Canada has the highest prevalence rates in the world.  As Canadians, we have to be the ones to make a difference.  Your donating will be another step in the right direction to curing this disease.
  • For more information on where the money from our fundraiser goes, please visit : https://beta.mssociety.ca/ and to see the new trials happening in Canada to fight this disease please visit: http://stemcellfoundation.ca/en/diseases/multiple-sclerosis/
  • In the past, Bayside Rugby Club has proven to produce many successful fundraisers and events.  We are hoping to raise at least $10,000 with this event.
  • The organizational skills of my team and Bayside's expertise, we can make a huge impact on the fight to end Multiple Sclerosis, and with your donations more of the money made can be directly used to end MS.

Challenges

  • We are not only trying to host a successful event this May, but we are also hoping to make this event a tradition.
  • To make this event a tradition it needs to be very successful.  A large portion of that success comes from the money we raise before the event  That money will help us to host a fun, well organized fundraiser.
  • Our team of volunteers, the White Rock/ Surrey community , the rugby community and the MS society team will be coming together to have an enjoyable event in supporting MS, we hope this tradition will be continued for years to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share this event with people or business that can support us 
  • Come out and support our event at South Surrey Athletic Park on May 31st.   There will be a 50/50 raffle, beer garden, food for sale, and a fun and entertaining atmosphere

story:
What Your Contribution is Used For

  • Upgrading the HVAC, emergency sprinkler, and lighting system to be up-to-code in our beautiful older building studio space, as well as "raising the roof" to be 15' high for aerial work ($32,000, one-time cost).

We have taken on the responsibility of our start-up costs and part of the roof-raising fee. However, the HVAC and sprinkler system were more complex than originally thought by the contractor.

We are asking only for support to make this construction happen ASAP so we can open the doors to this beautiful studio for you.

About the Ascension space

  • Prime location near the highway and Boise Towne Square Mall
  • Two large open spaces with 15+ foot ceilings (after we raise the roof)
  • Two single-user restrooms
  • Dedicated seating for parents and guardians (yes - we will have a robust youth program!)
  • Comfortable lounge space for Ascension members
  • Secure belonging storage area
  • Two exterior entryways
  • Generous parking
  • Coffee/snack bar

Mission/Vision

Ascension Pole and Dance (“Ascension”) values individual fitness goals and promotes body awareness.

We strive to maintain an all-inclusive environment that welcomes individuals of all body types, backgrounds, and levels of dance experience to enjoy the great physiological and psychological benefits of aerial fitness.  

We believe everyone has the capability to achieve the basic tricks and skill sets required in pole dance and aerial fabric, but each of us may need a slightly different modification to get there, as all bodies are designed differently.

Innovative Concept

How is Ascension Pole and Dance different from competitors?

  • At the forefront of the pole and aerial industry, Ascension boasts fully trained and certified instructors, who engage in continued education annually. While the pole and aerial industry in mainstream culture is relatively new and no training is required, we put the safety and success of our students first with continued training, and the required understanding of body mechanics, emergency response, and appropriate modifications for all bodies. 
  • Only local studio to create jobs that are benefit-eligible for pole and aerial instructors (in contrast to independent contractors) including workers compensation, health insurance, and paid CEUs.
  • Only local studio that will offer a complete and progressive program for young aerialists and vertical gymnasts, with instructors certified in youth programming and childhood education.  Learn more about our instructors and their qualifications on our website!

 

Background

Ascension took shape when our co-founders, whilst pursuing more advanced tricks in pole dance and aerial art, started to notice that they, as well as many of their friends and fellow students began to experience stress and injury, as well as plateau in their own training.

There wasn't a strong incentive to push instructor training outside the Boise community. A feeling of monotony was beginning to suffocate their experience.

Having no other industry outlet to turn to, co-founder Kate returned to their background in Health Science (B.S.S., emphasis in Exercise Physiology) and Education (MEd) to find the solution for themselves. Taking a step back from the adrenaline of training, Kate realized that while many industry teachers are incredible dancers, there are also many who don’t understand how to teach the skills to a variety of body types in a safe and successful manner.

Through this, Kate found themselves at the center of an unofficial support group for friends and students (including their soon-to-be co-founder) who were reaching out for ways to alleviate their own ailments sustained from unsafe training, and in dire need of suitable modifications. In this process, Kate, Megan, and their students found themselves quickly and safely executing pole tricks that once seemed impossible – without sustaining injury, or succumbing to the crushing frustration of something seeming un-achievable.

From here, Ascension seemed like the natural choice of title for this growing pedagogy/andragogy.  We are building a community of hobbyists and competitive performers alike. We hold your body in the highest care and are a leader in industry growth. How will you Ascend?

story:
Have you ever gotten a manicure where they cut the skin too close or you’ve started bleeding from getting your cuticles removed? That’s what happened to Kelly Brown, and what happened next affects 1 in 4 people who get manicures - she got a terrible infection. Hers was so bad she lost both her thumbnails. Sani Sak is the solution. 

After hearing her experience wasn't unique, Kelly, along with long-time manicurist Debra Lindy, co-founded Sani Sak, a portable, complete nail kit loaded with everything you need for a safe nail salon visit, including your own set of 15 professional-grade essentials. Just bring it to your nail appointment and unroll at the manicure station, resting your hands on the antimicrobial-treated towel organizer. With Sani Sak, manicures are now safe and sanitary.

There is a scary truth about getting your nails done: when salons get busy, these nail tools are often removed early from disinfecting treatments leaving bacteria, germs, and fungus still lingering. In numerous investigations, the majority of nail salons examined tested positive for harmful bacteria -- those are some serious nail nasties.

Enter Sani Sak, the complete nail kit loaded with everything you need for a safe nail salon visit, including your own set of 15 professional-grade essentials. Sani Sak provides stainless steel nail tools, files, buffers, and more, as well as an antimicrobial-treated towel organizer that holds it all while protecting your fingers and toes from those infectious, dangerous germs.

Sani Sak is easy to use - bring it to your nail appointment and unroll at the manicure station, resting your hands on the antimicrobial-treated towel organizer (that lasts up to 50 washes!). The tools inside the kit are placed in the order that a manicurist will use them, letting you enjoy that manicure with peace of mind.

 

We started Sani Sak to help prevent others from suffering the same fate as Kelly, and thousands of others that have been victims to similar and sometimes worse infections and outcomes. We want to make sure you still have the pleasure of visiting a salon, and be protected from the hidden dangers you are exposed to, at the same time! 

Our company was born out of a woman’s desire to live a healthier and pampered lifestyle, and everything we do today is meant to help others do the same.

A manicurist for over 20 years, and the unlikely victim of a nail infection so severe, she’s lost both of her thumbnails forever. Together, they’ve created a complete all in one nail kit providing a sanitary experience with everything you need for a safe professional salon visit -- putting the “cure” in manicure to help ensure no one else has to suffer the same fate from the potentially harmful bacteria and fungus looming in nail salons.

story:
What is Suno?

Suno is a device for listening to fetal heartbeats, kicks, and other movements. Used in conjunction with iPhones and Android smartphones, this is the simplest and most straightforward way for pregnant mothers to hear their babies safely and clearly, facilitating the bonding process earlier than ever before.

Suno (which means “listen” in Hindi) is engineered to enrich the process that each pregnancy entails, a process that very often filled with uncertainty*. Our team has developed this technology in order to give pregnant women a greater sense of surety* and confidence* during their pregnancies. It is our mission at Pregnitive Technologies to remove at least a portion of the uncertainty* that pregnant women may encounter and to make bonding more accessible throughout pregnancy. This is a superior listening device to give you the access to your baby that you want!

 

How does Suno work?

You can use Suno to listen to your baby’s heartbeat whenever and wherever you want. You can use it as frequently as you want to, because unlike other baby listening devices, Suno is not an ultrasound device. Non-invasive and requiring no batteries, Suno is a fully external listening device that connects to your phone, listens through the pregnant stomach, and sends sounds to the Suno app.

You can either listen to the sounds Suno transmits directly or save them and send them to your loved ones. From the  24th week of pregnancy, Suno can be used to hear everything* going on during your pregnancy!

 

 

 

 

  • Enhance bonding between mother and child
  •  Reduce or eliminate fear of uncertainty*
  • Check on baby’s health*
  • Interact with baby more efficiently
  • Keep tabs on baby in real time

 

SUNO is out of prototyping stage and we have a fully developed product along with the companion apps for both Android and iPhone. The device is ready  and 500 units are on their way.

 

The Pregnitive Technologies team is turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $5,000. We need these funds to cover our operating costs moving forward so that we can offer Suno to customers all around the world. Every dollar that we raise helps tremendously. To recognise the importance of your support, we are offering some exciting rewards including discounts on Suno and access to the first Suno devices that we produce.

 

Should we run into any delays, we will be sure to keep everyone updated. We foresee a smooth production and distribution run ahead, but there is always the possibility that something will cause us to miss a deadline along the way. In any case, we promise to deliver Suno sooner or later, sticking as close to the schedule we have set as possible.

 

Aside from making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with everyone you know. Go ahead and post about the campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people know what we are doing, the smoother our campaign will go. We appreciate all the support we get, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about Suno!

Disclaimer

* Suno is a non-medical device. It should never be used to make a diagnosis of your child’s health. Please keep regular appointments with your healthcare provider. If you suspect that something is not right with your child’s health, please contact your healthcare provider.

story:
My Story

I discovered functional medicine while I was still a medical student and I have been obsessed with it since. While mainstream western medicine can be life saving in emergency situations, I was looking for a wholistic approach that helps people to to optimise their health and performance, by addressing the root cause of their issues. Functional  Medicine (AKA nutritional/biomedical medicine) is an evidence based, individualised approach that aims to recognise and address the root cause of disease, using diagnostic tests, individualised dietary and lifestyle  modifications  and other natural and low risk interventions based on nutritional science, genomics and epigenetics. I have discovered the power of nutrition when experiencing some health issues myself. While medication helped alliviating my symptoms, a simple change in my diet solved the problem completely. Since then I have been studying functional medicine in every free minute I have and have become extremely passionate about helping other people heal in the same way. I have completed the foundation course in nutritional and environmental medicine at the Australian College of Nutritional and Environmental Medicine and this year I am also undertaking functional medicine training at the Kresser Institute. This is an amazing program, that will allow me to provide the most cutting edge care to my patients. However, it is very expensive and I need your help in order to be able to complete it.

I intend to open the first Functional Medicine clinic in the upper Blue Mountains NSW, in February 2018. 

The money raised in this campaign will go towards paying the fees of my functional medicine training. Help me make a difference!

In return to your contribution your will receive free or discounted consultations  when the clinic opens in February 2018. The costs of these consults will be much higher when the clinic actually opens, so this is a very good value investment!

I am 100% comitted to opening the clinic, even if I don't reach my crowdfunding goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out!

You can use the Indiegogo share tools

story:
Medical Marijuana changed my life. Help me get the word out about why this herb is so amazing – and learn how it may help you or your loved one.


I wrote The Medical Marijuana Handbook:  A Patient's Guide to Holistic Healing with Cannabis to help patients navigate the often confusing maze that is the world of medical marijuana – and I am asking your help to get it published.  Medical marijuana has helped me cope with symptoms from a chronic lifelong condition far better than any pharmaceuticals I’ve used – and I want everyone to know about this option for symptom relief and for healing. 

Over the past few decades, I've coauthored 12 books with experts on holistic health, stress management, brain optimization, and other topics.  And now I'm passionate about telling everyone about the awesomeness of medical marijuana!  I wrote this book because I want other patients to understand the many complexities of this herb, including WHY scientists believe it works so well for so many.

Most of the perks offered in this campaign include, in essence, the pre-purchase of  copies of the book, which will be sent when it is published in September.  Additionally, ALL contributors will receive a PDF of 3 chapters for FREE right away.  AND I have included part of Chapter 1 at the end of this campaign page so you don't have to wait to plunge in!

Since my goal is to educate the entire world on this topic – especially health professionals, politicians, and educators – some perks also include my "Get One, Give One" program in which contributors will be helping me send free copies of the book to thought leaders. 


When I first tried medical marijuana, I was desperate for something that would help ease the pain and discomfort of my physical symptoms and not be addictive like the prescription drugs I was taking.  Those drugs had ceased being effective – and I did not want to take stronger drugs, which came with an increasing number of scary potential side effects. I was immediately surprised at HOW effective it was – and disappointed that I hadn’t tried it sooner. Medical marijuana quickly became my lifeline to greater well-being.

Medical marijuana is constantly in the news these days—and yet when I talk to friends and family, as well as doctors, I find that few understand what it really is, what it really does, and WHY it is so effective for so many.  Many questions arise when starting on this journey, including:

  • Why should I consider medical marijuana, and is it right for me?
  • What health issues can be helped by it?
  • What makes it such a potent healing herb?
  • How and where do I legally get the marijuana?
  • What strain, what form, what potency, and what dose is right for me? 
  • What do I tell the kids about taking something that they’ve been told is illegal and wrong?
Unless we have a knowledgeable ally, most patients must answer these questions for ourselves—often, all on our own. In fact, in some jurisdictions, doctors aren’t allowed  to tell you anything about medical marijuana.



Medical cannabis can help with these issues:

  • Decrease pain and inflammation
  • Soothe nausea
  • Treat muscle spasms
  • Reduce anxiety
  • Stimulate appetite
  • Induce better and more restful sleep
  • and so much more…

Who can be helped by medical cannabis?

  • Patients with acute health conditions that are life threatening.
    Cannabis has been shown to provide symptom relief for many patients and, for some, actual improvement in severe life-threatening health challenges.
  • Patients with chronic health issues.
    Many patients find that symptoms of chronic health concerns are quelled by cannabis, without the negative side effects of other medications.
  • Patients with sporadic health issues or injuries.
    Cannabis is also found to be efficacious for many common symptoms, such as pain, anxiety, difficulty sleeping, nausea, etc.
  • Health-conscious individuals who want to stimulate their body’s internal healing system with a regular maintenance dose of cannabis.
    Cannabis helps modulate or balance every human physiological system, including regulating immunity, inflammation, neurotoxicity, blood pressure, appetite, gastrointestinal function, and intraocular pressure. Therefore, many health-conscious individuals desire a small maintenance dose of medical cannabis to promote health and wellbeing.


Clearing Up the Confusion Around Medical Marijuana ...


The world of medical marijuana is filled with unfamiliar terminology, numerous types of cannabis products to choose from, and very little specific direction on the best options for each patient. One has to be discerning and at least somewhat knowledgeable in order to sift through the mounds of information that is presented as "truth" in books, articles and the Internet—a great deal of which is outdated, inaccurate, or biased.

Most people tend to think of medical marijuana as one specific medicine, which gets you high, when in reality each strain of cannabis is, in some ways, a different medicine from every other strain.  Treatment options now include non-psychoactive (no "high"), smokeless, and topical forms and formulations of cannabis, with many new strains continually being created and bred for their specific healing qualities.

I wrote The Medical Marijuana Handbook to answer your questions, soothe your concerns, and give you the information you—or a family member or friend—need in order to make informed decisions and effectively use medical marijuana. I literally walk you by the hand through all that you need to know, drawing not only from my own experience and research, but from interviews I’ve conducted with health professionals, medical cannabis experts, and other patients. I’ve worked hard to make sure this information is as up-to-date and accurate as possible. Even if you know a lot about cannabis, so much is changing that there’s a good chance you’ll find many new-to-you facts in my book.
