story:
Innovative new way to achieve healthy and pure indoor air. Smart Heaven Fresh devices will keep getting better as they learn your environment to improve your family's health and well being. 

Runny nose. Itchy eyes. Congestion. Dry skin.  Be it seasonal, or a year-round allergy, those who suffer wouldn't wish it on anyone. Sure - there are options to help ease the suffering: pills, allergy shots, a steaming hot shower. One can also invest in an air purifier and/or a humidifier. These devices can help but can also be cumbersome to maintain and expensive to upgrade.

What if there was a better way; a smarter option?

Heaven Fresh is proud to introduce Smart WiFi air purifier and humidifier that operate as an integrated system, called 'Enviro-Pure System'. They can also work with other smart home devices and sensors to automatically improve the quality of your indoor air.

Simplify and Automate Indoor Air Quality Management

Imagine, being notified on your TV to fill your water tank so your humidifier doesn’t stop working in the middle of the night. Or how about being able to turn off your smart home devices from work, so that you don’t waste energy, when no one is home? What about getting an auto reminder to clean and change the air purifier filters right on your smart phone? Imagine, being able to achieve fresh clean indoor air by talking to your home. These are just some of the ways that Heaven Fresh Enviro-Smart technology can help you achieve healthy clean indoor air, while saving you money.  

We need your help....

We’ve taken two great products and made them even better with 2 years of advanced engineering and research. They are ready for production and we need your help to bring them to market. Be among the first to benefit from our new products by making a pledge of support. Your pledge will help to fast track our technology to add new and exciting cloud features in the products. 

_______________

Smart Air Purifier control and Apps Synchronization Demo

Multiple users can control the smart wifi air purifier. Changes in one app automatically reflect in the other apps and the device.


Talk to your devices with Amazon Echo

Demonstration of Amazon Echo operating the Heaven Fresh smart air purifier and humidifier using natural language.


Product Interoperability Demo with LIFX Smart Bulb

Create stories and automatic interactions between smart AllJoyn devices. When a change takes place in one smart device, other devices automatically react based on the pre configured recipes. LIFX bulb and the air purifier change state based on the state of the humidifier.


Smart Humidifier control and Apps synchronization demo

Demonstration of the smart humidifier being controlled with the smart phone. Even third party AllJoyn apps can control the Heaven Fresh smart devices.


Smartphone App


Heaven Fresh smart devices are AllJoyn certified which means that they will work with all the current and future AllJoyn certified products/software right out of the box. They include Windows 10, LG Smart TV, LIFX Bulbs and many more products that are currently in production. Visit the AllJoyn Certification page here.

                                                

  

_________________________________

Smart Open Source Technology Improves Air and Quality of Life 

Heaven Fresh Enviro-Pure system consists of state of the art smart air purifier, smart humidifier, mobile apps and intelligent cloud. More products such as smart dehumidifier and quality sensors will be added in the near future. Enviro Pure Intelligent Cloud uses auto learning capabilities to achieve and maintain the purest indoor air possible.  Now you can purify and humidify your indoor air with a simple touch of your smart phone or smart watch. Due to the open source nature of our products, we are anticipating third party apps and product to further enhance the user convenience with the compatible offerings.



Indoor Pollutants

It is common knowledge that indoor air can be many times more polluted than outdoor air. Why? Because pollutants like pollen, VOCs, pet hairs, bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and dust mites are trapped inside the home, especially during the winter when the windows are closed. 


7 Air Cleaning Stages plus the built-in Dust and Gas Sensors for the Purest Air Possible

From the technology side, we were the first to deliver a true 7-stage air purifier with built-in sensors, auto response technology, and washable filters at a truly affordable price.




Hot and Cold Mist Ultrasonic Smart Humidifier

Achieve optimal humidity with this feature rich humidifier.  An innovative Digital Ultrasonic humidifier that features an intuitive touch-screen interface, a microbial filter, and auto sensing technology that measures and adjusts to the ambient moisture in the air.



Evolution with Continuous Software Updates

We will continue adding new features into the Heaven Fresh smart products with periodic firmware, app and cloud updates for a true smart home experience. The days are gone when you had to buy a new appliance just to get the latest features. As the Smart Home technology continues to evolve, Heaven Fresh smart products will also evolve to work with any smart home ecosystem throughout the life of the product. Think of a smart phone with new and innovative apps and OS updates. 



So How do I Participate?

Be among the first to take advantage of the benefits of the world’s first, Smart Air purifiers and humidifiers.

  • With any pledge of $10 or more on Indigogo, you instantly become a Heaven Fresh Lifetime Club Member and are entitled to periodic discounts on Heaven Fresh Products.
  • So go ahead and choose your perk today, and experience the new world of home environment control through your smart phone.


A Revolution in Controlling Your Environment, and Your Health

 

Monitor and Control Your Indoor Environment Through a Simple Touch of Your Smart Phone

Everyone would agree that having the ability to monitor and control your environment, would be a luxury worth having, especially if it meant that your, and your family’s health would benefit. And if this newfound ability could also reduce your operating costs, you would be able to save money as well. Well you now have the opportunity to be at the forefront of a revolution that is taking place now. The idea is simple; yet the implications are profound – automatic control of your environment, through the touch of an app, on your smart phone. 

 

Two Smart Products in One

Heaven Fresh, the maker of innovative devices for a healthier lifestyle, is spearheading this revolution with the introduction of the Smart Air Purifier and Humidifier. Two innovative products actually… but they act as one. They are unified through the EnviroSmart app that is available for android and IOS smart phones.

___________________________

Control of Everything

Controlling the health and purification of your air is just the start. In the near future, you will also be able to control other aspects of your environment such as your air temperature, smoke detection, CO levels, and the security of your home. Imagine that – total control through this one, revolutionary technology! And the beauty of this app is that the smart device does not need to be a Heaven Fresh product. This innovative technology is being developed to accommodate any smart devices that can be connected.  

 

Get started now before this amazing program is over.

________________________________________

Heaven Fresh

Innovative Devices for a Healthy life

We design and develop innovative and affordable household products that help people overcome the challenges of living in polluted environments. Our product line includes everything from purifiers and humidifiers to health convenience products such as juicers and steamers. We are constantly pushing the envelope of technology to deliver better and more convenient products to our customers.


Finger Tip Convenience

Imagine having your air purifier automatically turn off when you leave home, and automatically turning on one hour before you return.  If you suffer from asthma, hay fever, allergies, or COPD, or are pregnant, have young children, have pets, or have had mold in your home, office, or school, then you owe it to yourself to adopt this revolutionary smart technology to improve your health, and facilitate your lifestyle.


New Smart Controls and Smart Sensors under development

Holding true to our belief in providing the most innovative and affordable products possible to help people live healthier lives, we are enhancing the convenience of our popular air purifiers and humidifiers once again with our HF Enviro Smart Connectivity Technology. More new and innovative component are being designed to be part of the Enviro-Pure system. 


Distribution Network 

Heaven Fresh products are already sold through the world's largest retailers. Following are some of our retail partners. 

________________________________________

Customer Testimonials

(These testimonials are for the non-connected models of the products on Costco.ca. Smart WiFi models are highly enhanced with the latest technology)

 

Great Purchase

"This product has been a winner for me for sure. Bought it more then three years ago and it is still going strong. Easy to clean, easy to change filters. It really does make your whole house smell "fresh" I've never left a review on here before but I felt this air filter warranted "

Ed37 - Ottawa, Ontario

Great product

"I purchased this air cleaner about 4 months ago. I am a smoker and noticed the house was starting to smell this winter. I purchased this to also help with the dust and dog hair. After 1 week of having it running the house smells completely different. It is fresh (Heavenly fresh?) . The unit is very quiet and the auto feature is great. I also enjoy the timer. You can set it on full power (which is a little noisy like a fan) and leave the house. When I come home the air smells cleaner then the outside air."

IcedRide - Calgary, Alberta

Goodbye Dust!

"I purchased this due to dust and multiple animals in my house. I have had my purifier for a week now and have noticed that there is significantly less dust and hair floating around. I also like that the house smells fresh even after cooking. I am sure that with long term use I while continue to see even more changes in my home. Also for those concerned about noise it is very quiet on auto mode and when on high you don't even notice it."

nancy5cats - Wembley, Alberta

Freshest Air Indoors

"This is truly an awesome product. The air in my house has never smelled so fresh! Highly recommended for people with seasonal allergies, dogs, etc. I have a Sharp Plasmacluster which never was able to get the air so clean and fresh. The unit is located upstairs on the landing outside our bedrooms and is able to clean and freshen up the air in my entire 2000 sf. house."

carolk - Surrey, British Columbia

Great Humidifier

"I just purchased this humidifier about 2 weeks ago. It has already outperformed, it has raised the humidity on our main floor from 27 to 40 %. It's a nice fine mist that doesn't leave a wet area around the humidifier, there is no white residue because it has a filter and I can place a few drops of essential oil on its special diffuser when I feel like it rather than contaminating the tank. In all I love this product and might purchase one for the upper level of my home as well."

Anonymous, Canada

Awesome!

"I bought this machine for my son's bed room he loved it and I want one for my bed room too... So I ordered. This Humidifier has big water tank. Pretty quiet..."

Olive Fish, Canada


_____________________________________


________________________________________

Heaven Fresh Team 

 

Imran Bashir – CEO & System Architect

Imran graduated from the Illinois Institute of Technology in Chicago with a degree in Computer Engineering. 

Prior to founding Heaven Fresh, he worked with various large and start-up organizations as a software engineer and telecom researcher.

Imran is a serial entrepreneur and while he has built a multi-million dollar global product and distribution business under the Heaven Fresh umbrella, his passion still lies in technology. He believes that technology is the key driver for the growth of any business.

---------------

Tim McClure – Vice President Sales & Marketing

Tim is a seasoned sales and marketing professional with over 25 years of extensive senior management experience across North America. He has held several senior management positions over his career.

In 1993, Tim joined Starter corporation. In his role as Vice President, Sales & Marketing, he managed the sales team, developed business with major accounts and corporate partners, negotiated endorsement contracts and handled negotiations with the NHL, NBA, MLB, MLB, CFL and Hockey Canada.

Later in his career, Tim went on to head up the sales direction in North America for the luxury fashion ‘giant of the eyewear industry, Luxottica. He lead a team of 400 individuals to record-breaking sales in the US and Canada. Tim played a key role in building Luxottica’s portfolio of world-renowned brands such as Ray Ban, Versace, Burberry, Chanel, Prada, Polo and Ralph Lauren.

After overcoming cancer in 2011, Tim went on to become a sought-after speaker and leadership and brand consultant. Today he speaks to Fortune 500 corporations, hospital foundations, professional sports teams, high schools and universities about overcoming obstacles, beating the odds and living life to the fullest.

In 2015, Tim joined Heaven Fresh as the company’s Vice President of Sales and Marketing. 


---------------

Peter Nisbet –  Lead Electronics Engineer

Peter Nisbet is the lead electronics engineer of Heaven Fresh Canada. Peter received his Diploma and B.Tech from RCC Institute of Technology and MASc fromRyersonUniversityall in electrical engineering. Armed with five years’ experience in electronic systems design, Peter has been in involved in a variety of projects in the robotics, power line communication, wireless communication and more recently consumer electronics industries. Peter is a Certified Engineering Technologist and active member of IEEE.

---------------


Darrell Talavera – Lead Mobile Developer

Darrell Talavera, Lead Mobile Developer at Heaven Fresh. Graduated with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. I have a strong enthusiasm in developing mobile applications in different platforms such as iOS, Android and Windows. Also, joining the IoT world significantly made a difference especially in gaining knowledge to develop embedded applications.

---------------

Gloria Baptist – Director of Sales

Before joining Heaven Fresh as Director of Sales and Marketing at the U.K launch in 2007, Gloria’s substantial experience both in Canada and the U.K transpired from editorial publishing to a period with the National Health’s Primary Care services, UK and onwards to managing world-wide marketing and sales of healthcare products.  During the past 8 years, she has introduced to Heaven Fresh and works with major accounts which include Tesco, Boots, Mothercare, Robert Dyas, Debenhams, Wilko and QVC. 

---------------

Sean Fetherston – Director of Business Development

Sean Fetherston is our Director of Business Development in the U.S. He brings over 15 years of successful sales experience that includes product launch and development on an international level. His background includes work in the biotech, pharmaceutical and medical device sector, where he helped emerging products come to market. He holds a B.S. from Arizona State University.

--------------

Gary Adams - Director Sales

Gary brings decades of sales and marketing experience to Heaven Fresh. Over the past 37 years, he has specialized in Sports Marketing, Event Management, Sponsorship Management, Retail Promotions, Established & Managed Strategic Alliances, Book Publishing and Fund Raising Programs for non-profit associations. He currently leads our Canadian Office as Director Sales.

---------------

Kamal Anwar – COO / Electrical Engineer

Kamal Received Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering from Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago in 1997. Before Heaven Fresh, Kamal has worked with Charles Industries and Motorola as a telecom engineer. From the very beginning, Kamal has been very instrumental in growing Heaven Fresh to global company. 

---------------

Christopher Richards – Operations Manager UK

When he first joined the company 5 years ago, Chris started off as the logistics coordinator. His skills and dedication pushed him further up the ladder to a now Operations Manager for the UK. As the Operations Manager, he oversees all business requirements within the UK and continuously liaisons with directors and managers abroad. 

---------------

Daniel Jones – Logistic Coordinator
Daniel handles the warehouse and logistics for the Heaven Fresh European operations. 

---------------

Jackie Nielsen – Financial Controller

With more than 2 decades of accounting experience, Jackie is the real life person behind our group's accounting division.  She has worked in all manner of accounting and finance roles, starting in accounts clerk roles, working upwards and moving into financial management.  She has worked for small businesses, startups and some global brands. She continues to add value at Heaven Fresh as a financial controller and is playing a pivotal role in our businesses success.

---------------

Sophina Bano, Digital Marketing and Graphic Design 
After graduating from university, Sophina worked for several companies on their social media, graphic design and editorial material before finding us 3 months ago. As a junior Digital Marketing Executive, Sophina has pushed our digital footprint into new realms with social media, email marketing, editorial content and graphic design for all of our promotional material.

_____________________________________

A photo with Jason Poon of Microsoft, He visited Heaven Fresh office to help develop Windows 10 Apps for Smart WiFi Products.

For the Curious Minds - What's Under the Hood

Below is a peak under the hood of our smart connected products. We would love to have a one on one conversation about all the technical “fun” we've had over the past two years bringing these smart products to market. The smart home revolution is upon us and we'd like to connect with all the brainiacs and tech gurus out there interested in working with us to expand our IOT ecosystem.

IoT Framework:

We are using the open source IOT framework AllJoyn from Allseen Alliance to IOT enable our smart products. AllJoyn utilizes a client­ server architecture to communicate with devices and allows simplified interoperability between connected products and applications. Heaven Fresh products are AllJoyn Certified, meaning they comply with interoperability standards and should seamlessly interoperate with other certified AllJoyn products out of the box. Certification details can be seen on the AllJoyn certification page.

Heaven Fresh is a member of the Allseen Alliance. We are working closely with other member companies to continuously improve the open source framework. You can find out more about AllJoyn at http://www.allseenalliance.com. If you would like to know our reasons for choosing Alljoyn, you can read Imran's post on LinkedIn.

Hardware

We chose two of our best selling products to IOT enable. Based on customer reviews, we know these products do fabulous jobs humidifying and purifying our customers homes. Rather then reinvent the wheel we improved them by adding an NXP K22F1M0 Cortex M4 ARM MCU and a GT202 802.11n wireless module.  Below are the specifications of the modules.


NXP MK22FN1M0VLH12

• ARM Cortex­-M4 core

• Flash size/ SRAM: Flash 1MB/ SRAM 128KB

• Clock speed: 120MHz

GT202

• Network Processor: QCA4002

• Standard Supported: IEEE 802.11b/g/n

• Single band 2.4GHz

• Data Rates: 10Mbps

• Internet Protocols: IPV4/ IPV6, TCP/ UDP, ARP/NDP, DHCPv4, ICMPv6

• Security Protocols: WPS, WPA, WPA2, WAPI, WEP, TKIP

Firmware

Our products utilize the AllJoyn thin client 15.09 running on NXP's MQX 4.1 RTOS. We have implemented the onboarding and configuration Alljoyn frameworks along with a custom control panel framework. For AWS IOT cloud services we are utilizing a Paho MQTT client along with WolfSSL SSL stack for enabling TLS 1.2 secured connection. Device firmware updates are done over the air (OTA) through MQX flash swap.

Mobile Apps

All our mobile apps are native apps for their respective operating systems i.e. iOS, Android and Windows 10. These apps use the AllJoyn standard client and house the AllJoyn router. Our apps leverage the onboarding, configuration and a custom control panel AllJoyn framework. Our apps can discover other AllJoyn products connected to the same network allowing interoperability among other AllJoyn products. Our apps have two modes, local and cloud. Local mode allows our app to exchange AllJoyn messages directly to the device without the need of connecting to the cloud. Cloud mode is specifically used when away from your home network and relies on MQTT communication to AWS IOT cloud services to talk with your device.

Cloud Service

After reviewing countless cloud options, we chose to go with AWS IOT cloud. We will probably write a lengthy white paper on the cloud selection process but the key factors were:

1) Flexibility in options and services allowing us to build the service we want.

2) Designed for embedded and low power devices.

3) Technical support via cloud architects and developer forums.

4) Cost of the cloud services from a consumer product perspective.

AWS ticked all these boxes with their fantastic cloud services such as DynamoDB for databases, Lambda for compute services not to mention Kinesis, Identity Management, SES and EC2 all exposed to AWS IOT, bridging our smart products to the AWS cloud. AWS IOT ThingSDK provides simple wrappers for and MQTT client and TLS networking functions along with simple API for communicating with the AWS device shadow, all of this is wrapped into a small 16KB package.

Security

We take user and device security very seriously. Security is built into the AllJoyn framework that allows for point to point encryption using KEYX and PSK where AllJoyn applications hold keys to decrypt data. An enhancement to the existing security was also developed and is called Security 2.0. This allows an application to validate access to interfaces and objects based on policies installed by the owner. When our smart products or app connect to the AWS IOT cloud services they utilize TLSv1.2 with mutual authentication using ECDHE-­RSA-­AES128­-GCM­-SHA256 cipher suite. Device certificate generation is done within your local network meaning your devices private key is never transmitted over then internet.

Interoperability

Interoperability is the holy grail of the IoT (Internet of Things). Several industry groups as well as Apple and Google are trying to be the communication standard for the Internet connected devices. We have started with AllJoyn but we are also working in parallel to achieve interoperability with other devices/framework that do not speak AllJoyn (yet).

  • - Honeywell Lyric Thermostat (also joint marketing with Honeywell)
  • - Nest Thermostat
  • - Smasung SmartThings
  • - IFTTT
  • - Lowe's Iris
  • - Open Connectivity Foundation (OCF) / IoTvity
  • - Apple HomeKit
  • - Google Weave / Brillo
We will be rolling out support for the above mentioned IoT hubs/frameworks periodically after the initial launch.

Developer API

Heaven Fresh developer API will be released in 2017 for any developers and manufacturers who wish to connect to the Heaven Fresh products through the cloud but do not support one of the above mentioned framework. More details will be available on our website.

Technical Specs:

HF 810 Smart WiFi Digital Ultrasonic Cool & Warm Mist Humidifier

  • Model: HF 810
  • Power supply: 220V~240V  (Europe), 110V ~ 120V (US/Candada), 50-60HZ 
  • Energy Consumption: 30W (Cool Mist), 280W (Warm Mist)
  • Mist Evaporation:
    90ml/hr (Low), 240ml/hr (Med), and 310ml/hr (High) on Cool Mist 
    260ml/hr (Low), 450ml/hr (Med) and 580ml/hr (High) on Warm Mist
  • Room Coverage Area: Up to 60m² (650ft²)
  • Water tank capacity: 6L
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 29.5 x 19.5 x 28 cm
  • Net Weight: 2.45 kg (5.40 lbs.)
  • Safety Certifications: CE, cETLus, Rohs.

NaturoPure™ Multiple Technologies Smart WiFi Air Purifier HF480 
  • Voltage: 220V~240V  (Europe), 110V ~ 120V (US/Candada), 50-60HZ
  • Power Consumption: 80 Watts (Highest Fan Setting)
  • Negative Ion Output: >4,000,000/cm³
  • UV Wavelength: 254 nm (germicidal wavelength)
  • Sound Level (dB): Quiet (20), Low (35), Medium (45), High (52)
  • Air Volume: 106cfm (Highest Fan Setting)
  • HEPA Filter Removal Rate: 99.97% at 0.3 microns
  • Dimensions (in): 24 x 13.5 x 10
  • Weight (lbs): 15
  • Applicable Area: Up to 650 sq. ft.
  • Ozone Output: Less than 1 part per billion at 2" away from unit (UL standard is <50ppb)

Changes in one app automatically reflect in the other apps and the device. Talk to your devices with Amazon EchoDemonstration of Amazon Echo operating the Heaven Fresh smart air purifier and humidifier using natural language. Product Interoperability Demo with LIFX Smart BulbCreate stories and automatic interactions between smart AllJoyn devices. When a change takes place in one smart device, other devices automatically react based on the pre configured recipes. LIFX bulb and the air purifier change state based on the state of the humidifier. Smart Humidifier control and Apps synchronization demoDemonstration of the smart humidifier being controlled with the smart phone. Even third party AllJoyn apps can control the Heaven Fresh smart devices. Smartphone AppHeaven Fresh smart devices are AllJoyn certified which means that they will work with all the current and future AllJoyn certified products/software right out of the box. They include Windows 10, LG Smart TV, LIFX Bulbs and many more products that are currently in production. Visit the AllJoyn Certification page here.                                                   
_________________________________Smart Open Source Technology Improves Air and Quality of Life 
Heaven Fresh Enviro-Pure system consists of state of the art smart air purifier, smart humidifier, mobile apps and intelligent cloud. More products such as smart dehumidifier and quality sensors will be added in the near future. Enviro Pure Intelligent Cloud uses auto learning capabilities to achieve and maintain the purest indoor air possible.  Now you can purify and humidify your indoor air with a simple touch of your smart phone or smart watch. Due to the open source nature of our products, we are anticipating third party apps and product to further enhance the user convenience with the compatible offerings.




Indoor Pollutants
It is common knowledge that indoor air can be many times more polluted than outdoor air. Why? Because pollutants like pollen, VOCs, pet hairs, bacteria, viruses, mold, mildew and dust mites are trapped inside the home, especially during the winter when the windows are closed. 




7 Air Cleaning Stages plus the built-in Dust and Gas Sensors for the Purest Air Possible
From the technology side, we were the first to deliver a true 7-stage air purifier with built-in sensors, auto response technology, and washable filters at a truly affordable price. 



Hot and Cold Mist Ultrasonic Smart Humidifier
Achieve optimal humidity with this feature rich humidifier.  An innovative Digital 
Ultrasonic humidifier that features an intuitive touch-screen interface,
 a microbial filter, and auto sensing technology that measures and 
adjusts to the ambient moisture in the air. 


Evolution with Continuous Software Updates
We will continue adding new features into the Heaven Fresh smart products with periodic firmware, app and cloud updates for a true smart home experience. The days are gone when you had to buy a new appliance just to get the latest features. As the Smart Home technology continues to evolve, Heaven Fresh smart products will also evolve to work with any smart home ecosystem throughout the life of the product. Think of a smart phone with new and innovative apps and OS updates. 






So How do I Participate?
Be among the first to take advantage of the benefits of the world’s first, Smart Air purifiers and humidifiers.

With any pledge of $10 or more on Indigogo, you instantly become a Heaven Fresh Lifetime Club Member and are entitled to periodic discounts on Heaven Fresh Products.
So go ahead and choose your perk today, and experience the new world of home environment control through your smart phone.



A Revolution in Controlling Your Environment, and Your Health
 

Monitor and Control Your Indoor Environment Through a Simple Touch of Your Smart Phone

Everyone would agree that having the ability to monitor and control your environment, would be a luxury worth having, especially if it meant that your, and your family’s health would benefit. And if this newfound ability could also reduce your operating costs, you would be able to save money as well. Well you now have the opportunity to be at the forefront of a revolution that is taking place now. The idea is simple; yet the implications are profound – automatic control of your environment, through the touch of an app, on your smart phone. 
 


Two Smart Products in One

Heaven Fresh, the maker of innovative devices for a healthier lifestyle, is spearheading this revolution with the introduction of the Smart Air Purifier and Humidifier. Two innovative products actually… but they act as one. They are unified through the EnviroSmart app that is available for android and IOS smart phones. 

___________________________

Control of Everything
Controlling the health and purification of your air is just the start. In the near future, you will also be able to control other aspects of your environment such as your air temperature, smoke detection, CO levels, and the security of your home. Imagine that – total control through this one, revolutionary technology! And the beauty of this app is that the smart device does not need to be a Heaven Fresh product. This innovative technology is being developed to accommodate any smart devices that can be connected.  
 
Get started now before this amazing program is over.
________________________________________
Heaven Fresh
Innovative Devices for a Healthy life
We design and develop innovative and affordable household products that help people overcome the challenges of living in polluted environments. Our product line includes everything from purifiers and humidifiers to health convenience products such as juicers and steamers. We are constantly pushing the envelope of technology to deliver better and more convenient products to our customers.





Finger Tip Convenience
Imagine having your air purifier automatically turn off when you leave home, and automatically turning on one hour before you return.  If you suffer from asthma, hay fever, allergies, or COPD, or are pregnant, have young children, have pets, or have had mold in your home, office, or school, then you owe it to yourself to adopt this revolutionary smart technology to improve your health, and facilitate your lifestyle.
New Smart Controls and Smart Sensors under development
Holding true to our belief in providing the most innovative and affordable products possible to help people live healthier lives, we are enhancing the convenience of our popular air purifiers and humidifiers once again with our HF Enviro Smart Connectivity Technology. More new and innovative component are being designed to be part of the Enviro-Pure system. 



Distribution Network 
Heaven Fresh products are already sold through the world's largest retailers. Following are some of our retail partners.

Customer Testimonials

Great Purchase

"This product has been a winner for me for sure. Bought it more then three years ago and it is still going strong. Easy to clean, easy to change filters. It really does make your whole house smell "fresh" I've never left a review on here before but I felt this air filter warranted "
Ed37 - Ottawa, Ontario



Great product

"I purchased this air cleaner about 4 months ago. I am a smoker and noticed the house was starting to smell this winter. I purchased this to also help with the dust and dog hair. After 1 week of having it running the house smells completely different. It is fresh (Heavenly fresh?) . The unit is very quiet and the auto feature is great. I also enjoy the timer. You can set it on full power (which is a little noisy like a fan) and leave the house. When I come home the air smells cleaner then the outside air."
IcedRide - Calgary, Alberta


Goodbye Dust!

"I purchased this due to dust and multiple animals in my house. I have had my purifier for a week now and have noticed that there is significantly less dust and hair floating around. I also like that the house smells fresh even after cooking. I am sure that with long term use I while continue to see even more changes in my home. Also for those concerned about noise it is very quiet on auto mode and when on high you don't even notice it."
nancy5cats - Wembley, Alberta


Freshest Air Indoors

"This is truly an awesome product. The air in my house has never smelled so fresh! Highly recommended for people with seasonal allergies, dogs, etc. I have a Sharp Plasmacluster which never was able to get the air so clean and fresh. The unit is located upstairs on the landing outside our bedrooms and is able to clean and freshen up the air in my entire 2000 sf. house."
carolk - Surrey, British Columbia


Great Humidifier

"I just purchased this humidifier about 2 weeks ago. It has already outperformed, it has raised the humidity on our main floor from 27 to 40 %. It's a nice fine mist that doesn't leave a wet area around the humidifier, there is no white residue because it has a filter and I can place a few drops of essential oil on its special diffuser when I feel like it rather than contaminating the tank. In all I love this product and might purchase one for the upper level of my home as well."
Anonymous, Canada


Awesome!

"I bought this machine for my son's bed room he loved it and I want one for my bed room too... So I ordered. This Humidifier has big water tank. Pretty quiet..."
Olive Fish, Canada

Heaven Fresh Team 



 
Imran Bashir – CEO & System Architect

Imran graduated from the Illinois Institute of Technology in Chicago with a degree in Computer Engineering. 
Prior to founding Heaven Fresh, he worked with various large and start-up organizations as a software engineer and telecom researcher.
Imran is a serial entrepreneur and while he has built a multi-million dollar global product and distribution business under the Heaven Fresh umbrella, his passion still lies in technology. He believes that technology is the key driver for the growth of any business.
---------------





Tim McClure – Vice President Sales & Marketing

Tim is a seasoned sales and marketing professional with over
25 years of extensive senior management experience across North America. He has held several senior management
positions over his career.

In 1993, Tim joined Starter corporation. In his role as Vice President, Sales
& Marketing, he managed the sales team, developed business with major
accounts and corporate partners, negotiated endorsement contracts and handled
negotiations with the NHL, NBA, MLB, MLB, CFL and Hockey Canada.

Later in his career, Tim went on to head up the sales direction in North
America for the luxury fashion ‘giant of the eyewear industry, Luxottica. He
lead a team of 400 individuals to record-breaking sales in the US and Canada.
Tim played a key role in building Luxottica’s portfolio of world-renowned
brands such as Ray Ban, Versace, Burberry, Chanel, Prada, Polo and Ralph
Lauren.

After overcoming cancer in 2011, Tim went on to become a sought-after speaker
and leadership and brand consultant. Today he speaks to Fortune 500
corporations, hospital foundations, professional sports teams, high schools and
universities about overcoming obstacles, beating the odds and living life to
the fullest.
In 2015, Tim joined Heaven Fresh as the company’s Vice
President of Sales and Marketing.

and MASc fromRyersonUniversityall in electrical engineering. Armed
with five years’ experience in electronic systems design, Peter has been in

A photo with Jason Poon of Microsoft, He visited Heaven Fresh office to help develop Windows 10 Apps for Smart WiFi Products.


For the Curious Minds - What's Under the Hood

Below is a peak under the hood of our smart
connected products. We would love to have a one on one conversation about all
the technical “fun” we've had over the past two years bringing these smart
products to market. The smart home revolution is upon us and we'd like to
connect with all the brainiacs and tech gurus out there interested in working
with us to expand our IOT ecosystem.IoT Framework:
We are using the open source IOT framework AllJoyn from Allseen Alliance to IOT enable our smart products. AllJoyn utilizes a client­ server architecture to communicate with devices and allows simplified interoperability between connected products and applications. Heaven Fresh products are AllJoyn Certified, meaning they comply with interoperability standards and should seamlessly interoperate with other certified AllJoyn products out of the box. Certification details can be seen on the AllJoyn certification page.
Heaven Fresh is a member of the Allseen Alliance. We are working closely with other member companies to continuously improve the open source framework. You can find out more about AllJoyn at http://www.allseenalliance.com. If you would like to know our reasons for choosing Alljoyn, you can read Imran's post on LinkedIn.

Hardware
We chose two of our best selling products to IOT enable. Based on customer reviews, we know these products do fabulous jobs humidifying and purifying our customers homes. Rather then reinvent the wheel we improved them by adding an NXP K22F1M0 Cortex M4 ARM MCU and a GT202 802.11n wireless module.  Below are the specifications of the modules.






NXP MK22FN1M0VLH12
• ARM Cortex­-M4 core
• Flash size/ SRAM: Flash 1MB/ SRAM 128KB
• Clock speed: 120MHz
GT202
• Network Processor: QCA4002
• Standard Supported: IEEE 802.11b/g/n
• Single band 2.4GHz
• Data Rates: 10Mbps
• Internet Protocols: IPV4/ IPV6, TCP/ UDP, ARP/NDP, DHCPv4, ICMPv6
• Security Protocols: WPS, WPA, WPA2, WAPI, WEP, TKIP
Firmware
Our products utilize the AllJoyn thin client 15.09 running on NXP's MQX 4.1 RTOS. We have implemented the onboarding and configuration Alljoyn frameworks along with a custom control panel framework. For AWS IOT cloud services we are utilizing a Paho MQTT client along with WolfSSL SSL stack for enabling TLS 1.2 secured connection. Device firmware updates are done over the air (OTA) through MQX flash swap.
Mobile Apps
All our mobile apps are native apps for their respective operating systems i.e. iOS, Android and Windows 10. These apps use the AllJoyn standard client and house the AllJoyn router. Our apps leverage the onboarding, configuration and a custom control panel AllJoyn framework. Our apps can discover other AllJoyn products connected to the same network allowing interoperability among other AllJoyn products. Our apps have two modes, local and cloud. Local mode allows our app to exchange AllJoyn messages directly to the device without the need of connecting to the cloud. Cloud mode is specifically used when away from your home network and relies on MQTT communication to AWS IOT cloud services to talk with your device.
Cloud Service
After reviewing countless cloud options, we chose to go with AWS IOT cloud. We will probably write a lengthy white paper on the cloud selection process but the key factors were:
1) Flexibility in options and services allowing us to build the service we want.
2) Designed for embedded and low power devices.
3) Technical support via cloud architects and developer forums.
4) Cost of the cloud services from a consumer product perspective.
AWS ticked all these boxes with their fantastic cloud services such as DynamoDB for databases, Lambda for compute services not to mention Kinesis, Identity Management, SES and EC2 all exposed to AWS IOT, bridging our smart products to the AWS cloud. AWS IOT ThingSDK provides simple wrappers for and MQTT client and TLS networking functions along with simple API for communicating with the AWS device shadow, all of this is wrapped into a small 16KB package.
Security
We take user and device security very seriously. Security is built into the AllJoyn framework that allows for point to point encryption using KEYX and PSK where AllJoyn applications hold keys to decrypt data. An enhancement to the existing security was also developed and is called Security 2.0. This allows an application to validate access to interfaces and objects based on policies installed by the owner. When our smart products or app connect to the AWS IOT cloud services they utilize TLSv1.2 with mutual authentication using ECDHE-­RSA-­AES128­-GCM­-SHA256 cipher suite. Device certificate generation is done within your local network meaning your devices private key is never transmitted over then internet.
Interoperability
Interoperability is the holy grail of the IoT (Internet of Things). Several industry groups as well as Apple and Google are trying to be the communication standard for the Internet connected devices. We have started with AllJoyn but we are also working in parallel to achieve interoperability with other devices/framework that do not speak AllJoyn (yet).

- Honeywell Lyric Thermostat (also joint marketing with Honeywell)
- Nest Thermostat
- Smasung SmartThings
- IFTTT
- Lowe's Iris
- Open Connectivity Foundation (OCF) / IoTvity
- Apple HomeKit
- Google Weave / Brillo
We will be rolling out support for the above mentioned IoT hubs/frameworks periodically after the initial launch.Developer API
Heaven Fresh developer API will be released in 2017 for any developers and manufacturers who wish to connect to the Heaven Fresh products through the cloud but do not support one of the above mentioned framework. More details will be available on our website.

Applicable Area: Up to 650 sq. ft.

story:
Help us purchase the last two computers needed and security software.


The Birth of a Medical Billing Concierge Service

For several years I have witnessed my mother and her friends lament over their inability to understand their medical bills, health insurance policies, and financial obligations to medical service providers. Shortly after my mother’s hip surgery, we spent a great deal of time organizing each bill, only to find that there were sometimes duplicates, and even triplicates of the various statements. Upon this discovery, it was imperative to compare each bill to her insurance policy, and sure enough we found discrepancies all over the place! Luckily for us, I have a background in insurance, but I immediately began to think; what about people that don’t? How many people have been overcharged and not realized it? How many people have given up fighting with the providers to get bills corrected? How many hundreds or thousands of dollars should have been returned to patients because of incorrect billing?

That’s how I developed ErieView Consulting. I realized that with this company I could assist not just seniors, but anyone who has neither the time, knowledge, nor patience to wade through and fight incorrect billings. I have assembled a team of some of the most competent and thorough professionals I know, with experience in health care, health insurance, medical billing, finance, accounting, and customer service.

We are ready to start working with  clients but we need your help ! Below are samples of the type of situations that we will see and help to resolve. These are not actual client stories but instead examples.

Client A: 

This client has been receiving letters threatening collection on a bill that was paid in full more than a year ago. This type of follow up would best be served by our hourly package since it should only take about an hour to do a professional follow up.

Client B: 

This client has bills from several providers after an ambulatory procedure. From our initial review it appears that the client had two health policies in force at the time (married couple) and benefits were not properly coordinated so the client is being billed incorrectly. In addition, our preliminary research has uncovered an overcharge above the usual and customary as outlined in one of their policies. Three providers will need to be contacted and the billing will need to be corrected. This will best be suited to our four hour follow up package.

Client C: 

This client had major surgery which required extensive follow-up, some injuries were caused by a serious car accident and other treatment was due to a chronic  pre-existing condition. There were two hospital stays,  time in a rehabilitation care facility and numerous doctor visits. We suggest our top their package, which will allow time for us to thoroughly research, categorize, and follow up on the client's medical bills that are currently exceeding $100,000. 

I found inspiration for the Second Act of my professional life in these timeless words written by Langston Hughes in 1926

“Hold fast to dreams
For if dreams die
Life is a broken-winged bird
That cannot fly.
Hold fast to dreams
For when dreams go
Life is a barren field
Frozen with snow.”

The total cost for helping these clients will total $1,600 and this is where we are counting on you! Please help us, help them. By bolstering our funds to obtain the upgraded PCs that we need and the office equipment.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help through a contribution we understand, but how about giving us a heaping tablespoon of enthusiasm - Pass the word ... Share our story . Watch our site grow as we build it www.erieviewconsulting.com

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We love sport & we love to involve kids into jiu-jitsu

Kirovohrad city is located in the very center of Ukraine - it's a small regional center with not enough places for kids to go into sports. That is why "Ukrainian Patriotic Union "Borets" - a legally registered non-governmantal organisation, - helps kids to go into sports!

  • We provide girls & boys with place to develop their skills in Brazil jiu-jitsu
  • Our team teach kids to be healthy & self-confident
  • Club presents young sportsmen at championships all over Ukraine and kids already have excellent results on the national level !

If a kid do not have possibility to pay for uniform or train ticket to get to championship - we raise money from our donors & friends to help talanted young sportsmen!!!

Now we built the Sport Center for kids

We were donated a great building on the outskirts of the city, - it is over 400 square metres, - but we still need your help to repair it:
  • We need 280 USD dollars to repair the roof.
  • We need 170 USD dollars to buy paint for the walls
  • We need 50 USD dollars to transport materials for roof to the center.

In a new center over 300 kids will be able to develop themselves!

Now we have a place to work with only 150 kids, and in a new center we will double quantity of kids, going into sports!

You can come & help us with repairment!

If you visit Kirovohrad, Ukraine - please, come and visit our place - we always have a lot of job to do: work with kids, help at the kitchen, set up the garden neraby! We will be glad to have you!


Perks

If you send us 30 dollars - we will send you our T-shirt for your fun!

The "Ukrainian Patriotic Union "Borets" is a legally registered non-governmantal organisation. It has a bank account and has already received a first grant in amount of 400 USD dollars from Kirovohrad Press-Club for development of sport programms  amonf youth in the region (here is the document about registration),



Thanks to this campaign the world-famous brand Tatami Fightwear sends to Kirovohrad a gift for kids at sport club "Borets" - three boxes of equipment. Thank Tatami!!!

And another nice person - writer from Portugal Oksana Maxymyshyn has send our kids a sweet present!

Thanks to this campaign the world-famous brand Tatami Fightwear sends to Kirovohrad a gift for kids at sport club "Borets" - three boxes of equipment. Thank Tatami!!!


And another nice person - writer from Portugal Oksana Maxymyshyn has send our kids a sweet present!

story:
If your child plays soccer in Central, Ohio, then you know there is a BIG PROBLEM when it comes to winter and spring.  That problem is a frustrating lack of indoor athletic training space!  With the growing popularity of the sport in Columbus, Ohio (along with the rest of the nation), much of the area is not prepared for the indoor training space required during the harsh snowy & rainy months of the year.  Unless your club has an exclusive deal (which 90% of teams are not fortunate enough to have), your athlete is usually forced into one of three options each year:

• Run Down Indoor Space - Many teams are forced to train at an out-of-date soccer indoor facility with run down turf, unsanitary conditions or worse; risking injury or hindered improvement.

• School Gymnasiums - If turf space is not available, many teams resort to train in small school gymnasiums with hard gym floors and inadequate space for development; risking further injury from hard falls.

• Inadequate Times - If you do manage to secure training space at a soccer training facility, the majority of teams are given very inopportune times for student athletes (i.e. 8 pm for 10 years olds, etc.); sacrificing necessary education and sleep for soccer training availability.

We know how you feel and are determined to fix this problem.... with YOUR HELP!  Please help us to raise partial capital towards the development of a NEW soccer training facility in Columbus; one that will allow athletes and teams the opportunity to further develop their soccer future in a safe and educative environment!

Our plan is to develop a NEW soccer training facility for soccer training year round.  This training facility would be an approx. 30,000 square foot, clear span layout and would be available for individuals, small groups, teams and school programs to train at.  Athletes and teams will be able to train on professional quality indoor artificial grass (turf) as well as develop their strength and speed with our soccer specific gym space.  The climate controlled field space will be able to be arranged into multiple field sizes ranging from 3v3, 4v4, 6v6, 9v9 and 10v10.  Here are the plans for the facility:

PLAN A - NEW Facility Construction - The goal is to raise enough capital between contributors, investors and QTSD© capital loans to finance the construction of a new facility for soccer athletes in Columbus.  Initial quotes for this are approximately $750k for construction with additional costs of $60k for field turf and training equipment.  We are currently exploring options for land lease and purchase in the northeastern Columbus area.

PLAN B - Existing Building Renovation - The secondary plan is to explore existing buildings in the northern Columbus area that can be renovated for soccer training purposes.  The immediate challenge will be locating clear span designs; which will cost close to $20-$50k to rebuild structural designs to fit a soccer open field concept.  This building arrangement would be for 2-3 years, with the constant goal of moving forward with a NEW construction up to modern soccer standards for soccer individual and team development!

Every dollar collected will be used to further the develop and acquisition of more consistent training space for soccer athletes and teams in Columbus; whether building or renovating new space!


The financial goal for this training facility is a three step process:

1) INDIEGOGO Campaign -  We need YOUR support!  We are looking to raise approx.  $100,000 in campaign contributions towards offsetting the capital loans needed for the facility.  Why does that matter?  If we can offset the amount that we will need for our capital loans by $100,000, that will allow us to add even better options for your athlete and the soccer community.  If we meet our goal financially, we will be exploring the possibility of adding an outdoor field as well; turfed with lights so that teams and athletes will be able to compete and train outdoors as well.  But that all hinges on your immediate support!

2) Individual Investors - The second stage will be investor individuals, families and businesses.  We know that there are quite a few individuals and families that are not only passionate for their child's development but also support what we as a soccer training company stand for.  If you are interested in investing in our company's facility at a larger amount or length of time, contact us @ jpennell@qtsdsoccer.com and we will start discussing investment options at the end of March-early April 2016.

3) Capital Loans - This is the final step; to apply for small business loans.  We are a small company and will be applying for loans to cover the remainder of the facility costs.  This amount will depend on how much is raised in the first two steps. 

 

Every single dollar helps!  No matter how much you can support, we are thankful for your donation towards creating a new opportunity for athletes to develop in a safe and educative environment; not only your athlete but the entire community of youth soccer!

Here's what we need to reach the crowdfunding campaign's goal of $100,000:

• $15 - 800 backers    

• $25 - 200 backers    

• $50 - 400 backers

• $100 - 200 backers

• $200 - 100 backers

• $250 - 25 backers

• $500 - 30 backers

• $1,000 - 20 backers

You can choose to donate with the amount you prefer (and we are very thankful for your contribution!)  As an added bonus, we have added additional "perks" or gifts of gratitude from us at Quick Touch Soccer Development (QTSD©) for campaign backers at various levels!


For each contribution in the amounts listed earlier, you will receive the following In return, you will get a NEW QTSD© Indoor Training Facility; designed for year-round soccer training in a climate controlled, professionally developed location with every aspect of athletic development taken into consideration.   Aside from the facility, we will reward our supporters with exciting contribution perks that you won't find anywhere else (trust us)!  Here's what you'll get:

DONATE $10 • THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

DONATE $15 • CUSTOM QTSD© ATHLETE TAG & LANYARD

DONATE $25 • QTSD© SUPPORTER'S SCARF (LIMITED PRINT)


DONATE $50 • "TEAM QTSD© ATHLETE" LIMITED PRINT T-SHIRT + QTSD© Athlete Tag and Lanyard


DONATE $75 - QTSD© "SOCCER SURVIVAL BAG"!


DONATE $125 - CUSTOM QTSD© OFFICIAL NIKE JERSEY


DONATE $185 - SECRET PERK - DOES THAT MAKE YOU CURIOUS.....?


DONATE $200 - QTSD© TRAINING VIDEO & SESSION w/ YOU + TEAM QTSD© LIMITED T-SHIRT

DONATE $250 - QTSD© FAMILY TRAINING SESSION


DONATE $500 - QTSD© BUBBLE SOCCER GAME ENTRY

DONATE $1,000 - QTSD© VIP CLUB MEMBER

We are committed to bringing you the best soccer training experience possible and will not settle for anything less.  Every dollar contributed will go towards making our NEW QTSD© Training Facility a reality; one that will meet the needs of every soccer athlete, club and team in central Ohio.  Our goal is to open the new facility in Winter 2017 but realize that during the construction/refurbishing process some delays may occur.  While a timely opening is important, we will prioritize quality over everything else and will provide constant updates to everyone about the project.


If we do not reach our goal of $100,000, the funds raised will immediately go towards the development of a more consistent training location for QTSD© Athletes.  Our #1 goal is offer more consistent training availability year round for athletes.  That consistent training space will then become the next step towards a soccer specific training facility like no other in central Ohio!


Soccer is an amazing sport; so simple yet complex at the same time and that is why we fell in love with it.  QTSD© is a diverse team of soccer coaches, players and all-around obsessed students of the game.  Seriously, we live on the soccer field more than at our actual houses! With over a decade of coaching & training experience as well as collegiate & professional playing experience, our coaches have helped develop players just learning the game to those taking their career to the professional level.  

Please contact us at jpennell@qtsdsoccer.com if you have any questions at all.  We know we have some of the most passionate athletes and families in Ohio and we truly appreciate any support you give. From each of us at Quick Touch Soccer Development (QTSD©) -  a very sincere "Thank You!"

story:
Why Is This The Best Solution?

Advanced Gastro Technologies, Inc. has developed a simple, innovative weight loss

device that is inserted as an outpatient procedure and may be removed in minutes.

This technology promises to improve the health and quality of life for people with

clinically severe obesity.

AGT was founded in 2007 by Gary M. Annunziata D.O., a board certified gastroenterologist and inventor of this remarkable new weight-loss device.

Incorporated in Delaware, AGT is based in Southern California. The AGT team includes physicians, regulatory and reimbursement specialists, and thought leaders in the pharmaceutical and medical device research, development and marketing.

To date, AGT has successfully completed a significant portion of its pre-clinical trial studies and followed by a series of biocompatibility studies is prepared to begin a first-in-man pilot study to assess the safety, tolerability and efficacy of the novel AGT weight loss device. AGT management plans to raise an initial round investment of $2M to file Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) with the FDA.


THE MARKET OPPORTUNITY

Worldwide, obesity is a problem of epidemic proportions. In the United States alone, more than 78 million adults and 13 million children ages 2-19 — more than one-third of Americans (35.7%) are obese (BMI >30 kg/m2). By 2015, 75% of Americans will be overweight and 40% will be obese.


 Dr. Annunziata's Experience 

I have completed over 23,000 procedures involving the gastrointestinal tract.  I invented the Pylo-Sphere after observing that patients who developed a partial blockage of their stomach were losing weight with minimal symptoms! Designing the Pylo-Sphere required an extensive understanding of  the digestive process and the chemistry of weigh loss . I am uniquely positioned in that I have this understanding and the desire to create a solution. 

Over the last 8 years I have worked extensively with engineers and tested this device multiple times in animals. I have seen the results and they are quite amazing. The animals had rapid and consistent weight loss . This occurred without significant side effects or damage to the lining of the stomach.

The Pylo-Sphere was designed based on a understanding of digestion. When you eat the stomach immediately enters a process known as the "fed state" during this part of digestion the stomach takes large particles of food and makes them small. The stomach does this by pushing the food back and fourth grinding it up trapping most of the large particles in the stomach. 

However during the fed state particles of food and fluid leak out into the small intestine,and is one of the reasons you can eat a meal larger than the size of your fist (the average size of the inner stomach). 

The Pylo-Sphere blocks this leakage of food particles during the fed state . So you feel full after eating only a small meal. When you feel full your stomach tells your brain your appetite diminishes and hunger stops.

 The Pylo-Sphere is designed to be placed and removed when your goal of weight loss is achieved.


THE CONSEQUENCES AND COSTS OF OBESITY

Obesity significantly increases the risk for type 2 diabetes; hypercholesterolemia,hypertension, heart disease, and stroke; liver disease; gallbladder disease;gastrointestinal reflux disease; osteoarthritis, chronic joint pain, and back injury;sleep apnea and other respiratory ailments; and at least nine cancers.In the United States, obesity is the second-leading cause of preventable death after smoking. There is conclusive scientific evidence that mortality risk increases with increasing weight and that even slightly overweight adults — people of average height who are ten to 20 pounds above their ideal weight — are at increased risk of premature death. The rising prevalence of overweight and obesity not only foretells increasing adverse effects on health and longevity but also guarantees increased costs for medical care.

In the U.S., the direct cost of obesity adds approximately $150 billion to the annual health care tab, principally through its association with cardiovascular disease, type 2 diabetes, and some types of cancer. Obesity-related spending is projected to top $344 billion in 2018. Similarly, the indirect costs of decreased earnings, lost wages and productivity and the value of future earnings lost by premature mortality are staggering.  The global weight-loss market will top $516 billion by 2014.

The U.S. weight-loss market is expected to reach $310 in 2014. The World Health Organization (WHO) predicts that 2.3 billion people around the world will be overweight and 700 million will be obese by 2015. T

Why is the Pylo-Sphere an incredible invention? 

The Pylo-Sphere is designed to be to easily in the stomach by a doctor in minutes . Because it's easy to place in the stomach the learning curve for doctors is fast and will greatly enhance the use of the Pylo-Sphere.  We plan to have the Pylo-Sphere on the market for doctors all over the world. The Pylo-Sphere will provide doctors with another solution for people who need to lose weight . Most people want a alternative to major surgery such as gastric bypass.

Treating patients who have had serious complications from gastric bypass and lap band helped motivate me to design a better solution for weight loss that does not involve surgery. There is a huge demand for a simple solution . I believe the Pylo-Sphere is that solution. I have carefully analyzed other devices in development based on non surgical weight loss and know the Pylo-Sphere is cutting edge and superior technology.

COMPETITIVE LANDSCAPE

Although clinical trials are currently underway to determine the safety and efficacy of more than 200 drugs intended to treat obesity, it has been 13 years since aweight-loss drug has received FDA approval and only two, Qsymia is a combination of phentermine, a sympathomimetic amine anorectic, and topiramate extended-release,an anti epileptic drug and Belviq, an anorexiant, received FDA approval in 2012. Nonetheless, there are promising compounds with the potential to treat obesity on the horizon. For example, Scripps Research Institute investigators have synthesized small molecules that act by altering the biological clock and based on animal studies these may prove effective for a range of chronic conditions including obesity. Several medical device companies have attempted to design weight-loss devices intended to obstruct the gastrointestinal tract, deliver electronic neural stimulation or mechanically stimulate neuronal receptors in the duodenum to enhance satiety (EnteroMedics’ vagus nerve blocking therapy) Gastric pacemakers from both EnteroMedics and Transneuronix were largely unsuccessful in 2009 clinical trials. The Transneuronix failure occurred shortly after Medtronic acquired the company for  $269 million.Another device, which produces malabsorption (GI Dynamic’s EndoBarrier), is marketed in select regions in Europe and South America but is not approved for sale in the United States.

In 2012, Obalon Therapeutics Inc. secured $1.5 million to conduct an observational pilot study of gastrointestinal space-occupying device to promote weight loss. Although none have received FDA approval, at least one (Endosphere) secured $3.1 million in a Series B round and received its CE mark in Europe in 2012. ReShapeDuoTM, a non-surgical, dual-intragastric balloon filled with saline, met its primary efficacy endpoints in a U.S., randomized, sham-controlled trial for weight loss and ReShape Medical, Inc. plans to submit a Premarket Approval application to the FDA in the second quarter of 2014.

The AGT weight loss device offers significant advantages compared to electrical

implants, gastric stimulators and others devices:

● The AGT weight loss device does not use a battery; battery-operated devices

require periodic procedures to change batteries

● Because it does not require a battery, the ADT weight-loss device is likely to

perform more reliably with less risk of malfunction

● Since insertion of the AGT weight loss device does not require an incision, the

risk of infection is minimal

● Devices approved in Europe are years from entering the United States market;

by contrast, AGT has a clear path to U.S. FDA approval

Crowdfunding Support :YOUR donation will help make the difference . These days the venture capitalist want to come into the process of medical device development later, after a device has undergone human studies. 

With a human trial medical device industry leaders will partner with us and accelerate our goal to getting the Pylo-Sphere to the people who need it.  The cost associated with this device are extremely high. The funds that are raised will be used over the next 24 months as follows:

 FDA submission 175,000 

 Device manufacturing/fabrication 250,000

 Biocompatibility studies required for FDA approval 200,000, 

Fees  250,000  

Human Safety trial 450,000

 Trial Staff/employee  475,000 

Engineering t 200,000 .


Why we will succeed with the Pylo-Sphere technology ? We will partner with a leading medical device company to distribute the Pylo-Sphere through existing supply and marketing chains. We estimate the cost of placing the Pylo-Sphere will be approximately 2000.00 . The Pylo-Sphere is intended to be in place 90 days then replaced if needed. 


The Pylo-Sphere is truly a life changing solution. Your generous support will be giving back Americans alone the necessary help needed to take back control of their weight.


For further information please visit our web site at http://www.advancedgastrotechnologies.com/home.htm or email me docgi @aol.com

require periodic procedures to change batteries
● Because it does not require a battery, the ADT weight-loss device is likely to
perform more reliably with less risk of malfunction
● Since insertion of the AGT weight loss device does not require an incision, the
risk of infection is minimal
● Devices approved in Europe are years from entering the United States market;
by contrast, AGT has a clear path to U.S. FDA approvalCrowdfunding Support :YOUR donation will help make the difference . These days the venture capitalist want to come into the process of medical device development later, after a device has undergone human studies. With a human trial medical device industry leaders will partner with us and accelerate our goal to getting the Pylo-Sphere to the people who need it.  The cost associated with this device are extremely high. The funds that are raised will be used over the next 24 months as follows: FDA submission 175,000  Device manufacturing/fabrication 250,000 Biocompatibility studies required for FDA approval 200,000, Fees  250,000  Human Safety trial 450,000 Trial Staff/employee  475,000 Engineering t 200,000 .Why we will succeed with the Pylo-Sphere technology ? We will partner with a leading medical device company to distribute the Pylo-Sphere through existing supply and marketing chains. We estimate the cost of placing the Pylo-Sphere will be approximately 2000.00 . The Pylo-Sphere is intended to be in place 90 days then replaced if needed. The Pylo-Sphere is truly a life changing solution. Your generous support will be giving back Americans alone the necessary help needed to take back control of their weight.For further information please visit our web site at http://www.advancedgastrotechnologies.com/home.htm or email me docgi @aol.com

story:
For years we have been trying to Help Local Surf kids in Guatemala.
It gives the kids an opportunity to do something else then live on the streets.
To be able to keep the kids in the water we have personally invested in boards and materials needed.
Nowadays the group gets bigger and bigger and we personally can not provide for all the kids.
We would like to continue helping the kids and give them a different Future!!

story:
Hello, this is Dasha  and this incredibly talented girl need you Help! 

   She was diagnosed wit Polycystic Kidney Disease 4  month ago ,  She is just 10 years old ,  she has a lot of dreams  and a lot of plans for life  but her  Biggest dream is to be healthy and to grow up !  The only one thing  that maintain her life is Hemodialysis  times per week(instead of 3 times) , the problem is that  we  have  a lot  of children with the same problem  and there are not  enough  apparatus  for procedure  .

    Now ,Dashs needs Kidney transplantation,  Her father is going to be the donor , we  don’t have  so much time  because  if we are going to wait to much  than we gonna have less chances for a  successful transplantation  !
If you don’t know  the kidneys also produce three important hormones: erythropoietin, which stimulates the bone marrow to make red blood cells; renin, which helps regulate blood pressure; and the active form of vitamin D, which helps control the calcium balance in the body and maintain healthy bones. So  In Dasha’s  case both Kidney  do not function  so in case  she is not getting  the transplantation  she  wont grow  she  will remain in  her body  of a 10 years girl .
   We are thinking now  about 2 Clinics  from  Ankara , Turkey  and  Berlin Germany , This are the cheapest options for us , most probably we are going to choose  Turkey  because is the most convenient option for us , We need just 40 thousand  euro ,this is not the full cost but at least we can  get  a start  . 

We trust  in people around us and all over the world , Please  help this wonderful Girl  to  get healthy , to grow  up,   to follow her dreams 

she is very talented   and she loves  a lot to draw  who knows  maybe she is going to be  a  a nice designer ,  so now Please help her, she deserve's  you help  and  don't forget  to  give us you  dress  we are going to  send you a nice  postcard(Perk)  designed by Dasha  with  a  personal Thank you !



For this purpose we’ve created a facebook page https://www.facebook.com/fordawa?ref=profile
  Life is a Gift  and it's  terrible when children's lives so limited!

As soon we will have   some news we are going to update you !

Thank You in Advance !

story:
Who Am I?

Hi, my name is Sandy. I'm a 25 year old woman from Germany and I fight the hard battle against cancer. When I was in first grade, my orthopedist discovered that I have a growth disease in both of my knees and bones in general. He also discovered a tumor in my left femur. The tumor has been unremarkable since then. About two years ago it has changed and I needed a very complicated operation on my femur since the tumor has damaged the bone in my entire leg. I have also gotten chemo theraphy which has given me a hard time. I suffer from mental illnesses such as depressions and usually need medication for that. My immune system has been suffering from the chemo as well.

What I Need

I still try to recover from the operation in which specialists had to actually break my bone in order to remove the tumor. They have discovered another little tumor that is grown on my bone. The big tumor was removed in the operation, the little tumor was being fought with the chemo. I was classified as not able to work and that gives me a hard time since I used to work with children.

My test results after the operation have been getting better but recently they've gotten worse again. I'm right now off chemo, medication and therapy, treatments because of my financial situation I'm a risk for the hospital. If I'm not able to afford the chemo, medication, hospitalisation, treatments and therapies as soon as just possible I'll not be around for a long time. I'm in pain every single day and even have attacks which leave me unable to speak, eat or move for a certain amount of time. Recovering from this attacks is hard.

I have been saving my money the best I can and also sell clothes, merchandise on various Internet sites. My mother is working very hard to help me as well.

How Could Donations Help Me

Every single donation will help me to save my life. I've tried everything to raise money but without any great success.

I do now that not everyone can donate but it would also help me if you could share my campaign and talk about it. I will appreciate every help I can get from the bottom of my heart. 

This is my last try an also my last cance.

story:
Short Summary

Imagine taking your child to the hospital knowing she has appendicitis. When you arrive, you are told that the hospital does not have an ultrasound machine to diagnose her, and there is not a surgeon to take care of her. You would be one of the 5 billion people worldwide without access to basic surgical care. At Tenwek Hospital in western Kenya, we are training surgeons who will serve in resource-limited areas. To better educate and prepare them, and to improve care of patients, we hope to buy a portable ultrasound machine.

What We Need

The cost of a portable ultrasound machine is roughly $20,000. All the funds raised will go toward the purchase of a portable ultrasound machine for the surgical residency program. We are grateful to those who will match our fundraising to meet our goal.

The Impact

Tenwek is successfully training surgical residents. Our graduates continue to work for hospitals in resource-limited areas. Similar projects have greatly helped advance the care Tenwek Hospital can offer. By funding this project and investing in the future leaders of Kenya, you will also be helping to bring better surgical care throughout the continent.

Risks & Challenges 

To properly train residents, we need certain resources. Without them, we will get by, but not nearly as well as we could. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We value your contribution. Even if you are not able to donate at this time, please share about us and ask others to get involved.
