story:
RUNHEART is an application similar to the famous application Runtastic.

The peculiarity that distinguishes RUNHEART is converting data (speed, times of activity, miles, etc.) in money which allow to buy sports products or make donations.

The software that determine BONUS is an algorithm studied specifically for this purpose.

Your sports activities produce scores and in agreement with sponsors, it will be assigned coupons for the purchase of products.

In cooperation with some sponsors and foundations, the money obtained, instead of being used for the purchase of products, can also be donated to charity.

 

 

The sportsmen can choose where donate the money made with their sports activities.

The money goes to the foundations or charity's works that will be chosen with the most adequate attention in helping the less fortunate: 

  • HUNGER IN THE WORLD
  • CHILDREN ORPHANS
  • CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM LEUKEMIA
  • CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM AUTISM
  • ABANDONED ANIMALS
  • ANIMALS NEEDING PROSTHESIS
  • MOVEMENTS TO STOP TESTING ON ANIMALS
  • SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH
  • RESEARCH AIDS
  • RESEARCH CANCER
  • RESEARCH ALZHEIMER
  • RESEARCH LEUKEMIA
  • RESEARCH AUTISM
  • RESEARCH FOR BETTER THE WORLD CLIMATE
  • REALIZATION OF HOSPITALS AND KINDERGARTENS IN POOR COUNTRIES
  • OTHER

 

 

HOME PAGE

 

 

 

 

The Runheart GPS app for iPhone, Android and Windows phone allows you to track your running, jogging, walking, cycling and other fitness activities.

Share your sports activities, discover new running routes and reach exercise goals.

 

 

 

 

FEATURE FOR IPHONE, ANDROID AND WINDOWS PHONE

  • GPS Tracking     
  • Measurement of Distance
  • Duration
  • Speed
  • Pace
  • Calories Burned 
  • Map View          
  • Training History 
  • Social Sharing

(CYCLING, MOUNTAIN BIKE and PEDOMETER are similar to RUNNING)

 

The software that increases the BONUS is an algorithm based on multiple factors, follows table:

SPORT

SPORT ACTION

BONUS  POINT

RUNNING

1 MILES

4

CYCLING

1 MILES

1

MOUNTAIN BIKE.

1 MILES

2

PEDOMETER

1 MILES

3     

 

 

 

 

UP TO THIS POINT, IT HAS BEEN INVESTED $ 90.000, TO COMPLETE IT WE NEED $ 40.000.

 

AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 300.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS:  ​ 

FEATURES FOR RUNNING, CYCLING, MOUNTAIN BIKE AND PEDOMOTER  (FOR IPHONE, ANDROID AND WINDOWS PHONE)

  • GPS Tracking     
  • Measurement of Distance
  • Duration
  • Speed
  • Pace
  • Calories Burned 
  • Map View          
  • Training History 
  • Social Sharing
  • Charts (Speed | Elevation | Heart Rate)   
  • Split Table
  • Manually Add Activities       
  • Synchronize Activities 
  • Countdown        
  • Metric & Imperial Units        
  • Multi-User Capability  
  • Languages
  • Voice Coach for English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano and日本語
  • Live Tracking     
  • Routes       
  • Cheering    
  • Heart Rate Monitoring 
  • Heart Rate Zones
  • GeoTagging        
  • Integrated Music Player        
  • Workouts  
  • Interval Workout
  • Weather    
  • Auto Pause
  • Earth View
  • Hydration 
  • Connect Smartwatch

 

AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 600.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS: 

This will be divided into 2 group:

 

 

 

Flatten your stomach, build muscle & define your abs with the Runheart Sit-Ups app! With Runheart Sit-Ups, you’ll achieve your core strength and midsection fitness goals. The progressive plans help you build strength and see constant improvement in your overall fitness & strength training capacity. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Improve your strength and reach new fitness goals with the Runheart Pull-Ups app. Use Runheart Pull-Ups to get healthy, stay fit & feel fantastic! Unique recognition of your pull-ups: Put your smartphone in a pocket near your hip and pull-ups are automatically counted using the accelerometer on your smartphone. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Runheart Squats is a personal squat trainer that implements easy-to-follow, progressive training plans. The plans help you build strength in your quads and glutes & keep motivated! Use the Runheart Squats app to build leg strength, tighten up your bum and fit into those new jeans! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

The Runheart Push-Ups app is your personal push-up trainer, helping you reach your exercise and strength training goals with efficient, easy-to-follow plans. With Runheart Push-Ups, you can achieve your fitness goals. You’ll be motivated to push harder, strengthen your muscles & have fun in the process! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

 

 

AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 900.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS: 

This will be divided into 3 group:

 

 

The Runheart Six Pack app lets you lose weight, ditch your belly fat and get the flat abs you've always wanted using custom training plan workouts. Follow workouts in high-quality, HD videos to complete customized core workouts and define yourself with Runheart! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

The Runheart Legs Trainer app today and develop strong, toned legs with Runheart! Follow the lead of your lifelike avatar trainer in high-quality, HD videos to complete intense lower body workouts -guaranteed to burn fat & build muscle. Plus, Legs Trainer is convenient and practical! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Runheart app turns your smartphone into an altimeter with useful additional features, such as: compass, weather info, exact GPS position, plus sunrise & sunset data! The Runheart Altimeter app is useful for enthusiasts of outdoor activities such as hiking, walking, skiing, rock climbing & mountain biking. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Check your heart rate anytime, anywhere – when you wake up or after exercise. The Runheart Heart Rate app measures your heartbeat with great accuracy, using your smartphone camera sensor, helping you get a better sense of your overall health and fitness. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Exercises & Quick Workouts app and define your backside with Runheart! Follow the lead of your avatar trainer, in high-quality, HD videos to complete intense butt and leg workouts. Fitness is not one size fits all & your fat burning workouts shouldn’t be either! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

The Runheart Timer app is more than a traditional stopwatch. With Runheart it's possible to create personalized interval workouts with warm-up, , workout & rest periods and cool down! Whether you workout regularly, practice meditation or simply need a tool to track your working hours, Runeart Timer is for you! Set as many timers as desired, save the settings & use the customized timers again and again. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

The Sleep Better alarm clock, lets you track your sleep,, monitor your dreams and improve your bedtime habits. Whether you struggle to fall asleep, or want to learn how your day time activities (such as caffeine and alcohol consumption, workout habits and daily stress levels) influence your sleep efficiency, the Sleep Better sleep cycle app will allow you to awake refreshed and ready to seize the day! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

Runheart Libra app works in perfect combination with the Runheart Libra scale, which tracks weight, monitors body composition and supports overall weight management. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.

 

 

 

Our team

We want to express a special thanks to all the people who trust in our work. Talent, passion, hard work and a great idea are the recipe for success. This is the reason why we devoted ourselves and put so much effort and enthusiasm in this project!

Your trust in us is, as well, a big step.

Thank you all!

 
 
Alex Silvestrini  
His skills are: precision, reliability, ability to harmonize the important decisions planned by the team.
 

Andrea Mocellin

Very knowledgeable developer, plays a key role in developing Runheart app. He will help it us grow in the future.

 

Rachele Piccolin

Graphic designer. She is the creative and inventive mind of the group.

 

Noemi Sabbadin

Positivity, enthusiasm and a great passion for sports and voluntary work.

 

Risks & Challenges

Several months ago we contacted some of the most important companies that produce clothing and sports equipment. Since then, after they analyzed our project and received all the consent, we had to face o deal with the opposite problem: which brand choose.

The challenge for us has already begun: improving and optimized the project.

It was necessary to take a web designer and three web developers to sspeed up the software development.

We believe that problems can be found in every work, especially during users' trial time. In our case it could be software configuration, but the important thing isto identification, understand the comprehension and, at the end, achievement to solve it properly and immediately, with the minor inconvenience possible.

Ours is a new project under development; so far an "app" with these characteristics was never submitted. Once it's completed, the important thing is how to make it known to the world, so we are taking into consideration some form of advertising: we don't exclude to involve the previously selected companies as sponsors.

We have already received offers to purchase the shares from investors, but we want to achieve the objectives with ours capacity. We firmly believe in our abilities.

Reguarding similar product: for years some "app" dedicated to fitness were used very successfully and they are a great support to those who practice sports because with them you can calculate calories, distance, duration and speed. Several million users around the world use these applications, even without getting anything. With our "app" you may benefit from the economic advantage.

The idea has been deposited to the SIAE therefore copyrighted.

 

Other Ways You Can Get Involved 

Remember, if you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed, please consider passing on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Drop these links in tip jars, friends’ emails, social media or post them on your favorite blogs' comment sections! Please help us get the word out!

Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker to know this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.

Let's do this.

https://www.facebook.com/runheartofficial/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EvAs_DDeXIY&t=20s

https://www.instagram.com/runheartofficial/

https://twitter.com/RUNHEARTapp

UP TO THIS POINT, IT HAS BEEN INVESTED $ 90.000, TO COMPLETE IT WE NEED $ 40.000.
 
AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 300.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS:  ​ 
FEATURES FOR RUNNING, CYCLING, MOUNTAIN BIKE AND PEDOMOTER  (FOR IPHONE, ANDROID AND WINDOWS PHONE)

GPS Tracking

AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 600.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS:  

This will be divided into 2 group:

 


 
 

Flatten your stomach, build muscle & define your abs with the Runheart Sit-Ups app! With Runheart Sit-Ups, you’ll achieve your core strength and midsection fitness goals. The progressive plans help you build strength and see constant improvement in your overall fitness & strength training capacity. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Improve your strength and reach new fitness goals with the Runheart Pull-Ups app. Use Runheart Pull-Ups to get healthy, stay fit & feel fantastic! Unique recognition of your pull-ups: Put your smartphone in a pocket near your hip and pull-ups are automatically counted using the accelerometer on your smartphone. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Runheart Squats is a personal squat trainer that implements easy-to-follow, progressive training plans. The plans help you build strength in your quads and glutes & keep motivated! Use the Runheart Squats app to build leg strength, tighten up your bum and fit into those new jeans! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

The Runheart Push-Ups app is your personal push-up trainer, helping you reach your exercise and strength training goals with efficient, easy-to-follow plans. With Runheart Push-Ups, you can achieve your fitness goals. You’ll be motivated to push harder, strengthen your muscles & have fun in the process! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

 
 
AT THE ACHIEVEMENT OF $ 900.000 IT WILL BE INCORPORATED MORE FUNCTIONS:  

This will be divided into 3 group:

 


 

The Runheart Six Pack app lets you lose weight, ditch your belly fat and get the flat abs you've always wanted using custom training plan workouts. Follow workouts in high-quality, HD videos to complete customized core workouts and define yourself with Runheart! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

The Runheart Legs Trainer app today and develop strong, toned legs with Runheart! Follow the lead of your lifelike avatar trainer in high-quality, HD videos to complete intense lower body workouts -guaranteed to burn fat & build muscle. Plus, Legs Trainer is convenient and practical! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Runheart app turns your smartphone into an altimeter with useful additional features, such as: compass, weather info, exact GPS position, plus sunrise & sunset data! The Runheart Altimeter app is useful for enthusiasts of outdoor activities such as hiking, walking, skiing, rock climbing & mountain biking. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Check your heart rate anytime, anywhere – when you wake up or after exercise. The Runheart Heart Rate app measures your heartbeat with great accuracy, using your smartphone camera sensor, helping you get a better sense of your overall health and fitness. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Exercises & Quick Workouts app and define your backside with Runheart! Follow the lead of your avatar trainer, in high-quality, HD videos to complete intense butt and leg workouts. Fitness is not one size fits all & your fat burning workouts shouldn’t be either! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

The Runheart Timer app is more than a traditional stopwatch. With Runheart it's possible to create personalized interval workouts with warm-up, , workout & rest periods and cool down! Whether you workout regularly, practice meditation or simply need a tool to track your working hours, Runeart Timer is for you! Set as many timers as desired, save the settings & use the customized timers again and again. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

The Sleep Better alarm clock, lets you track your sleep,, monitor your dreams and improve your bedtime habits. Whether you struggle to fall asleep, or want to learn how your day time activities (such as caffeine and alcohol consumption, workout habits and daily stress levels) influence your sleep efficiency, the Sleep Better sleep cycle app will allow you to awake refreshed and ready to seize the day! For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

Runheart Libra app works in perfect combination with the Runheart Libra scale, which tracks weight, monitors body composition and supports overall weight management. For Iphone, Android and Windows Phone with all features.
 

 
 

Our team
We want to express a special thanks to all the people who trust in our work. Talent, passion, hard work and a great idea are the recipe for success. This is the reason why we devoted ourselves and put so much effort and enthusiasm in this project!
Your trust in us is, as well, a big step.
Thank you all!

 
 


Alex Silvestrini  
His skills are: precision, reliability, ability to harmonize the important decisions planned by the team.
 


Andrea Mocellin
Very knowledgeable developer, plays a key role in developing Runheart app. He will help it us grow in the future.
 


Rachele Piccolin
Graphic designer. She is the creative and inventive mind of the group.
 

Noemi Sabbadin
Positivity, enthusiasm and a great passion for sports and voluntary work.
 
Risks & Challenges
Several months ago we contacted some of the most important companies that produce clothing and sports equipment. Since then, after they analyzed our project and received all the consent, we had to face o deal with the opposite problem: which brand choose.
The challenge for us has already begun: improving and optimized the project.
It was necessary to take a web designer and three web developers to sspeed up the software development.
We believe that problems can be found in every work, especially during users' trial time. In our case it could be software configuration, but the important thing isto identification, understand the comprehension and, at the end, achievement to solve it properly and immediately, with the minor inconvenience possible.
Ours is a new project under development; so far an "app" with these characteristics was never submitted. Once it's completed, the important thing is how to make it known to the world, so we are taking into consideration some form of advertising: we don't exclude to involve the previously selected companies as sponsors.
We have already received offers to purchase the shares from investors, but we want to achieve the objectives with ours capacity. We firmly believe in our abilities.
Reguarding similar product: for years some "app" dedicated to fitness were used very successfully and they are a great support to those who practice sports because with them you can calculate calories, distance, duration and speed. Several million users around the world use these applications, even without getting anything. With our "app" you may benefit from the economic advantage.
The idea has been deposited to the SIAE therefore copyrighted.
 

Other Ways You Can Get Involved 
Remember, if you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed, please consider passing on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Drop these links in tip jars, friends’ emails, social media or post them on your favorite blogs' comment sections! Please help us get the word out!
Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker to know this!
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.
Let's do this.

The G-Rider is the mount that allows you to ride your favourite or choice of vibrators and dildos your way.  The G-Rider is the perfect accessory for women, men and couples who want to enjoy a sensual sex positive experience with maximum pleasure. The G-Rider was designed for everyone to enjoy. So no matter who you love, your shape, age or size …it has been designed for you!

The original G-Rider concept was an all in one piece. Conversations we had with our concept test groups indicated that most women had a preferred vibrator or dildo. This highlighted that we are all so different, different bodies, different abilities and different ways we like to do things.  So the concept designs changed into the first prototypes of the G-Rider, the truly flexible and adaptable sex toy mount. Your Ride, Your Way.

 

         

Thank you, we are very grateful that you have made your way here today and are considering supporting our campaign. We hope that we can make you as excited as we are as we embark on the next chapter of our journey. 

Our ultimate aim when designing the G-Rider was to provide people with a variety of flexible options when using their sex toys that removed the existing limits. Limits such as such as size and body ability. 

We believe we have finally achieved this with our latest quality, functional and body safe prototypes of the G-Rider.  

We have come up with 69 new ways to ride our favourite vibrators and dildos – a challenge we hope you can beat ! Check out our Instagram challenge. xo

 

 

These are some of the G-Rider highlights;

ONE OF THE MOST EXCITING FEATURES IS THE INTERNATIONAL PATENT PENDING MOUNT!

  • Our innovative design can be used in all kinds of relationship styles and orientations; check some of these out in our campaign video, ( or request additional video and image links);
  • Discover new ways to enjoy your favourite vibrator or dildo;
  • The gyral mount allows for natural body movement creating a realistic sexual experience when using a sex toy;
  • The G-Rider maximises vaginal stimulation as well as enhancing G-Spot, clitoral, oral and anal pleasures;
  • It requires no batteries;
  • Is completely waterproof;
  • An optional suction base suitable for the majority of surfaces, wet and dry;
  • Or Freestanding  (so your hands are free to wander!).

 

  

Request a free guide book of tried, tested, and loved positions, The Joys of G-Riding.  So while  your very own G-Rider is being shipped to you lay back and enjoy planning your first position!  

 

 

Our Ride, Your Way

The G-Rider has a full 360° circular rotations that can move to 45° as well as having the ability to ride smoothly up and down. This allows you to determine the motion, speed and direction of your vibrator or dildo. Ride it as sensual or as rough as you desire.

Be Free to Choose

Prepare to get your sex toy or toys out of the closet and enjoy a whole new experience and level of satisfaction. The G-Rider's flexible mount is compatible to most toys allowing you to choose your favorite sex toys and change them easily and as often as you want.

Prototype One connector for the G-Rider has been created to suit the most frequently sold dildos and vibrators.  Whilst it has been designed to be flexible, if you want to be sure pick the perk that will ensure your test ride is the best ride. :-)   

Safe and Eco Friendly

Even though the G-Rider does not enter your body we have insisted on using only the safest materials on the market. Phthalate free, non-toxic, hypoallergenic and 100% medical grade silicone. So good for you and good for the environment - no batteries required.

The G-Rider team considered pleasing not only the people of this planet, but the planet itself. All components of this product were designed to be recyclable . 

 

 

 

Holding any position for more than two minutes while suspended, rear ended, bearing weight at the same time as finding a pleasure point does not get easier with age.  Trust me. So for a lot of us door slings, swings, harnesses, big dongs, little dongs, double dongs often spent most of their life in the darkness of the cupboard.

Over the years our personal collection of ideas and designs were created (home handy person style) to improve the toys and products in our cupboard.   We realised that many of these ideas had the potential to allow others to better utilise their natural gifts, enjoy sex more and not lose confidence because they could not hold a rewarding position for long enough. Or worse, feeling very unsexy because our bodies did not translate as well as the promotional pictures on the internet!

So creating products which help us look and feel sexier, enhance our sexual experiences and increase our general wellbeing is the ethos of our companies humble beginnings. ** And we have lots and lots more designs in the pipeline. **

So here we are. With a working prototype that has been tried and tested, over and over again. All we need now is to add the happy ending…..which is Yours to Have xo.  

 

Get your G-Rider TODAY!  We are selling them through this campaign at a super low price so you can experience first hand what is getting everyone so excited! 

The G-Rider campaign needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest!

If you love this product (or know others that you think will) as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons.  The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. So if you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.  Blog, Tweet, Facebook, Instagram where ever and whenever you can! 

Not only does your generous pledge give you the chance to be one of the first users of a G-Rider it will also assist with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. This funding will also allow us to test and further improve our concept based on your suggestions and feedback. 

This product was not conceived and designed to be a one hit wonder. Funding for this project will also grow a greater vision, in line with our goal of producing body safe sex toys and accessories for real people. The reality is that this funding will assist us to:

  • Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as retail solutions of the G-Rider;
  • Further customize the first version of the G-Rider, such as additional colour, add ons and packaging options;
  • Create additional products and services that will complement The G-Rider.

We need about $70,000   in order to break The G-Rider onto the market. That will include any  product improvements from our backers feedback, product marketing, initialising distribution systems, materials, labour and related expenses for a full production run. This we hope to see happen by May 2017.

Risks and Challenges

A great deal of time has been taken to get everything in place before launching this campaign. To lessen the risk to our backers and reduce our performance anxiety!

We have personally invested as much as we can in order to get this campaign to a point where we believe it is ready, willing and capable, to provide a product to backers within TWO MONTHS.

We have supported 2000 products to a final stage, these will come in an exclusive transparent pink, possibly limited to this campaign only. We have taken the risk to fund the project to this point; as we believe that the support of our backers,who love the G-Rider as much as we do, will assist us in impacting the market place. 

We have a great team in place  to overcome any  obstacles at our final stage,  but there is always the unknown. Our team will face every obstacle with the same tenacity and perseverance that we have from the start.

We respect everyone's privacy and therefore want to make sure that we are supporting your peace of mind.

If you wish to remain anonymous but still want to support our campaign PLEASE make sure that you tick the box that indicates you wish to be ANONYMOUS and only your contribution amount will be shown on the campaign page.

The packaging we use for the G-Rider will be completely discreet. Only you will know ! ;)           

 For those of us who don't like making donations over the internet, please feel free to contact us via our email: trystxo@outlook.com  

We will provide you with a mailing address to send  a check or money order. We will post your contribution amount ONLY on the campaign page. We will deliver your perk in an unidentifiable package, marked only with a return street address and your supplied name and mailing address.

 

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to consider our campaign. Especially for those of you who have decided to be one of the worlds first G-Rider owners.

The last few years have seen us work very hard to bring our passion and vision to life through this campaign. Now, thanks to you our generous supporters, it feels like it has been worth every minute.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. 

We will continue to keep you posted, send you messages and photos! on what your donation has helped us achieve.  You are part of the G-Rider family now!

 

 

If you wish to contact us:

Website: www.g-riders.com

Our Social Media Connections:

Instagram: g_rider_lovers

Twitter: g_rider_lovers

Facebook: g_rider_lovers

Contact Information

Name: Tryst xo Pty Ltd

E Mail: trystxo@outlook.com

 

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you. Please feel free to contact us at   trystxo@outlook.com

Mission

What we are building is a medical records management system embedded with your DNA. Our system creates an unbreakable bond between your records and you as the registered owner of them. You can think of this as digital key and lock. Both the key and the lock are combined into the same device. When you attempt to open the lock it will check your DNA to confirm your identity.

We are building an ecosystem for medical professionals and providers. The idea is your medical professional will suggest you need a scan or xRAY etc. You attend the clinic and they perform the scans, the scans are uploaded to their secure servers and encrypted by your DNA key. Only you can access the scan, you attend your doctor surgery and unlock the report for your doctor or the specialist they then refer to you. All the time, you control who has access and only you have access to your medical reports.

iZAC plan to establish the business over the next 12  months. The project aims are to :

1. Develop an iPhone application to access the records

2. Create the DNA encryption key

3. Build the ecosystem or medical professionals and providers

By investing is our early stage funding we offer to have you join us as investors usually reserved for “Angel investors” or the capital markets. We are offering all contributors to this crowdfunding stage access to the reserved investors pool.

As an additional benefit you will also be invited to the developers forum, where you will be in a position to influence the development team and be rewarded for your efforts.

In summary:

1.      Discounted 400:1 Token price

2.      Initial investor status +15% Token Share

3.      Optional access to the Dev team forum +10% Token Share

Token Distribution to be supplied over the life of the project

story:
My name is Taco Fleur, owner of Cavemantraining. I'm an enthusiastic and passionate kettlebell lifter and also have an interest in CrossFit. My background is IT and I use this to develop solutions for people out in the real world.

You can check some previous projects on Google Play, or my YouTube channel with nearly 30,000 subscribers.

There is nothing more important to me than the correct technique and the right number of reps. Everyone loses track of count sometimes and knows how frustrating this is. I figured it was time to present a solution.

You can be part of the first real rep counter for the smart-phone.

 

The App

This is what it's all about, this is going to make your exercise and training life much easier. Allow me to give you a quick summary of the app, what the basic version will do and what's in store for future versions.

The first and most basic version can be calibrated to count reps, for example, clean and jerk, snatch, swing, clean and press, and it will do that for the kettlebell (V1) and barbell (V2). This on its own is already the most important app you've been waiting for.

The future releases will focus on:

  • counting actual workouts that have different types of exercises
  • reporting missed lifts and allow adding them to the count
  • display RPM
  • record history and graph progress
  • download pre-programmed workouts from Cavemantraining.com
  • integrate with one of the most advanced workout timers available which is only in stage 1 of 4 planned stages https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cavemantraining.variable.workout.timer

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $10,000 to make this happen for the Android and iOS, anything over will get it rolled our faster and with more features.

The app will be sold for approx. $30 or over once it goes live on the store, but if you back $15 minimum now, you will get a copy of the app at half the price, plus you get the opportunity to be part of the beta testers group. The app will also be split into paid and premium, the premium will unlock all features and cost more than the basic app. Fund $20 and you'll get the premium app for life and start getting access to premium features once they are released.

This app is truly the dream of every girevik and crossfitter.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. You can help by getting the word out and make some noise about this campaign with the share tools on this page.

 

Progress

We're currently testing the second prototype for the Android and waiting for more funding to be able to start the iOS version.

story:
PersonalAIR™ START MASK: 

ENGINEERED FOR IMPROVED AIR FILTRATION, COMFORT, AND CONVENIENCE

 An advanced filtration mask augmented with custom-fit facepiece.
 

OUR GOALS, YOUR NEEDS MET

Driven by a passion to create the best solution to the current mask challenges of today, we strive to satisfy three big needs:

1. ENHANCED FILTRATION - A design that conditions the air that you breathe

2. COMFORT - The highest level of comfort possible.

3. CONVENIENCE - Increasing functionality to make it a truly useful tool and platform.

 


 

FOR YOUR FILTRATION 

2x washable particulate filters and 2x N95 filters (one duo for AIR in, and one duo for AIR out) purify the airflow in each direction.

 

FOR YOUR COMFORT

Silicone rubber facepiece is comfortably soft, non-stick and hypo-allergenic. Bespoke facepiece, coming soon, conforms precisely to your face for optimal seal and fit.

Lightweight materials, and off-loading the power cell, allow us to provide the lightest possible full-function mask.

A fully-adjustable, ergonomically-designed neoprene strap.

Fan-assisted airflow for easy natural breathing.

 

FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE

Easy to operate, no complicated set-up.

Runs for more than 8 full hours of constant use.

Seal to face avoids fogging of eyeglasses.

The front and rear covers, face-piece and straps are all washable with dish soap and water. The electronics chassis can be cleaned in a sanitization box.

 

THIS IS A FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE MASK 

Shortly after our initial production run, we will begin to offer various additional features, accessories and benefits:

1. Color choices for front-piece, mask frame, and/or head-straps.

2. Dedications, logos, branding, designs on mask or straps, or laser-etched into the facepiece.

3. Full range of Mask Cozy's.

AND ... unique to Firstwave3D PersonalAIR™ :

A personalized facepiece molded to your facial contours

Later this year, we will post our EZscan iPhone app at the App Store, which will leverage available 3D-facial-scan technology. As a PersonalAIR™ START owner, you will be able to scan your face; the app will enable us to send you a facepiece that is customized precisely to your face. 

Each PersonalAIR™ START unit purchased during this Indiegogo campaign will qualify for a custom-fit facepiece.

 

 

MAKE IT YOUR STYLE 

We are introducing our first design initially available in 2 colors. (Indiegogo perks will be the White on Grey.) Once production and delivery launch in May, we plan to add many more colors, textures, cozy's, and finishes.

The strap clips are chrome-plated aluminum-alloy to provide strength and style. 


 

COMPARISON CHART OF MASK TYPES 

 

YOUR PersonalAIR™ START MASK PACKAGE INCLUDES:

PersonalAIR™ START Mask

Universal Silicone Facepiece

Mask Cozy

Adjustable Strap

USB Cable Assembly

USB-C Battery Bank

Plus - Indiegogo bonus - Coupon for Free Custom-fit Facepiece

 

 

 

The PersonalAIR™ mask includes a battery-bank and mask Cozy.

WHAT'S INSIDE?

All the electronics live on an internal removable chassis which simply lifts out for easy access and cleaning. 

An Atmel microcontroller is at the heart of the PersonalAIR™ START mask.

2x particulate filters, 2x N95 filters (one set for AIR in, and one set for AIR out).

 

2x low-noise speed-adjustable fans assist the airflow.

 

 

 

 
COMPONENTS

We include an Atmel microcontroller in the mask to control various functions. Fan speed is controlled by the processor.  We constantly monitor the internal temperature in software and also in hardware for additional safety.  By including 2x kill switches for added safety, if the fans stop working for any reason, or the internal temperature rises, the system will automatically shut off.

Our Design eliminates the battery as a component within the mask, and places it in your pocket, or snugly worn in a lanyard. This allows us to keep the mask weight as light as possible while providing a high-capacity 10,000mAh  battery-bank, capable of running all the processes and functions for 8+ hours at full power.  The battery connects via a magnetic USB-C connector for safe quick-connect and disconnect.

CONNECTING POWER TO THE MASK VIA USB-C

OUR MASK CAN BE WORN FOR PROFESSIONAL OR PERSONAL USE

If you need to be around others for extended periods of time, the PersonalAIR™ offers conditioning and filtration, understated style, and convenience.


 

INDIEGOGO SPECIALS

 

If you are interested in purchasing more than 50 units please reach out to us for further details.

https://www.firstwave3d.com/form

OUR DESIGN EVOLUTION

 

The following image shows how we evolved the design over 6 months and how it looks today as a production-ready mask.

 

DEVELOPMENT

We thought you would enjoy being a part of our development journey. Here are some images of our prototypes, and how we had to change various items along the way. 

We also learned a lot about breathing, filtration, ultraviolet light, plastics, materials, and much more in order to bring you this seemingly simple product.


 

An average person can breathe up to 6 Liters of air per minute while at rest. That's a lot of air. We breathe in and out. When we breathe out, it's warm and humid...as you continue to breathe, that heat just builds up and makes your mask warmer and soggier... our design included solutions to these engineering challenges.

THE FRONT PANEL

This is replaceable in various colors (after we begin production) and provides access to the filter compartments.

THE REAR VIEW 

The only part of the mask that touches your face is the central facepiece. It will be made of FDA-approved silicone rubber, which conforms against your face for a comfortable fit.

 

 


 

WHY HAVE WE EMBARKED ON THIS JOURNEY?

This is a story that started over 35 years ago when two work colleagues soon after becoming friends, left their McDonnell Douglas roots to pursue very different careers, only to meet again recently.


 

A simple catch-up phone call immediately ignited a creative spark that has sent us both on a new adventure. We are now bringing a unique vision to reality. By applying our decades of experience to solve the current obstacles we’ve observed in the present mask-wearing climate. The more time we have spent on this project, the more we have truly enjoyed the experience culminating in this Indiegogo campaign. 


 

So, we have arrived at the point that we need your help to accelerate our ability to produce this advanced mask solution.


 

THE TEAM

We have established our team over time and space. Knowing each other for over 35 years and working across 8 time zones. That takes a lot of coordination and attention to detail to deliver this unique product.

https://www.firstwave3d.com/about/
story_txt:
PersonalAIR™ START MASK: ENGINEERED FOR IMPROVED AIR FILTRATION, COMFORT, AND CONVENIENCE An advanced filtration mask augmented with custom-fit facepiece. OUR GOALS, YOUR NEEDS METDriven by a passion to create the best solution to the current mask challenges of today, we strive to satisfy three big needs:1. ENHANCED FILTRATION - A design that conditions the air that you breathe2. COMFORT - The highest level of comfort possible.3. CONVENIENCE - Increasing functionality to make it a truly useful tool and platform.  FOR YOUR FILTRATION 2x washable particulate filters and 2x N95 filters (one duo for AIR in, and one duo for AIR out) purify the airflow in each direction. FOR YOUR COMFORT Silicone rubber facepiece is comfortably soft, non-stick and hypo-allergenic. Bespoke facepiece, coming soon, conforms precisely to your face for optimal seal and fit.Lightweight materials, and off-loading the power cell, allow us to provide the lightest possible full-function mask.A fully-adjustable, ergonomically-designed neoprene strap.Fan-assisted airflow for easy natural breathing. FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE Easy to operate, no complicated set-up.Runs for more than 8 full hours of constant use.Seal to face avoids fogging of eyeglasses.The front and rear covers, face-piece and straps are all washable with dish soap and water. The electronics chassis can be cleaned in a sanitization box. THIS IS A FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE MASK Shortly after our initial production run, we will begin to offer various additional features, accessories and benefits:1. Color choices for front-piece, mask frame, and/or head-straps.2. Dedications, logos, branding, designs on mask or straps, or laser-etched into the facepiece.3. Full range of Mask Cozy's.AND ... unique to Firstwave3D PersonalAIR™ :A personalized facepiece molded to your facial contoursLater this year, we will post our EZscan iPhone app at the App Store, which will leverage available 3D-facial-scan technology. As a PersonalAIR™ START owner, you will be able to scan your face; the app will enable us to send you a facepiece that is customized precisely to your face. Each PersonalAIR™ START unit purchased during this Indiegogo campaign will qualify for a custom-fit facepiece.  MAKE IT YOUR STYLE We are introducing our first design initially available in 2 colors. (Indiegogo perks will be the White on Grey.) Once production and delivery launch in May, we plan to add many more colors, textures, cozy's, and finishes.The strap clips are chrome-plated aluminum-alloy to provide strength and style.  COMPARISON CHART OF MASK TYPES  YOUR PersonalAIR™ START MASK PACKAGE INCLUDES: PersonalAIR™ START MaskUniversal Silicone FacepieceMask CozyAdjustable StrapUSB Cable AssemblyUSB-C Battery BankPlus - Indiegogo bonus - Coupon for Free Custom-fit Facepiece   The PersonalAIR™ mask includes a battery-bank and mask Cozy.WHAT'S INSIDE?All the electronics live on an internal removable chassis which simply lifts out for easy access and cleaning. An Atmel microcontroller is at the heart of the PersonalAIR™ START mask.2x particulate filters, 2x N95 filters (one set for AIR in, and one set for AIR out). 2x low-noise speed-adjustable fans assist the airflow.


 


 
 


 
COMPONENTS

We include an Atmel microcontroller in the mask to control various functions. Fan speed is controlled by the processor.  We constantly monitor the internal temperature in software and also in hardware for additional safety.  By including 2x kill switches for added safety, if the fans stop working for any reason, or the internal temperature rises, the system will automatically shut off.Our Design eliminates the battery as a component within the mask, and places it in your pocket, or snugly worn in a lanyard. This allows us to keep the mask weight as light as possible while providing a high-capacity 10,000mAh  battery-bank, capable of running all the processes and functions for 8+ hours at full power.  The battery connects via a magnetic USB-C connector for safe quick-connect and disconnect.CONNECTING POWER TO THE MASK VIA USB-COUR MASK CAN BE WORN FOR PROFESSIONAL OR PERSONAL USEIf you need to be around others for extended periods of time, the PersonalAIR™ offers conditioning and filtration, understated style, and convenience. INDIEGOGO SPECIALS  If you are interested in purchasing more than 50 units please reach out to us for further details.https://www.firstwave3d.com/formOUR DESIGN EVOLUTION The following image shows how we evolved the design over 6 months and how it looks today as a production-ready mask. DEVELOPMENTWe thought you would enjoy being a part of our development journey. Here are some images of our prototypes, and how we had to change various items along the way. We also learned a lot about breathing, filtration, ultraviolet light, plastics, materials, and much more in order to bring you this seemingly simple product. An average person can breathe up to 6 Liters of air per minute while at rest. That's a lot of air. We breathe in and out. When we breathe out, it's warm and humid...as you continue to breathe, that heat just builds up and makes your mask warmer and soggier... our design included solutions to these engineering challenges.THE FRONT PANELThis is replaceable in various colors (after we begin production) and provides access to the filter compartments.THE REAR VIEW The only part of the mask that touches your face is the central facepiece. It will be made of FDA-approved silicone rubber, which conforms against your face for a comfortable fit.   WHY HAVE WE EMBARKED ON THIS JOURNEY?This is a story that started over 35 years ago when two work colleagues soon after becoming friends, left their McDonnell Douglas roots to pursue very different careers, only to meet again recently. A simple catch-up phone call immediately ignited a creative spark that has sent us both on a new adventure. We are now bringing a unique vision to reality. By applying our decades of experience to solve the current obstacles we’ve observed in the present mask-wearing climate. The more time we have spent on this project, the more we have truly enjoyed the experience culminating in this Indiegogo campaign.  So, we have arrived at the point that we need your help to accelerate our ability to produce this advanced mask solution. THE TEAMWe have established our team over time and space. Knowing each other for over 35 years and working across 8 time zones. That takes a lot of coordination and attention to detail to deliver this unique product.https://www.firstwave3d.com/about/

story:
Introduction of RockRooster

RockRooster wireless EMS training suit features the cutting-edge Body-Suitable technology. It works through sending the medium / low pulse current to the accurate muscle groups by a whole electrode. It can help you achieve different exercising goals at anytime and anywhere.

 

RockRooster is made of High-elastic and compressed fabrics, which get rid of the sticky wear experience by excellent breathability and moisture-penetrability.

 

Customize your personal training plan through the APP, smart EMS Pro can record your exercising data, and offer the most suitable training plan for you.

 

The smart EMS system

RockRooster wireless EMS training suit is seamlessly integration, the smart box monitors can analyze your physical condition and then gathers the data from the APP to design your personal fitness plan.

 

You can choose a variety of exercise goals based on your needs, such as losing weight, improving endurance and building muscle. This app contains almost all professional training courses.

 

The powerful Smart box

The Smart Box contains the latest electronic solution, including data processing for up to 10 projects and 20 gears, the 300mAh battery keeps the product running for more than 60 minutes.

 

The resilience fabric

With high resilience, the fabric ensures the comfortability of wearing and makes sure it is fit enough to workout.

 

Conductive fabric offers the softness and malleability, it also provides the electrical properties. Due to the nature of the material, we recommend wash by hand.

 

How it works?

 

The most efficient training with RockRooster

After wearing the RockRooster, the heart rate is well improved. As the Smart Box starts running, the current is sent through the conductive silver fiber to all parts of the RockRooster. The conductive massage will drive the exercise in the conductive position to achieve fat reduction, promote blood circulation, muscle exercise and other purposes.

 

Workout anytime and anywhere

With RockRooster wireless EMS training suit, you can do any sport you like whatever is high-intensity or not. No limitation for place and gym equipment, exercise anytime anywhere.

 

Rewards

 

RockRooster Size Chart

 

Specification

 

R&D and Manufacturing

About RockRooster

RockRooster specializes in R & D, production and sales of fabric electrode clothing and flexible sensor electrodes.The EMS muscle stimulation technology provides a completely new way of training. This innovation is unprecedented in the training sector and we are continuously iterating and moving forward. We believe this is the way to the future.

Our products are sold in more than 20 countries and regions globally across China, Hong Kong, and Southeast Asia, Australia, Middle East, Africa, Europe etc.

 

Timeline

story:
A few years ago, I gave up my search on off-the-shelf skincare products and started making instead.  I fell in love with the Every Night Oil (now known as Every Day Oil for branding alignment purpose)  that I have made. So did my friends, their friends and many more. I started teaching and customized cream to treat individual with skin problem such as acne, eczema and hives.   I strongly believes that they need a safe, effective shower gel with lesser ingredients. This is a basic foundation for a healthy skin. 

Therefore, I took time to research on cleanser and I am extremely satisfy with Every Day Facial Wash - a 2 in 1 makeup cum dirt cleanser.  A facial wash with simple natural ingredients that doesn't stripe natural moisture from the skin.  

The Impact

I had been operating from https://www.aliciahandmade.com for years and recently moved to https://www.allaboutalicia.com for better eCommerce platform management.  On top of that, I took the opportunity to align the packaging and branding to gain better recognition from the consumers.  I used to provide one on one lesson or a small class but I am planning to record these lessons into video and upload on youtube to share with a bigger audience.  

We have launched the 3 products in Singapore since early March and reviews from customers are extremely encouraging. The compliments have certainly boosted our confidence and given us courage to venture to the rest of the world. 

I choose not to have shareholders or investor as I like to stay true to my belief - Handcrafted Simple Honest Skincare.  I have spent a lot of time, money and effort to test the formula. The fund raised is to speed up my next product development. The fund will be used to develop:

  • Children Shower Gel
  • Adult Shower Gel
  • Shampoo

Depending on the amount raised but the product will be according to sequence shown above. 

I believe that a good product begins with good ingredient.  Not all skincare are created equal and what distinguishes my skincare product is it has much fewer ingredients than traditional commercially produced skincare.   I try to obtain as much from naturally occurring materials as possible.  To me less is more.  I like to do away fillers, unnecessary suds and nice texture that is created synthetically.

If you hold the same belief as me, let me invite you to give my skincare product a try.  I am sure you will feel the difference.

 

Items in the Perks

 

There are many ways you can support us:

  1. Fund it
  2. Tell your friends about us by sharing Indiegogo Ad and join the reference program to earn a free set.  Find out the steps at  https://www.facebook.com/byallaboutalicia/ 
  3. #everydayseries
  4. Visit www.allaboutalicia.com and tell us how you feel about us.
  5. Follow us on https://www.facebook.com/byallaboutalicia/

 

Thank you so much for helping us in any possible way!

story:
Introducing WellShift:

WellShift is an app that pairs with your wearable or works alone and uses advanced biofeedback technology and cognitive behavioral therapy principles to help you regulate your emotions, 'The coach in your pocket.' And it does NOT replace mental health care.

WellShift has two main types of inputs; natural language through app journey and vital signs like heart rate, heart rate variability, skin conductance level through a wearable (optional input). 

After gathering inputs, it processes them to define your emotional states, wellbeing, resilience, productivity, abnormalities on your vitals or states. 

 

SO, HOW DOES IT HELP? 

Based on your states and reports, WellShift gives you action items to cope with the situation; it's an affordable self-regulation tool that aligns with your rhythmic behavior through fun, science-based, proofed activities.  

 

Here is the journey that we want to provide:

1. WellShift captures your vital signs from your wearable like Fitbit, Xiaomi, Huawei. 

                                                       i.e., Fitbit, Xiaomi, Huawei

2.  You interact with WellShift through a human-centric journey. 

                                                                     A gamified Journey

3.  Your data are gathered and processed using our Emotion AI engine to provide insights about your vitals,  emotional status, resilience, and others.  Here are some insights by WellShift.

 

                                                        Insight no.1: Resilience & Vitals

 

                                                   Insight no. 2: Emotions & Check-ins

4. WellShift provides you with action items to cope with tough emotions and build your emotional agility, like connecting with support groups,  exercising, meditation, journaling, and others. 


                                  Action item 1: Connecting with support groups

                                                           Action item 2: Meditation

                                                             Action item 3: Exercising

WellShift app will be available in Arabic ;)

 

 

What has been done?

After the in-lab validation of the engine, we created four journeys of WellShift, as displayed below. 
 

                                                    WellShift journey - Trial no. 1

p.s. Check other journeys here. 


About me and my journey:
 

It began as research to spread awareness and build advocacy about mental health and emotional agility through conferences, practical, fun activities, and enabling technology like the WellShift app. 

We shared our vision at IBM Cognitive Summit, Gitex Dubai, the Arab Innovation Award, the Arab AI summit,  among others. Then we started a fellowship with the Royal Academy of Engineering in the Leaders in Innovation Fellowship program to commercialize the innovation.  
 


 How do people see us? 

1. Viren Lall, Managing Director at Change School Academy 

 

2. Neil Marshall, Development Director at Change School Academy  

 

 3. Larimar's champions.

 

4. Article from Ms. Natasha Tracy, a renowned mental health speaker, author, educator, consultant, and writer. You can find it here. 

How we plan to make it happen? 

 

By integrating the engine with WellShift while building the journey with YOU :)

By the end of the project development period, you'll receive your reward and contribute to a social cause that is crucial for all of us, especially at this uncertain time. 

 

 Why are we raising funds on Indiegogo?

We want to make this service available to anyone looking for a resilient, fulfilled life, and in doing so, we need to co-create the journey with you then vet it with our advocates (YOU!). 

Completing the development requires funds and supporters to help us deliver optimal results, which is where you fit in ;)

 

How are we going to spend the money? 

Mainly in research, design, development & deployment of the app. Of course, this needs more talents to work on the project, so expanding the team is another spending path. Check out our Kickstarter page to know more about the budget.

This campaign builds on the previous one to maximize our network of backers and delivering a tailored service. 

 

What's in it for you? 

You can find details in the perks section. We have one perk available now that includes:

  - A thank you letter that includes Abeer's message and a photo (made for YOU) from Wadi Rum. Here are some samples ;)

- A three-month membership of WellShift - beta with all its plans and features. 
- Your name will be listed on WellShift - beta. 

 

The science behind the technology:

Emotion AI, cognitive behavioral therapy, neuroscience, and heart-brain coherence are the building blocks of Larimar (the parent startup of WellShift).

We published six papers and a book through Larimar's development course and participated in 15 scientific and entrepreneurial conferences. To know more about us, check out Abeer's ResearchGate profile.

 

Larimar's emotion induction lab:

Our lab is where the magic happens! We have been able to collect 1040 emotion records. Each of them has 10 vital signs, so 10400 real data streams are measured in Larimar's induction lab. 

                                                Lab Champions: Lina, Adel, Sanad, Zaid, Ali, and Abeer
 

                                Discussing how we can reduce data collection errors   
 

 Join our cause: 

We want to provide YOU with interfaces that illustrate the influence of love, kindness, and civil, constructive culture for individuals, communities, and organizations.

Larimar’s wellbeing quiz and the provided transformational materials form the baseline tool for this cause, so use it, and let’s spread the cause. 

Check out our social channels, Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube, to connect with us. Of course,  this will make you an ambassador for Larimar's technology and an advocate for a noble cause.

 Our Progress:

It was an exciting journey with many delightful and challenging moments. Here is a sneak preview of what we have achieved till now:


Future Plans:


Our ultimate goal:

We want to equip you with ease and resilience throughout your daily life by becoming more present and active.  The success of this goal depends on your support to complete the development of the app and co-create the journey with YOU :)

story:
About

       

            As experts and new research indicated above, that Cardio & Dieting, will not tighten your waist, burn calories 24 hour per day, burn belly fat, stop body aging and it only requires minutes with total CORE STRENGTHENING. There has been no Core/Ab machine until now that will tighten all Core/Ab 46 waist muscles versus just the front 6 pack. You may ask why it had taken 18 years to complete the First Smart Total Core Gym, it takes much more time to pursue a solution to a problem like Low Back pain and Sarcopenia ( body aging starting at age 25), than just designing a common exercise machine. Research has shown that a few minutes of strength training impacts over 179 genes to a more youthful level, "10 YEARS "YOUNGER" than sedentary individual's; which can result in a 10-30 younger tighter healthier body, based on anti-aging experts. 

Consider weight strengthening "the mother of all weight-loss techniques" SELF MAGAZINE

The Core 46 $1 million guarantee establishing that the Core 46 unit is the best Portable home core/Ab product in the world, offering $1 million challenge promotion to any Core/Ab/Belly Fat/Low Back Strengthening product or company that can in one exercise strengthen over 46 core muscles within 4 minutes more effective than the Core 46.

The challenge was to combine four $3,000 GYM Ab/Spine/Arm/Back core machines and 2 resistance stacks into one portable unit, that would strengthen all 46 core muscles that surrounds the waist compared to just strengthening the front 6 pack Ab muscles.

To fulfill this challenge, we spent 4 years to complete real university peer reviewed JOURNAL PUBLISHED studies, 9 years to complete 36 issued global patents and 7 years design and engineering. Body Core architecture & strength is your most priceless health asset for wellness, youthful appearance and performance, yet 80% of the population do not strength train, primarily due to a lack of time, knowledge, cost and availability of a portable product that really works. The Core 46 compact Maverick unit is our solution for the consumer market, that's nearly completed and has never been offered in the market.

New life changing fitness research has emerged in the last few years, so we are passionate about communicating information that is scientifically based to improve your health and workout. Now we need your backing to finish the last stage of manufacturing and fulfill our passion to fight Sarcopenia and Low Back pain.

Research has shown that a few minutes of strength training impacts 179 genes to a more youthful level, "10 YEARS YOUNGER" than sedentary individual's; anti-aging experts concluded that body aging can be stopped maintaining a body of a 30 year old into your 50's,60's, 70's; with core resistance training.

The Core 46 activates the deeper muscles of the Ab, Spine, Back & Core muscles that no other gym or fitness machine can accomplish, based on the power of 2 resistance stacks and combining 4 core gym machines into one unit. Because the Core 46 works the deeper girdle core muscles, women will have sexier tighter hour glass appearance and men a V-shape, without the bulky appearance.

Core 46 is the FIRST AND ONLY TOTAL CORE MACHINE TO EFFECTIVELY IMPACT PERMANENT BODY AGING THAT begins at age 25, strength training all 46 core, Ab, Spine, Back muscles completely around the waist. ANTI-BODY AGING BEGINS IMMEDIATELY and within 30-60 days new body composition scupting occurs, resulting in a younger, healthier and tighter waist and body for both men and women; IN ONE 4 MINUTE WORKOUT COMPARABLE TO A 50 MINUTE GYM WORKOUT.

CORE 46 ONE MINUTE CHALLENGE

Core 46 changes the minds of the toughest & most skeptical weight lifters in Los Angeles in only 1 minute !!! The Core 46 is so effective & innovative has been pursued by professional sports teams as the Ram's & Lakers, celebrities and the medical/science community.

https://vimeo.com/250205381/63e16c3f09

FIND OUT IF YOUR WORKOUT IS ENOUGH TO FIGHT SARCOPENIA OR BODY AGING?

If you're 25 or over and not strength training or just doing cardio, your core is rapidly aging losing 16 oz of muscle permanently per year, immediately replaced by fat, loss of bone, decreased sports performance and impacting 15 other wellness areas.

Sarcopenia, is ranked #1 out of the 10 bio-markers of aging as gray hair or wrinkling. Aging from the neck down is avoidable; click the video to find out if your cardio, yoga or current workout is enough to stop body aging or Sarcopenia . FIND OUT CLICK VIDEO

Eric Dickerson has been approached by dozens of fitness products, the Core 46 is the first they were willing to endorse.

Risks and challenges

Core XT 46 athletic unit is totally completed, passing all 32 SGS quality and chemical test. We had a small quantity manufactured in 2017 to test with professional athletes and web sites, resulting in 5 star reviews. The web market test indicated the need for a lower cost more compact travel unit that would accommodate the needs of the consumer market as oppose to just the athletic market.

The Core 46 compact maverick unit is our solution for the consumer market, that's nearly completed and has never been offered in the market. All units that were illustrated and on video were built from our production line. We are ready to finalize manufacturing, in order to meet all estimated delivery times.

Dr. Arnel and his research team has submitted a proposal for starting the University study for peer review journal publication, that will benefit all backers in regards to establishing optimal exercise effectiveness when using the Core 46. The study will start 30 days after the campaign has ended.

Forecasting Risk

Though we have learned a great deal from finalizing our Core XT 46 manufacturing and have partnered with some of the best companies, our forecast may not hit its projected timeframe. If we miss a timeline, we will inform you of the circumstances and resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risks

In Manufacturing there are unexpected delays that can develop as supply or component shortages, fortunately we have a staff that has a great deal of experience in manufacturing. If a timeline is delayed we will update all backers and resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Terms and Conditions

Backers with international addresses, who elect to pre-pay their shipping, duties and taxes will have their rewards fulfilled by our Freight agent or international partners, acting as our undisclosed agent on our behalf for distribution of our products when backed via Kickstarter and shipped to an international address. Eu and Uk backers will have units shipped from our EU warehouse, reducing shipping cost.

Between 2004 - 2008 the company product had a name change from Ab-1 to Core 46.

story:
NEXShot Pro is a patent-pending Short Game Solution to help you improve your short game from home by focusing on one goal - landing your shots on the board.  

B

The purpose of the NEXShot Pro is to help you lock in your aim, distance, and trajectories for whatever type of short game shot you're hitting.  We achieve that by having you

1) Focus on landing your shots in the Target Landing Zone. 

2) Improve your aim with the First Bounce Alignment Cup

3) Keep your shots on the board.

Once you master all 3 aspects, we guarantee you'll hit your next shot closer to the hole. 

 


 

 

 

| Land your shots

It seems easy enough, but most amateur golfers can't consistently hit their landing spot on approach shots, and either leave it short or long.  Practicing on the NEXShot Pro allows you to lock in your aim, distance, and trajectory for any distance you choose.  The Alignment cup is mainly for low running bump and run type shots.  For flop shots, just focus on hitting it high and landing it soft.

 

 

  

Most amateurs golfers stick with 1 club when it comes to chipping and just hit.  The reality is, you should choose your club based on the situation you're in to help set you up for a short putt.  The NEXShot Pro is a great way to test out different scenarios at home so that you're prepared the next time you're out.

story:
Have you ever had sore muscles, sports injuries, or tense shoulders after a workout or a tiring day? A massage gun might just change your life.

 

A Massage gun relieves muscle soreness and stiffness, accelerates recovery, and increases blood and lymphatic flow, and can help you achieve better sleep.

 

 

Normal massage guns are noisy and they tire your wrist easily during use. Not to mention, 60% of the available massage guns are not powerful enough to reach deeper tissue layers. OPOVE Apex solves all those issues.

 

Our team collected more than 2000+ feedback responses from our previous users. Based on their suggestions, we created Apex, our next-gen massage gun.

 

 

Have you ever had an uncomfortable massage when using a normal massage gun? With our unique 45º holding angle design, you can massage your neck and back easily. This position is more comfortable for your wrist and provides the perfect angle for a better massage experience.

 

Normal massage guns are very heavy and tire your hand when using them. With our force-assisted technology, the massage gun uses its own weight to help massage your sore muscles with less fatigue of your hand.

 

With our patent and ergonomic design, Apex manages to centralize the weight into your palm without creating any strain on your Wrist & finger. You can even hold the massage gun without grabbing it. OPOVE Apex, created to bring you the easiest self-massage experience you have ever had.

 

70% of massage guns on the market are louder than car noise. So we created the world’s quietest massage gun, Apex. With OPOVE Quiet glide technology, Apex’s highest noise level is the other massage gun’s lowest noise level.

 

Amplitude is a very important indicator of a good massage gun. It is the key for a massage gun to reach the fascial layer of our muscles. Apex’s 14.5mm amplitude reaches the fascial layer deeper than 60% of other massagers.

 

Apex’s Powerful Brushless High-Torque Motor gives a range of 35-50lbs stall force. Stall force is the amount of force that can be applied to a device before the motor stalls. With a wide range of stall forces, you can massage at any level you want.

 

Our team noticed that an accurate track massage gun is very important for increasing the speed of muscle recovery. So we created Apex, the most accurate massage gun on the market. A higher speed (RPM) does not mean better muscle recovery. Higher and unstable speeds might even damage your muscles. Apex’s stable 1800 to 2700 RPM speed makes it the most ideal massager for both daily muscle relaxation and deep percussion treatment.

 

You will never drop Apex when using it. OPOVE Apex’s full coverage frosted design brings a futuristic appeal. The anti-slip silicone handle provides a safe and comfortable experience during use. Your massage gun will never slip from your hand, even when it is working at the highest speed.

 

Want to see the inside of the product? We got you. The exquisite see-through design reveals not only the OPOVE Powerful Brushless High-Torque Motor, but it also puts soothing rhythmic motion on display.

 

Opove=Optimize+Love. Opove is a China-based team that has revolutionized the massage gun industry over the years as designers, marketers, and production experts. We dedicate ourselves to developing the best quality massage gun products that free the health industry from pain.

story:
Backpacks always feel light in the morning. But by the time you're handed your morning coffee, or are waiting for the metro, or are on mile 0.2 of your hike, you realize your bag feels heavy — meaning your muscles are already tired or strained.

Strain is a stretching or tearing of your muscles or tendons. Doing this day in and day out causes serious damage. 

 

SuperStraps is a beautifully engineered, minimalist gadget you can retrofit on your favorite everyday backpack to…

  • Instantly relieve shoulder, back and neck tension when your bag gets heavy 
  • Make your backpack actually feel lighter 
  • Convert it to an ergonomic carry so you can walk with great posture

It’s important because 80% of us have or will have back and neck pain in our lives, and when you’re in pain it stops you from doing what you love. SuperStraps both protects and relieves you, depending on your state.

 

 

Now we need you. 

You don’t need to live in pain, and you shouldn’t. It’s completely in your reach. Plus, good posture affects your productivity, your health, your happiness. Back our project right now to bring SuperStraps to life and to join our truly amazing community of backers from 115 countries. We are all on a journey to a better back together. Join us.

story:
Short Summary

  • Hi, my name is Rijul Garg and I am a rising junior at Polytechnic High School. As a member of the middle class in the United States, I have always had whatever I needed whenever I needed it. My life has been full of different opportunities and experiences that I hold because people around me, in my community, want me to grow as an individual. This privilege I have has grown increasingly apparent to me in recent years and has steered me towards engaging in activities that help me give back to my community. Although this story is a well-worn cliche, I truly feel personally about this specific project because of my first-hand experience with the situation. 
  • The project I am raising funds for will help children living in the slums of Ahmedabad, a city in western India, by providing them with an area to exercise and have fun. During my several trips to India, I have seen children as young as 4 years old on the sides of intersections begging for money and peddling cheap goods. This project will take these children off the streets and put them an environment in which they can feel safe, express themselves, and build relationships. 
  • Due to immense overpopulation in India, poverty is a huge issue. The magnitude of this problem is too great for any one person to deal with so I hope to just deal with a small part; for me, anything that I can do to improve a poverty-stricken child's life makes a positive difference. As sports are another passion of mine, whether it be running, tennis, or soccer, combining service with the creation of an athletic complex is the perfect project in my mind. Sports teach children how to fight through obstacles, how to work together while also allowing them to simply have pure fun.

Project Overview
  • The funds raised will be given to the  non-profit organization Manav Sadhna, which is running the project. The organization's website can be found here: (http://www.manavsadhna.org/default.aspx). Manav Sadhna began as group motivated by Gandhi's ideals that provided food and lessons in  basic hygiene to children living in slums around their ashram in Ahmedabad. Now it has expanded to an entire facitily that provides lodging, food, and education to hundreds of slum families. At the same time, Manav Sadhna runs other projects that promote creativity in children.
  • Because of factors such as overpopulation, there are rarely areas to play sports in India, especially in urban areas like Ahmedabad. This project will provide an  accessible and well-equipped place for children to play a variety of sports. Manav Sadhna has obtained a plot of land from the Gandhi Ashram Trust and is developing a modern facility which will include a basketball court, an equipment room, a volleyball court, multiple badminton courts, and a field for soccer. Many athletic and talented children are part of Manav Sadhna and this facility will nurture their talent and encourage them to reach their full potential.
  • The facility will be built on  3,700 square foot plot of land. At any given time, the facility can hold almost 100 children. The plan for the facility has been laid out by a well-known Indian architect and the entire plot of land is utilized efficiently and effectively. 
  • Regardless of whether the funding goal is met, any proceeds raised will go directly into building the sports field.

The Impact
  • Funds given to this project will go directly to finishing the construction of the sports field as well as providing equipment and coaching for the children. Please remember, even a couple dollars donated could help buy a brand new soccer ball for a child who rarely gets to have fun.
  • This project is both unique and powerful. Many of you are no doubt living in developed countries such as the United States in which we rarely see children on the streets. Therefore not much attention is brought to child poverty and homelessness. This project not only does this but gives a concrete solution to the problem. Additionally, by contributing, you could make a huge difference in a child's life. Maybe the money you provide helps a child take refuge in sports and exit the destructive cycle of poverty of his or her parents. Maybe your money will simply provide happiness to a child who desperately needs it. Any donation is appreciated.
  • Besides the help you are giving the children, knowing that you have improved the life in someone in need has a positive impact on you too. The motto of Manav Sadhna is "Love all, serve all." Don't view your donation as simply giving away charity but rather as an opportunity to make an impact on a community in need as well as yourself.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you do not wish to contribute funds to the project, please help by sharing this project with your friends and family and spreading the word. Even just telling one person about the sports field can have an impact. Also, please help support Manav Sadhna through a donation at a later time or just bringing attention to them and their other projects. Please find it in your heart to help improve the lives of underprivileged children in any way you can. “It's the action, not the fruit of the action, that's important. You have to do the right thing. It may not be in your power, may not be in your time, that there'll be any fruit. But that doesn't mean you stop doing the right thing. You may never know what results come from your action. But if you do nothing, there will be no result.” -Mahatma Gandhi
