story:
(La campaña en español se encuentra más abajo)


                                   Welcome! I'm Javi, a spanish guy living in Scotland.

I've developed my own training method to improve your health and skills investing the least amount of time and interruption in your daily life.

My aim is to offer this knowledge in an affordable online course.



After studying a degree in Sports Science, and devoting over 12 years to understand the basics of health and physical abilities, I've realised that sports can be done in a efficient and harmonious way that won't injure or consume your body over time.

For the last few years, I've coached different sport practitioners, and I've realised that this method works for people of all ages and kinds.

It can be practiced by itself or as a complement to improve your current physical activity, and will help you develop a 'Versatile Body'. A body that can swiftly adapt from the needs of one activity to the needs of another. 




                                  The Course 


My method to training your body can be compared to a 'dietary supplement' which will allow you to reach higher levels and perform over a longer period of time.

There are 5 core elements to avoid injuries and be able to constantly overcome your physical barriers. Each core element has been divided into 7 games.
 

Course Content:

  • Seven Coordination Games 

  • Seven Fluidity Games

  • Seven Strength Games

  • Seven Functionality Games

  • Seven Versatility Games

  • Circular Training Guide


-Increasing Coordination will make your decision making faster and more accurate during exercise.

-By training Fluidity, you will achieve a greater effectivity in the kinetic chain ( the connection of one joint to the next one) and therefore greater speed.

-Strength, means muscle strength which stabilizes the body when moving, and  determines how powerful and effective you start or stop a movement.

-Functionality exercises promote the proper functioning of the body structures (e.g. The spinal chord), and help prevent and recover from injury.

-Versatility means the ability to adapt to an exercise, as well as how creative, varied and free you are able to move.


Each game consists of a combination of specific exercises, diagrams and information. Allowing you to quickly understand the "hack" that allows you to progress in each element. You'll evolve by understanding rather than imitating.

The Circular Training Guide helps you easily adapt your training to your daily life. It will help you keep record of what you have already achieved, and what to do in your next session.

The different games can be played for 5 minutes each, in 5 periods throughout the day. Playing for 7 days will complete a cycle of the course. For every cycle you complete you will improve and balance your 'Pentagon of Skills'.

 


All the basic elements of your body are interdependent. When practicing in an integral way, improving one means improving the rest.  The body works as a whole!  

The course is structured like a game rather than a formal training course. Through play we develop the habit of practicing the basic elements in the most effective and fun way. Playing is the essence of sport!

" We are what we repeatedly do, Greatness is not an act but a habit ". -Plato



  The Campaign


The campaign sum of  £15,000 will go towards producing a compelling course to cover the following costs: 

  • Video Production and Editing 
  • Drawings and Diagrams
  • Course Programming
  • Translations
  •  Website

The course would mostly be in a video format, along with texts and diagrams to understand what to do and what happens in your body when you do them.  

The plan is to initially produce a course that can be downloaded onto your computer or be used on line. 

I believe the course needs to be fresh, youthful and inspiring for children and adults to enjoy using and learning from it.

In case we don't reach our campaign target, we will nevertheless produce the course and fit it to the budget. The information and exercises would be the same, but the course's user friendliness and presentation would be affected.



                                      My Journey


Personally, I have always challenged myself to overcome my physical limitations. 
Because of my attitude to life; enjoying the present moment rather than over planning or controlling it. I fit my passion for sports and physical practices into my daily life: as a student, whilst traveling, whilst working and now as father.

Practicing over the years, I have realised that it is possible to constantly overcome the bodies limits. Creating a sense of evolution.

This progression motivates me to keep pushing and inspires me to share how. 
 As a result, I feel charged with purpose and vitality in life.




The Project


This course is part of a wider project to inspire and educate people how to use and care for their bodies.  
All money we raise after we hit our campaign target will go towards two key areas I think will help propel this method to the general public. 
1) I'd wish to personally tour schools, starting in Scotland, to inspire children. As part of the tour I want to give away happy sacks so that  children can already start playing one core element (leg coordination). 
My personal hope is that they will get in groups, nudge each other to play and overcome their boundaries, care for their bodies while having fun.

I believe that the younger generations who apply this method will tap into their potential and reach levels that previous generations have not been able to. The evolution of sport lies with them!


 


2) I would like to work with either the University of Granada or Marseille and make a scientifically rigorous study using around 20 athletes from different sports, to see the effects of this method on their bodies and performances over a period of 1,  3, 6  and 12 months.  



Contributing to this campaign will mean my personal dream of making the course available to a great number of people will come true.
A balanced body means a fulfilling life! 


If you care, please share!

                                              



Bienvenido! Soy Javi, un español viviendo en Escocia.

He desarrollado un método de entrenamiento parar aumentar la salud y la destreza física, invirtiendo un mínimo de tiempo y cambios en el día a día.

Mi propósito es ofrecer este conocimiento en un formato online asequible.

 


Tras estudiar Ciencias del Deporte y dedicar más de 12 años a comprender las bases de la salud y las habilidades físicas, creo que el deporte y la actividad física pueden practicarse de manera eficaz y armoniosa, evitando lesiones y el desgaste del cuerpo.

Durante los últimos años, he enseñado a diferentes practicantes de actividades físicas y me he dado cuenta de que este método funciona para todo tipo de personas y edades.

Puede ser practicado por sí mismo o como complemento para mejorar cualquier actividad física que realices, ayudándote a desarrollar un 'Cuerpo Versátil'. Un cuerpo que se adapta rápidamente a cualquier práctica deportiva. 




 

El Curso


Este método de entrenamiento físico podría ser comparada a un 'suplemento dietético', el cual  te permite rendir a niveles más elevados y durante más años.

He simplificado éste al máximo, de manera que pueda ser comprendido y aplicado por niños de unos 10 años, pasando por deportistas de élite, hasta personas mayores.  

Hay 5 elementos básicos para evitar lesiones y poder superar constantemente los límites del cuerpo. Cada uno ha sido dividido en 7 juegos.

Contenido del curso:


  • Siete Juegos de Coordinación

  • Siete Juegos de Fluidez

  • Siete Juegos de Fuerza

  • Siete Juegos de Funcionalidad

  • Siete Juegos de Versatilidad

  • Guía de Entrenamiento Circular 


-Mediante el incremento de la Coordinación se agiliza la toma de decisiones durante el ejercicio, así como la precisión de éstas.

-Entrenando la Fluidez se consigue eficacia en las cadenas cinéticas (transición del movimiento de una articulación a la siguiente), y así  aumentar la velocidad.

-La Fuerza muscular es clave en la estabilidad del cuerpo durante los movimientos, así como en la  potencia y eficacia para frenar un movimiento e iniciar uno nuevo.

-Los ejercicios de Funcionalidad favorecen el correcto funcionamiento de las estructuras  corporales, así como la prevención y recuperación de lesiones.

-La Versatilidad determina la capacidad de adaptación ante el ejercicio demandado, así como la creatividad, libertad y variedad de movimientos. 


Cada juego consiste en una combinación de vídeos tutoriales, diagramas, ilustraciones e información que te permite rápidamente comprender "el truco" que posibilita la progresión en cada elemento. Así puedes progresar mediante la comprensión en lugar de la imitación.

La guía de Entrenamiento Circular ha sido especialmente desarrollada para permitir adaptar tu práctica a tu día cotidiano. Te ayudará a tener un registro de lo que has hecho y una guía de lo que deberías practicar en tu próxima sesión.

Los distintos juegos se practican por 5 minutos en 5 periodos a lo largo del día. Jugando durante 7 días habrás completado un ciclo del curso. Por cada ciclo que completas aumentas y equilibras tu 'Pentágono de Habilidades'.




Los 5 elementos básicos son interdependientes. Lo que significa que, al practicar de manera integral, aumentando tu nivel en uno estás aumentándolo en los demás. El cuerpo realmente funciona como un todo!

El curso está estructurado como un juego en lugar de un entrenamiento formal. A través del juego podemos desarrollar el hábito de la práctica de manera divertida y eficaz.  Jugar es la esencia del deporte!

" Somos lo que repetidamente hacemos, la grandeza no es un acto sino un hábito ". -Platón

 

   La Campaña


El dinero recaudado en este campaña se destinará a cubrir los siguientes gastos de producción del curso:

  • Producción y edición de Vídeos  

  • Ilustraciones y gráficos

  • Traducciones 

  • Diseño gráfico 

  • Programación

El curso será mayormente en formato vídeo, con textos, ilustraciones y gráficos para comprender qué hacer y qué sucede en el cuerpo cuando lo haces. 

El plan es producir un curso que pueda ser descargado en tu ordenador o bien usado en línea. 

El curso se presentará bajo un diseño fresco y juvenil, que inspire tanto a niños como a adultos a usarlo y aprender de él.

En el caso de no llegar a nuestro objetivo de la campaña, continuaremos con la producción del el curso ajustándolo al presupuesto. La información y los ejercicios serían los mismos, pero la facilidad de uso del curso y presentación se verían afectadas.



 Mi Historia


Personalmente, siempre he buscado poder superar mis limitaciones físicas invirtiendo un mínimo de tiempo y cambios en mi día a día. 

Mi actitud hacia la vida ha sido generalmente de disfrutar el momento presente, en lugar de sobre planearlo o controlarlo. Poco a poco he ido aprendido a adaptar mi pasión por la actividad física a mi día cotidiano. Ya fuera como estudiante universitario, viajando, trabajando o ahora como padre.      

A través de la práctica y estudios, he comprendido que los límites del cuerpo pueden ser superados constantemente, cultivando así un sentido de evolución. Esta progresión realmente me motiva e inspira.

Como resultado, me siento recargado con propósito y energía en mi vida.

          




El Proyecto 


Este curso es parte de un proyecto mayor para inspirar y educar a la gente sobre cómo usar y cuidar sus cuerpos.

Cualquier dinero recibido tras llegar al objetivo de la campaña se destinará a dos áreas claves que creo ayudarán a impulsar este método para el público en general; 

1) Deseo recorrer colegios e institutos, comenzando en Escocia, para inspirar a niños y adolescentes. Quiero poder regalar pelotas hackys  para que puedan empezar a practicar un elemento central (coordinación de piernas).       

Mi esperanza personal es que se reúnan en grupos, motivándose entre sí para jugar y superar sus límites, cuidando sus cuerpos  mientras se divierten.
Creo que las generaciones más jóvenes, aplicando este método, alcanzarán un sorprendente nivel  de movimiento. La evolución del deporte recae en ellos!      

2) Me gustaría trabajar, bien con la Universidad de Granada o la de Marsella, y hacer un estudio científico, utilizando alrededor de 20 atletas de diferentes deportes para ver los efectos de este método en sus rendimientos durante un período de 1, 3, 6 y 12 meses.



Contribuir a esta campaña significará que mi sueño personal de dar a conocer este método a un gran número de personas se hará realidad.

Un cuerpo equilibrado significa una vida más plena.


                                           

¡Si esta campaña te ha inspirado, por favor compártela!

 Gracias!


                                                            ---------------
story_txt:
(La campaña en español se encuentra más abajo)                                   Welcome! I'm Javi, a spanish guy living in Scotland.I've developed my own training method to improve your health and skills investing the least amount of time and interruption in your daily life.My aim is to offer this knowledge in an affordable online course.After studying a degree in Sports Science, and devoting over 12 years to understand the basics of health and physical abilities, I've realised that sports can be done in a 
efficient and harmonious way that won't injure or consume your body over
 time.For the last few years, I've coached different sport practitioners, and I've realised that this method works for people of all ages and kinds.It can be practiced by itself or as a complement to improve your current physical activity, and will help you develop a 'Versatile Body'. A body that can swiftly adapt from the needs of one activity to the needs of another.                                   The Course 
My method to training your body can be compared to a 'dietary supplement' which will allow you to reach higher levels and perform over a longer period of time.

There are 5 core elements to avoid injuries and be able to constantly overcome your physical barriers. Each core element has been divided into 7 games.
 
Course Content:

Seven Coordination Games 
Seven Fluidity Games
Seven Strength Games
Seven Functionality Games
Seven Versatility Games
Circular Training Guide





-Increasing Coordination will make your decision making faster and more accurate during exercise.
-By training Fluidity, you will achieve a greater effectivity in the kinetic chain ( the connection of one joint to the next one) and therefore greater speed.
-Strength, means muscle strength which stabilizes the body when moving, and  determines how powerful and effective you start or stop a movement.
-Functionality exercises promote the proper functioning of the body structures (e.g. The spinal chord), and help prevent and recover from injury.
-Versatility means the ability to adapt to an exercise, as well as how creative, varied and free you are able to move.


Each
game consists of a combination of specific exercises, diagrams and
information. Allowing you to quickly understand the
"hack" that allows you to progress in each
element. You'll evolve by understanding rather than
imitating.

The
Circular Training Guide helps you easily adapt your training
to your daily life. It will help you keep record of what you have
already achieved, and what to do in your next session.

The
different games can be played for 5 minutes each,
in 5 periods throughout the day. Playing
for 7 days will complete a cycle of the
course. For every cycle you complete you will improve and balance
your 'Pentagon of Skills'.
 



All
the basic elements of your body are interdependent. When
practicing in an integral way, improving one means improving the
rest.  The body works as a whole!  The course is structured like a game rather than a formal training course. Through play we develop the habit of practicing the basic elements in the most effective and fun way. Playing is the essence of sport!
" We are what we repeatedly do, Greatness is not an act but a habit ". -Plato



  The Campaign

The campaign sum of  £15,000 will go towards producing a compelling course to cover the following costs: 

Video Production and Editing 
Drawings and Diagrams
Course Programming 

Translations
 Website


The course would mostly be in a video format, along with texts and diagrams to understand what to do and what happens in your body when you do them.  
The plan is to initially produce a course that can be downloaded onto your computer or be used on line. 
I believe the course needs to be fresh, youthful and inspiring for children and adults to enjoy using and learning from it.
In case we don't reach our campaign target, we will nevertheless produce the course and fit it to the budget. The information and exercises would be the same, but the course's user friendliness and presentation would be affected.


                                      My Journey


Personally, I have always challenged myself to overcome my physical limitations. 

Because of my attitude to life; enjoying the present moment rather than over planning or controlling it. I fit my passion for sports and physical practices into my daily life: as a student, whilst traveling, whilst working and now as father.Practicing over the years, I have realised that it is possible to constantly overcome the bodies limits. Creating a sense of evolution. This progression motivates me to keep pushing and inspires me to share how.   As a result, I feel charged with purpose and vitality in life. 







The Project 


This course is part of a wider project to inspire and educate people how to use and care for their bodies.  
All money we raise after we hit our campaign target will go towards two key areas I think will help propel this method to the general public. 
1) I'd wish to personally tour schools, starting in Scotland, to inspire children. As part of the tour I want to give away happy sacks so that  children can already start playing one core element (leg coordination). 
My personal hope is that they will get in groups, nudge each other to play and overcome their boundaries, care for their bodies while having fun.I
believe that the younger generations who apply this method will tap
into their potential and reach levels that previous generations have
not been able to. The evolution of sport lies with them!


 


2) I would like to work with either the University of Granada or Marseille and make a scientifically rigorous study using around 20 athletes from different sports, to see the effects of this method on their bodies and performances over a period of 1,  3, 6  and 12 months.  







Contributing to this campaign will mean my personal dream of making the course available to a great number of people will come true.

A balanced body means a fulfilling life! 


If you care, please share!                                               




Bienvenido! Soy Javi, un español viviendo en Escocia. 
He desarrollado un método de entrenamiento parar aumentar la salud y la destreza física, invirtiendo un mínimo de tiempo y cambios en el día a día. 
Mi propósito es ofrecer este conocimiento en un formato online asequible.
 



Tras estudiar Ciencias del Deporte y dedicar más de 12 años a comprender las bases de la salud y las habilidades físicas, creo que el deporte y la actividad física pueden practicarse de manera 
eficaz y armoniosa, evitando lesiones y el desgaste del cuerpo.
Durante los últimos años, he enseñado a diferentes practicantes de actividades físicas y me he dado cuenta de que este método funciona para todo tipo de personas y edades.
Puede ser practicado por sí mismo o como complemento para mejorar cualquier actividad física que realices, ayudándote a desarrollar un 'Cuerpo Versátil'. Un cuerpo que se adapta rápidamente a cualquier práctica deportiva. 




 
El Curso

Este método de entrenamiento físico podría ser comparada a un 'suplemento dietético', el cual  te permite rendir a niveles más elevados y durante más años.
He simplificado éste al máximo, de manera que pueda ser comprendido y aplicado por niños de unos 10 años, pasando por deportistas de élite, hasta personas mayores.  Hay 5 elementos básicos para evitar lesiones y poder superar constantemente los límites del cuerpo. Cada uno ha sido dividido en 7 juegos.


Contenido del curso:


Siete Juegos de Coordinación



Siete Juegos de Fluidez
Siete Juegos de Fuerza
Siete Juegos de Funcionalidad
Siete Juegos de Versatilidad
Guía de Entrenamiento Circular 





-Mediante el incremento de la Coordinación se agiliza la toma de decisiones durante el ejercicio, así como la precisión de éstas.
-Entrenando la Fluidez se consigue eficacia en las cadenas cinéticas (transición del movimiento de una articulación a la siguiente), y así  aumentar la velocidad.
-La Fuerza muscular es clave en la estabilidad del cuerpo durante los movimientos, así como en la  potencia y eficacia para frenar un movimiento e iniciar uno nuevo.
-Los ejercicios de Funcionalidad favorecen el correcto funcionamiento de las estructuras  corporales, así como la prevención y recuperación de lesiones.
-La Versatilidad determina la capacidad de adaptación ante el ejercicio demandado, así como la creatividad, libertad y variedad de movimientos. 

Cada juego consiste en una combinación de vídeos tutoriales, diagramas, ilustraciones e información que te permite rápidamente comprender "el truco" que posibilita la progresión en cada elemento. Así puedes progresar mediante la comprensión en lugar de la imitación.
La guía de Entrenamiento Circular ha sido especialmente desarrollada para permitir adaptar tu práctica a tu día cotidiano. Te ayudará a tener un registro de lo que has hecho y una guía de lo que deberías practicar en tu próxima sesión.
Los distintos juegos se practican por 5 minutos en 5 periodos a lo largo del día. Jugando durante 7 días habrás completado un ciclo del curso. Por cada ciclo que completas aumentas y equilibras tu 'Pentágono de Habilidades'.




Los 5 elementos básicos son interdependientes. Lo que significa que, al practicar de manera integral, aumentando tu nivel en uno estás aumentándolo en los demás. El cuerpo realmente funciona como un todo!
El curso está estructurado como un juego en lugar de un entrenamiento formal. A través del juego podemos desarrollar el hábito de la práctica de manera divertida y eficaz.  Jugar es la esencia del deporte!
" Somos lo que repetidamente hacemos, la grandeza no es un acto sino un hábito ". -Platón


 
   La
Campaña

El dinero recaudado en este campaña se destinará a cubrir los siguientes gastos de producción del curso:



	Producción
	y edición de Vídeos  



	Ilustraciones
	y gráficos



	Traducciones 



	Diseño
	gráfico 



	Programación



El
curso será mayormente en formato vídeo, con textos, ilustraciones y
gráficos para comprender qué hacer y qué sucede en el cuerpo
cuando lo haces. 

El
plan es producir un curso que pueda ser descargado en tu ordenador o
bien usado en línea. 
El curso se presentará bajo un diseño fresco y juvenil, que inspire tanto a niños como a adultos a usarlo y aprender de él.
En el caso de no llegar a nuestro objetivo de la campaña, continuaremos con la producción del el curso ajustándolo al presupuesto. La información y los ejercicios serían los mismos, pero la facilidad de uso del curso y presentación se verían afectadas.


 Mi Historia






Personalmente, siempre he buscado poder superar mis limitaciones físicas invirtiendo un mínimo de tiempo y cambios en mi día a día. 
Mi actitud hacia la vida ha sido generalmente de disfrutar el momento presente, en lugar de sobre planearlo o controlarlo. Poco a poco he ido aprendido a adaptar mi pasión por la actividad física a mi día cotidiano. Ya fuera como estudiante universitario, viajando, trabajando o ahora como padre.       

A través de la práctica y estudios, he comprendido que los límites del cuerpo pueden ser superados constantemente, cultivando así un sentido de evolución. Esta progresión realmente me motiva e inspira.
Como resultado, me siento recargado con propósito y energía en mi vida.            




El Proyecto 

Este curso es parte de un proyecto mayor para inspirar y educar a la gente sobre cómo usar y cuidar sus cuerpos.
Cualquier dinero recibido tras llegar al objetivo de la campaña se destinará a dos áreas claves que creo ayudarán a impulsar este método para el público en general; 
1) Deseo recorrer colegios e institutos, comenzando en Escocia, para inspirar a niños y adolescentes. Quiero poder regalar pelotas hackys  para que puedan empezar a practicar un elemento central (coordinación de piernas).       Mi esperanza personal es que se reúnan en grupos, motivándose entre sí para jugar y superar sus límites, cuidando sus cuerpos  mientras se divierten.
Creo que las generaciones más jóvenes, aplicando este método, alcanzarán un sorprendente nivel  de movimiento. La evolución del deporte recae en ellos!      





2) Me gustaría trabajar, bien con la Universidad de Granada o la de Marsella, y hacer un estudio científico, utilizando alrededor de 20 atletas de diferentes deportes para ver los efectos de este método en sus rendimientos durante un período de 1, 3, 6 y 12 meses.




Contribuir a esta campaña significará que mi sueño personal de dar a conocer este método a un gran número de personas se hará realidad.
Un cuerpo equilibrado significa una vida más plena.


                                           
¡Si esta campaña te ha inspirado, por favor compártela!
 Gracias!

story:
Research and Science of the Test

After years of research and clinical trials Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a new PAIN-FREE screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.

Dr. Robyn Hannigan Inventor 

Founding Dean, School for the Environment

University of Massachusetts, Boston.

"Revolutionizing Testing"

A PARADIGM SHIFT IN MEDICAL TESTING                         NO BLOOD TEST



A double blind clinical trial was conducted at Emory University Children’s Hospital in conjunction with the Georgia Department of Human Resources, Atlanta, GA and University of Massachusetts, Boston.  More than 500 children between the ages of 6 months to 6 years were tested.  The research results, soon to be published in The Journal of Clinical Toxicology, show that oral fluid is in all cases more reliable than any saliva test and in fact is as reliable as a venous blood test, because blood plasma is being collected in the oral fluid.

Dr. S Lynn Gardener, one of the authors of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Conference in October 2009 and received much praise and support from the attendees.  The study demonstrated that by using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive, painless oral swab procedure versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.

The new screening test kit “Toxyscreen”, a product of OFT Labs, is designed to make it easy for concerned parents to test their children. All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.

The blood plasma collected in the oral fluid can not only detect drugs but also heavy metals such as Lead, Mercury,  Cadmium, Aluminum, Arsenic, Zinc Copper and Chromium, poison, and almost anything else a standard blood test can find.  This includes recreational and prescription drugs, hormones, HGH, and maybe even different types of cancers--all with just an easy swab of the gum line.


                                            TOXYSCREEN TEST KIT


After years of research and clinical trials Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a new PAIN-FREE screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.

The new screening test kit “Toxyscreen”, a product of OFT Labs, is designed to make it easy for concerned parents to test their children. All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.



Toxyscreen is an oral fluid testing method that allows the public access to cutting edge heavy metal testing using oral fluids. The test is a simple swab that looks like a q-tip rubbed along the gumline of your inner mouth. As a screening tool for lead and heavy metals “Toxyscreen” kit is the best, fastest and most reliable way for parents, parent groups working with lead-poisoned children, and parents of special-needs children concerned with mercury contamination, to test and screen their children.

After conducting years of research with assistance from retired Navy Nurse Nancy Harms, the owner of Patriot Drug and DNA Inc., and consulting with medical experts from around the nation,  it was discovered that oral fluid is much more accurate than saliva and often surpasses urine test accuracy as well.

The testing is painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw. No scheduling hassles. No pain from a needle. No risk of infection, anemia, thrombosis. Toxyscreen makes testing easy, fast, and painless, especially for kids, the elderly, and pets.

The testing is private. You order a test kit online, mail the sample back, and receive results via mail and /or email. The test is completed in your own home.

The testing generates no medical waste. Oral fluid is not considered medical waste, is not a bio-hazard, and produces no risk of blood borne pathogens.

                     

                        

NO MEDICAL WASTE

What can I learn from testing with Toxyscreen? 

This enormous, patented discovery identified by sheer persistence to find an option for more dignified testing, would eliminate the need to draw blood to detect overexposure to lead and heavy metals.  You can now test your family’s and pet’s levels of four toxic heavy metals: lead, arsenic, mercury and cadmium. Heavy metals are potentially deadly elements that can cause a host of health problems. Often heavy metal poisoning is misdiagnosed, and patients may not receive the correct treatment.  Lead tests in particular often go undone because the hazard of lead poisoning are unknown though fairly common, and parents don’t want the challenge and anxiety of a blood draw.

How does it work? We send you a kit, which includes detailed instructions and pictures regarding how to take the test. You take a sample (painless, easy, simple) and you mail it back. We send you the results by mail and/or email.

Your Privacy is very important to us: Your Privacy is protected by de-identifying the samples on receipt, sending you your unique bar-code, and performing all downstream data analyses only with that bar-code. All information is handled under HIPAA compliance program. We will not store your personally identifying information in any database or release it on the internet in any way, but we will take all reasonable precautions to avoid inadvertent identification of participants. Transfer of materials to other sites is covered by code access agreements. If you have any questions, please email us at  customerservice@toxyscreen.com 

Who should participate? Anyone can participate, but Toxyscreen particularly benefits children;, elderly patients who have a hard time getting out to a lab for a blood draw, struggle with clotting or finding a good vein for intravenous draws;, and anyone who is fearful of a needle.


                               


We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market. Your pledged funds will be used to expand the types of testing we do.

There is going to be a paradigm shift in medical testing in the future, from blood to Oral Fluid. We want you to be a part of that.

Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.

OUR STORY

Meet Ed and Gene, the founders of OFT Labs and creators of a revolutionary testing method that will nullify the need for blood draws for heavy metal testing, replacing it with an oral fluid swab test.

These two South Jersey natives have been best friends since Kindergarten.  That’s right, they knew each other way back when stick-ball was the game to play and they remember the first person that had a TV on their block.  Marriages, children, career changes, life changes, and now grandchildren:  they have weathered them together through decades of friendship. Learn more about our story and roots!


Company History:  

Where did this concept of testing with Dignity come from?

Ed and Gene founded Oral Fluid Testing (OFT) Laboratories, LLC in 2007.  For ten years they ran a company that provided pulmonary testing and drug and alcohol screening for various companies.  The US Department of Transportation was one of their largest clients.  This niche market allowed them a gateway into building safer working environments.  Almost immediately, the team identified major challenges with the accuracy of the industry-standard urine test. First, the breadth of options for tests to be tampered with, thus skewing the tests’ results, were well-known and widely used.  A rapidly developing market was flooding health food and vitamin stores; drinks, powders, and shakes designed to assist donors in beating a test, in addition to many well-known tricks from experienced test-takers, was making accurate testing more difficult.  Second, the undignified nature of providing urine collection is embarrassing and opens the door to accusations of sexual harassment and embarrassment.

Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.  Eventually oral fluid testing was introduced, and Ed and Gene diligently set to work designing a procedure to collect oral fluid samples with DOT standard collection procedures in order to ensure accuracy and security of the sample and paper work.  This process identified major challenges with the collection process and demonstrated saliva test results were even easier to manipulate. While collaborating with several laboratories, Ed and Gene had scientists compare a lab-based urine test with some of the saliva tests on the market. A surprisingly high number of the saliva tests were coming back as false negatives; the saliva test was being beat as well.  Gene and Ed couldn’t help but imagine there were better, easier options.


Can it also reduce medical waste and therefore save landfill space, time and money? YES!


Research and Science of the Test:

After 10 years and exhausting all their resources including pensions, mortgages, and contacts and resources of close family and friends, their hard work and dedication to research and clinical trials has paid off.  Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a pain-free screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.  The first of many products (voting link for next research proj.) to come, Toxyscreen was designed to make it easy for concerned parents to check their children for lead and mercury poisoning, which cause learning disabilities and may be one of the leading causes of autism.  All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.

After conducting years of research with assistance from retired Navy Nurse Nancy Harms, the owner of Patriot Drug and DNA Inc., and consulting with medical experts from around the nation,  it was discovered that oral fluid is much more accurate than saliva and often surpasses urine test accuracy as well.

A double blind clinical trial was conducted at Emory University Children’s Hospital in conjunction with the Georgia Department of Human Resources, Atlanta, GA and University of Massachusetts, Boston.  More than 500 children between the ages of 6 months to 6 years were tested.  The research results, soon to be published in The Journal of Clinical Toxicology, show that oral fluid is in all cases more reliable than any saliva test and in fact is as reliable as a venous blood test, because blood plasma is being collected in the oral fluid.

Dr. Gardener, one of the authors of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Conference in October 2009 and received much praise and support from the attendees.  The study demonstrated that by using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive, painless oral swab procedure versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.

The blood plasma collected in the oral fluid can not only detect drugs but also heavy metals such as Lead, Mercury,  Cadmium, Zinc, Copper, Arsenic, and Chromium, poison, and almost anything else a standard blood test can find.  This includes recreational and prescription drugs, hormones, HGH, and maybe even different types of cancers--all with just an easy swab of the gum line.  (Link to voting for nexy proj.?)

On November 9, 2010, the U.S. Patent Office issued OFT Labs Patent #7829340.  This patent clearly indicates that the results of the oral fluid testing procedures are as accurate as venous blood samples.  Using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive painless test versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.

Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory, LLC. PATENT                                         

 


Why did OFT Labs decide to start with heavy metals testing?

There is no way of escaping it; there is going to be a paradigm shift in medical testing, from blood to oral fluid for all screening and diagnostic testing for the future.  Gene and Ed are hoping to help usher in this change with heavy metal testing.  Why did they choose to start with lead testing?  Lead testing is a federally mandated test that children should receive annually.  Doctors and pediatricians are required to provide lead testing to Medicaid children under the Child Wellness Program (link to fed law).  Additionally, OSHA requires heavy metal testing for workers in fossil fuel power plants, oil refineries, trash-to-steam power plants, construction sites, and solid waste/recycling jobs.  Add to that the growing concern by the general public to ensure safety from environmental harm due to poor air, water, and food quality conditions. Each of these parties are currently subjected to intravenous blood testing, which is painful and has to be conducted by a doctor’s office or laboratory.  This is a golden opportunity to provide an easier option.

Toxyscreen is a painless, dignified way to meet these needs.  New Jersey alone spends 28 billion dollars a year on health and education problems for residents affected by lead poisoning.  "This is not just an inner-city problem but a suburban problem not yet realized". Millions could be saved if Toxyscreen was used for early detection and mapping problem areas.  Construction companies, schools, and businesses that test new employees or do random testing could also save money on collection fees and time saved in doing the test on site by a trained professional.  Doctors can conduct collection right in their office.  If a person does test positive, immediate treatment can begin.

This test is easy, economical, efficient, and environmentally friendly.  Oral fluid-based testing techniques can be implemented for all testing from heavy metals, abused drugs both illegal and prescribed, (HGH) Human Growth Hormones, and medical screening.  This is why we need your support.

Common sources and effects of heavy metals are detailed in the chart below, provided by Occupational Safety and Health Association (OSHA).




Pets are included! 

This testing is also for your four-legged friend/family member. Lead poisoning is a common source of accidental poisoning in pets, mainly puppies. If you have a pet that is diagnosed with lead poisoning, chances are that you may have been exposed as well.  The potential sources of lead for domestic animals are numerous and widespread. Ingestion of lead-based paints is the most commonly identified source of lead in poisoned cats and dogs. Other lead sources are toys, improperly glazed ceramic water or food bowls, contaminated tap water, and children's chalk.  Prior to the introduction of oral fluid testing, diagnosis of lead toxicity always involved a traumatic blood test.


Benefits of TOXYScreen:

Toxyscreen is a home kit to test lead and heavy metals screening test for you, your family, and even your pets.  It is pain-free, fast, efficient, and accurate.  No risk of infection, anemia, thrombosis.  No fear, no scheduling hassles.


During the study, Toxyscreen samples for the oral fluid test were sometimes collected from a sleeping child who was then taken into an exam room for the comparison blood test, awoken with a needlestick, crying from fright and pain. Some had to be held down by the parents or additional staff.

  • The testing is painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw.

  • A licensed phlebotomist is not needed because individuals or internal personnel, trained to collect samples, easily conduct the test without the risk of being exposed to bloodborne hazard.

  • No risk of infection, anemia, or thrombosis for the donor.

  • Personnel can be tested by your company Safety Director with exceptional benefits and cost savings. Oral fluid specimen collection is quick and easy. An experienced, trained collector could collect up to 20 specimens per hour.

  • The testing is private.  All samples are sent to OFT Laboratories to be analyzed.  Results are confirmed via an ICP/MASS SPEC technology.

  • There is no medical waste.  Oral fluid is not considered a biohazard, thus disposal costs are substantially reduced. The test kit is environmentally friendly and its plastic container can easily be recycled.

  • Samples do not require special handling or preservatives. Once oral fluid is collected, it does not have to be refrigerated. This is an advantage if collecting in remote areas such as third world countries. Testing can be performed anywhere in the world.

  • The testing is inexpensive. The at-cost value of the test is equivalent to a blood test.  It would not be an additional financial burden to provide the test if it was covered by insurance companies.

  • Sizable direct savings result from reduced donor wait time. There is no need to coax children into subjecting themselves to a finger stick to collect a capillary blood specimen. There is no need to travel to a doctor or lab with an elderly relative or individual with disability.  

  • The test can be completed in your own home or at your place of business/work.

  • Not much equipment is required, making this test a viable option for providing testing in third world countries.


Use of Funds

Ed and Gene believe in the technology they have discovered, and their mission and goal is the development of analytical techniques and instruments for identification and measurements of chemicals in biological and non-biological matrices.  By providing easy collection and accurate measurements of a wide range of organic and inorganic substances, OFT hopes to become the international standard and resource center for those industries requiring compliance testing, surveillance and monitoring testing.


Hopefully, you are inspired by the opportunities oral fluid testing has already proven to hold, and you will choose to be part of this paradigm shift in medical testing.  Your pledged funds will be used to integrate OFT’s heavy metals test into the current market and expand oral fluid testing beyond heavy metals. Our highest priority, with your support, is to seek Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Clinical laboratory Improvement Amendments (CLIA) approval, which would allow doctors to offer the test to patients and would begin the process of obtaining approval for coverage by insurance companies. OFT has hundreds of possible markets for expansion, including medical offices, independent labs, schools, day care, airlines, the hospitality industry, sport facility , military personnel, MEDICAID recipients, manufacturing/processing facility, power plant  or construction sites and employers who drug test.  With further clinical trials, they hope to expand oral fluid metals testing to other heavy metals, steroid testing in sports, drug testing in fatal accidents, and examining its potential for identifying different types of cancers..   

This requires research, time, paperwork, and promotion of the test. With enough funding, licensing can provide onsite, or at minimal, regional testing facilities in order to increase efficiency of test to provide quicker results.  We will also have to address debt and expenses acquired from obtaining the patent, printing, marketing, Toxyscreen packaging, and initial work with University lab to provide testing and internal research.


Your pledge funds will also be used to:

  • manufacture the kits to collect your sample, analyze the results (includes purchasing reagents (primers, buffers, enzymes) for sequencing, running the equipment, performing bioinformatics and statistical analysis)

  • Website design and development

  • Hiring key Management and outstanding lab personnel.

  • Additional clinical trials

  • Research and development capital for supplies, additional lab equipment and training in order to expand into other states.

  • FDA approval (costs include lawyer fees for communicating with FDA, travel, and promotion funds)

We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market.  By choosing to donate, you will be part of a fundamental change in the way testing is conducted.  The potential is clear - painless, accurate oral fluid testing for heavy metals is on the horizon, and you can be part of ushering in this change.  These funds will help families identify lead poisoning early, avoiding long term medical problems, and will allow companies to provide easy, safe, effective testing to their employees, ensuring their health and safety.  The benefits are boundless.  Thank you for your consideration.


Resources:

Two stories in South Jersey Magazine:  

http://digital.southjersey.com/index.cfm?fa=vie... 

http://www.southjerseymagazine.com/articles/?ar...


PARTNERS/Vendors:

http://www.southjerseymagazine.com/ 


http://www.triangle-printing.com/

http://www.belliaprinting.com/

Parent/Foundation Support Groups:  

www.alphalead.org 


Testing Yourself, Your Family

You can test your family’s levels of four toxic heavy metals – lead, arsenic, mercury and cadmium. Heavy metals are potentially deadly elements that can cause a host of health problems. Often heavy metal poisoning is misdiagnosed, and patients may not receive the correct treatment.

· Common exposures to arsenic include pesticides/fungicides/insecticides, beer, table salt, tap water, paints, cosmetics, treated wood, and food.

· Common exposures to cadmium include cigarettes, food, large fish and shellfish, tap water, auto exhaust, and air pollution from incineration.

· Common exposures to lead include tap water, cigarette smoke, hair dyes, paints, inks, glazes, some golf balls, fishing weights, battery manufacture, pesticide residue, and food.

· Common exposure to mercury include dental amalgams, large fish and shellfish, medications and vaccines, air pollution, chlorine, adhesives, fabric softeners, manufacture of paper, and waxes.


How to collect a specimen:


Take swab from kit, break seal at red cap and carefully. 

Remove swab from sterile protective tube. Swab must not be touch or placed on any surface.

Place swab in well of the mouth between the lower teeth lip rotate and rub swab front to back both sides for a 60 second count of the lower lip.

Place swab back into Sterile protective tube than, remove 

seal from requisition form and apply seal over the TOP of swab.

Place sealed swab into self address shipping envelope or box with 

completed requisition form. 


Testing Your Pets

This testing is also for your four-legged friend/family member.

Lead poisoning is a common source of accidental poisoning in pets, mainly puppies. Many animals are lead poisoned every week! If you have a pet that is diagnosed with lead poisoning, chances are that you may have been exposed as well. Unlike the dramatic onset of clinical signs seen with most small animal poisonings, lead poisoning often has an insidious onset.

The potential sources of lead for domestic animals are numerous and widespread. Ingestion of lead-based paints is the most commonly identified source of lead in poisoned cats and dogs. Renovations of older houses involving sanding or scraping lead based paint is believed to be the major origin of the lead based paint in these instances. Other lead sources are toys, improperly glazed ceramic water or food bowls, contaminated tap water, and children's chalk.

The clinical signs of lead toxicity in dogs include convulsions or fits, vomiting and diarrhea, abdominal pain and bizarre behavior such as hysteria. Lead poisoning is more commonly diagnosed in younger dogs because they are more likely to chew on objects. However, adult dogs may also be affected. In contrast, lead poisoning in cats often only causes loss of appetite and signs such as fits are uncommon. Vomiting and diarrhea occur occasionally.

Prior to the introduction of oral fluid testing, diagnosis of lead toxicity always involved a traumatic blood test. The diagnosis is sometimes difficult and two different tests may be required to confirm that lead poisoning is present, particularly in cats. More Clinical Studies are required to prove the accuracy of our test for Felines. 


Our Toxyscreen Test Kit

A lead and heavy metals screening test for you and your family at home

Benefits of Oral Fluid Testing Versus Blood Testing

  • Oral fluid testing is much easier, more cost effective, and much less painful (in fact it's not painful!) than other testing methods in use today:
  • Third party collection fees are eliminated by using personnel on our staff that are trained to collect samples.  There are no blood-borne hazards to technicians or collectors. 
  • A licensed phlebotomist is not needed. No risk of infection, anemia or thrombosis. 
  • Oral fluid is not considered a bio-hazard, thus disposal costs are substantially reduced. The test kit is environmentally friendly and its plastic container can easily be recycled. There is no medical waste.
  • Samples do not require special handling or preservatives. Once oral fluid is collected, it does not have to be refrigerated. This is an advantage if collecting in remote areas such as third world countries. Testing can be performed anywhere in the world.
  • Sizable direct savings result from reduced donor wait time. There is no need to coax children into subjecting themselves to a finger stick to collect a capillary blood specimen. There is no need to travel to a doctor or lab with an elderly relative or individual with disability.
  • Oral fluid specimen collection is quick and easy. An experienced, trained collector could collect up to 20 specimens per hour–a little less than 3 minutes per donor!
  • All samples are sent (via overnight mail) to OFT Laboratories to be analyzed.  Results are confirmed via an ICP/MASS SPEC technology.  Time is saved not only in the specimen collection process, but also in the results turnaround time. Test results are completed and returned electronically within 10 days.


                   NO TEARS

                                           


           FORGING THE WAY

For more information, please visit

WWW.ToxyScreen.com or call (856) 993-9173.

Gene Elwell

Business Spotlight  7/31/14
story_txt:
Research and Science of the Test
After years of research and clinical trials Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a new PAIN-FREE screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.

Dr. Robyn Hannigan Inventor 
Founding Dean, School for the Environment
University of Massachusetts, Boston.
"Revolutionizing Testing"
A PARADIGM SHIFT IN MEDICAL TESTING                         NO BLOOD TEST




A double blind clinical trial was conducted at Emory University Children’s Hospital in conjunction with the Georgia Department of Human Resources, Atlanta, GA and University of Massachusetts, Boston.  More than 500 children between the ages of 6 months to 6 years were tested.  The research results, soon to be published in The Journal of Clinical Toxicology, show that oral fluid is in all cases more reliable than any saliva test and in fact is as reliable as a venous blood test, because blood plasma is being collected in the oral fluid.

Dr. S Lynn Gardener, one of the authors of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Conference in October 2009 and received much praise and support from the attendees.  The study demonstrated that by using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive, painless oral swab procedure versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.
The new screening test kit “Toxyscreen”, a product of OFT Labs, is designed to make it easy for concerned parents to test their children. All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.
The blood plasma collected in the oral fluid can not only detect drugs but also heavy metals such as Lead, Mercury,  Cadmium, Aluminum, Arsenic, Zinc Copper and Chromium, poison, and almost anything else a standard blood test can find.  This includes recreational and prescription drugs, hormones, HGH, and maybe even different types of cancers--all with just an easy swab of the gum line.

                                            TOXYSCREEN TEST KIT

After years of research and clinical trials Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a new PAIN-FREE screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.
The new screening test kit “Toxyscreen”, a product of OFT Labs, is designed to make it easy for concerned parents to test their children. All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.



Toxyscreen is an oral
fluid testing method that allows the public access to cutting edge heavy
metal testing using oral fluids. The test is a simple swab that looks like a
q-tip rubbed along the gumline of your inner mouth. As a screening tool for lead and heavy metals “Toxyscreen” kit is the best, fastest and most reliable way for parents, parent groups working with lead-poisoned children, and parents of special-needs children concerned with mercury contamination, to test and screen their children.
After conducting years of research with assistance from retired Navy Nurse Nancy Harms, the owner of Patriot Drug and DNA Inc., and consulting with medical experts from around the nation,  it was discovered that oral fluid is much more accurate than saliva and often surpasses urine test accuracy as well.
The testing is
painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw. No scheduling hassles. No
pain from a needle. No risk of infection, anemia, thrombosis. Toxyscreen makes
testing easy, fast, and painless, especially for kids, the elderly, and pets.
The testing is
private. You order a test kit online, mail the sample back, and receive
results via mail and /or email. The test is completed in your own home.

The testing generates
no medical waste. Oral fluid is not considered medical waste, is not a bio-hazard, and produces no risk of blood borne pathogens.

                     


                        NO MEDICAL WASTE
What can I learn from
testing with Toxyscreen? 
This enormous, patented discovery identified by sheer persistence to find an option for more dignified testing, would eliminate the need to draw blood to detect overexposure to lead and heavy metals.  You can now test your family’s and pet’s levels of four toxic heavy metals: lead, arsenic, mercury and cadmium. Heavy metals are potentially deadly elements that can cause a host of health problems. Often heavy metal poisoning is misdiagnosed, and patients may not receive the correct treatment.  Lead tests in particular often go undone because the hazard of lead poisoning are unknown though fairly common, and parents don’t want the challenge and anxiety of a blood draw.
   
How does it work? We send you a kit, which includes detailed instructions and pictures regarding how to take the test. You take a sample (painless, easy, simple) and you mail it back. We send you the results by mail and/or email.


Your Privacy is very important to us: Your Privacy is protected by de-identifying the samples on receipt, sending you your unique bar-code, and performing all downstream data analyses only with that bar-code. All information is handled under HIPAA compliance program. We will not store your personally identifying information in any database or release it on the internet in any way, but we will take all reasonable precautions to avoid inadvertent identification of participants. Transfer of materials to other sites is covered by code access agreements. If you have any questions, please email us at  customerservice@toxyscreen.com Who should participate? Anyone can participate, but Toxyscreen particularly benefits children;, elderly patients who have a hard time getting out to a lab for a blood draw, struggle with clotting or finding a good vein for intravenous draws;, and anyone who is fearful of a needle.
                               


We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market. Your pledged funds will be used to expand the types of testing we do.
There is going to be a paradigm shift in medical testing in the future, from blood to Oral Fluid. We want you to be a part of that.

Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.

OUR STORY
Meet Ed and Gene, the founders of OFT Labs and creators of a revolutionary testing method that will nullify the need for blood draws for heavy metal testing, replacing it with an oral fluid swab test.
These two South Jersey natives have been best friends since Kindergarten.  That’s right, they knew each other way back when stick-ball was the game to play and they remember the first person that had a TV on their block.  Marriages, children, career changes, life changes, and now grandchildren:  they have weathered them together through decades of friendship. Learn more about our story and roots!





Company History:  

Where did this concept of testing with Dignity come from?
Ed and Gene founded Oral Fluid Testing (OFT) Laboratories, LLC in 2007.  For ten years they ran a company that provided pulmonary testing and drug and alcohol screening for various companies.  The US Department of Transportation was one of their largest clients.  This niche market allowed them a gateway into building safer working environments.  Almost immediately, the team identified major challenges with the accuracy of the industry-standard urine test. First, the breadth of options for tests to be tampered with, thus skewing the tests’ results, were well-known and widely used.  A rapidly developing market was flooding health food and vitamin stores; drinks, powders, and shakes designed to assist donors in beating a test, in addition to many well-known tricks from experienced test-takers, was making accurate testing more difficult.  Second, the undignified nature of providing urine collection is embarrassing and opens the door to accusations of sexual harassment and embarrassment.
Blood draws are the second most common type of diagnostic test. They are painful, create medical waste, risk potential infections, and are overall inconvenient and costly.  Eventually oral fluid testing was introduced, and Ed and Gene diligently set to work designing a procedure to collect oral fluid samples with DOT standard collection procedures in order to ensure accuracy and security of the sample and paper work.  This process identified major challenges with the collection process and demonstrated saliva test results were even easier to manipulate. While collaborating with several laboratories, Ed and Gene had scientists compare a lab-based urine test with some of the saliva tests on the market. A surprisingly high number of the saliva tests were coming back as false negatives; the saliva test was being beat as well.  Gene and Ed couldn’t help but imagine there were better, easier options.
Can it also reduce medical waste and therefore save landfill space, time and money? YES!

Research and Science of the Test:
After 10 years and exhausting all their resources including pensions, mortgages, and contacts and resources of close family and friends, their hard work and dedication to research and clinical trials has paid off.  Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory LLC, has developed a pain-free screening test for lead and other heavy metals present in the body.  The first of many products (voting link for next research proj.) to come, Toxyscreen was designed to make it easy for concerned parents to check their children for lead and mercury poisoning, which cause learning disabilities and may be one of the leading causes of autism.  All information needed for proper collection and fast, easy test results is in the Oral Fluid Screening test kit delivered right to your door.
After conducting years of research with assistance from retired Navy Nurse Nancy Harms, the owner of Patriot Drug and DNA Inc., and consulting with medical experts from around the nation,  it was discovered that oral fluid is much more accurate than saliva and often surpasses urine test accuracy as well.
A double blind clinical trial was conducted at Emory University Children’s Hospital in conjunction with the Georgia Department of Human Resources, Atlanta, GA and University of Massachusetts, Boston.  More than 500 children between the ages of 6 months to 6 years were tested.  The research results, soon to be published in The Journal of Clinical Toxicology, show that oral fluid is in all cases more reliable than any saliva test and in fact is as reliable as a venous blood test, because blood plasma is being collected in the oral fluid.
Dr. Gardener, one of the authors of the study, presented our “Non-Invasive Lead Testing Technology” at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) National Conference in October 2009 and received much praise and support from the attendees.  The study demonstrated that by using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive, painless oral swab procedure versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.
The blood plasma collected in the oral fluid can not only detect drugs but also heavy metals such as Lead, Mercury,  Cadmium, Zinc, Copper, Arsenic, and Chromium, poison, and almost anything else a standard blood test can find.  This includes recreational and prescription drugs, hormones, HGH, and maybe even different types of cancers--all with just an easy swab of the gum line.  (Link to voting for nexy proj.?)
On November 9, 2010, the U.S. Patent Office issued OFT Labs Patent #7829340.  This patent clearly indicates that the results of the oral fluid testing procedures are as accurate as venous blood samples.  Using OFT’s patented collection and testing procedures, the results comparing the non-invasive painless test versus an invasive painful blood test were extremely accurate.
Oral Fluid Testing Laboratory, LLC. PATENT                                         
 
Why did OFT Labs decide to start with heavy metals testing?
There is no way of escaping it; there is going to be a paradigm shift in medical testing, from blood to oral fluid for all screening and diagnostic testing for the future.  Gene and Ed are hoping to help usher in this change with heavy metal testing.  Why did they choose to start with lead testing?  Lead testing is a federally mandated test that children should receive annually.  Doctors and pediatricians are required to provide lead testing to Medicaid children under the Child Wellness Program (link to fed law).  Additionally, OSHA requires heavy metal testing for workers in fossil fuel power plants, oil refineries, trash-to-steam power plants, construction sites, and solid waste/recycling jobs.  Add to that the growing concern by the general public to ensure safety from environmental harm due to poor air, water, and food quality conditions. Each of these parties are currently subjected to intravenous blood testing, which is painful and has to be conducted by a doctor’s office or laboratory.  This is a golden opportunity to provide an easier option.
Toxyscreen is a painless, dignified way to meet these needs.  New Jersey alone spends 28 billion dollars a year on health and education problems for residents affected by lead poisoning.  "This is not just an inner-city problem but a suburban problem not yet realized". Millions could be saved if Toxyscreen was used for early detection and mapping problem areas.  Construction companies, schools, and businesses that test new employees or do random testing could also save money on collection fees and time saved in doing the test on site by a trained professional.  Doctors can conduct collection right in their office.  If a person does test positive, immediate treatment can begin.
This test is easy, economical, efficient, and environmentally friendly.  Oral fluid-based testing techniques can be implemented for all testing from heavy metals, abused drugs both illegal and prescribed, (HGH) Human Growth Hormones, and medical screening.  This is why we need your support.

Common sources and effects of heavy metals are detailed in
the chart below, provided by Occupational Safety and Health Association (OSHA).







Pets are included! 
This testing is also for your four-legged friend/family member. Lead poisoning is a common source of accidental poisoning in pets, mainly puppies. If you have a pet that is diagnosed with lead poisoning, chances are that you may have been exposed as well.  The potential sources of lead for domestic animals are numerous and widespread. Other lead sources are toys, improperly glazed ceramic water or food bowls, contaminated tap water, and children's chalk.  Prior to the introduction of oral fluid testing, diagnosis of lead toxicity always involved a traumatic blood test.
Benefits of TOXYScreen:
Toxyscreen is a home kit to test lead and heavy metals screening test for you, your family, and even your pets.  It is pain-free, fast, efficient, and accurate.  No risk of infection, anemia, thrombosis.  No fear, no scheduling hassles.
During the study, Toxyscreen samples for the oral fluid test were sometimes collected from a sleeping child who was then taken into an exam room for the comparison blood test, awoken with a needlestick, crying from fright and pain. Some had to be held down by the parents or additional staff.

The testing is painless. No fear and anxiety of a blood draw. 
A licensed phlebotomist is not needed because individuals or internal personnel, trained to collect samples, easily conduct the test without the risk of being exposed to bloodborne hazard.
No risk of infection, anemia, or thrombosis for the donor.
Personnel can be tested by your company Safety Director with exceptional benefits and cost savings. Oral fluid specimen collection is quick and easy. An experienced, trained collector could collect up to 20 specimens per hour.
The testing is private.  All samples are sent to OFT Laboratories to be analyzed.  Results are confirmed via an ICP/MASS SPEC technology.
There is no medical waste.  Oral fluid is not considered a biohazard, thus disposal costs are substantially reduced. The test kit is environmentally friendly and its plastic container can easily be recycled.
Samples do not require special handling or preservatives. Once oral fluid is collected, it does not have to be refrigerated. This is an advantage if collecting in remote areas such as third world countries. Testing can be performed anywhere in the world.
The testing is inexpensive. The at-cost value of the test is equivalent to a blood test.  It would not be an additional financial burden to provide the test if it was covered by insurance companies.
Sizable direct savings result from reduced donor wait time. There is no need to coax children into subjecting themselves to a finger stick to collect a capillary blood specimen. There is no need to travel to a doctor or lab with an elderly relative or individual with disability.  
The test can be completed in your own home or at your place of business/work.
Not much equipment is required, making this test a viable option for providing testing in third world countries.

Use of Funds

Our highest priority, with your support, is to seek Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and Clinical laboratory Improvement Amendments (CLIA) approval, which would allow doctors to offer the test to patients and would begin the process of obtaining approval for coverage by insurance companies. OFT has hundreds of possible markets for expansion, including medical offices, independent labs, schools, day care, airlines, the hospitality industry, sport facility , military personnel, MEDICAID recipients, manufacturing/processing facility, power plant  or construction sites and employers who drug test.  With further clinical trials, they hope to expand oral fluid metals testing to other heavy metals, steroid testing in sports, drug testing in fatal accidents, and examining its potential for identifying different types of cancers..   
This requires research, time, paperwork, and promotion of the test. With enough funding, licensing can provide onsite, or at minimal, regional testing facilities in order to increase efficiency of test to provide quicker results.  We will also have to address debt and expenses acquired from obtaining the patent, printing, marketing, Toxyscreen packaging, and initial work with University lab to provide testing and internal research.

Your pledge funds will also be used to:

manufacture the kits to collect your sample, analyze the results (includes purchasing reagents (primers, buffers, enzymes) for sequencing, running the equipment, performing bioinformatics and statistical analysis)
Website design and development
Hiring key Management and outstanding lab personnel.
Additional clinical trials
Research and development capital for supplies, additional lab equipment and training in order to expand into other states.
FDA approval (costs include lawyer fees for communicating with FDA, travel, and promotion funds)

We are looking for contributors who believe in our product and can help us bring it to market.  By choosing to donate, you will be part of a fundamental change in the way testing is conducted.  The potential is clear - painless, accurate oral fluid testing for heavy metals is on the horizon, and you can be part of ushering in this change.  These funds will help families identify lead poisoning early, avoiding long term medical problems, and will allow companies to provide easy, safe, effective testing to their employees, ensuring their health and safety.  The benefits are boundless.  Thank you for your consideration.

Business Spotlight  7/31/14

story:
Business Plan Overview:


Link:  Bear Essential Business Plan Pitch


Short Summary

  • My name is Jared Walther and my background is in nuclear engineering, small business development, and missionary work.  I used to work in the kitchen at Red Lobster and then was promoted to waitstaff.  I have a love for cooking and creating new and exciting recipes. My wife, Stephannie Walther, is a Business Manager and loves to have healthy options to eat.  We are looking to create a business that blesses people here and abroad.  Most of the profits that we earn will be used to fund us as we serve people in Kenya, India, Pakistan, and South Korea.  We help fund businesses for others in these nations so that they are self sufficient.  To date, we have helped start over 250 businesses through our ministry called GROWTH Group (God Reaches Out With These Hands).  We thought it was time we started our first business here in the United States to bless others here as well.
  • This campaign is designed to help us get off our feet and to establish the first "Bear Essential Smoothie" Drive-Thru that will offer 3 different Smoothies and 3 different juices.  We will also provide hard boiled eggs for a source of protein.  This is important to us as we are building this business to provide healthy options to people on the go.  Not everyone has the time or skill to perfectly concoct a healthy smoothie everyday or multiple times a day.  There is the effort of keeping and storing fresh fruit and vegetables, and the clean up afterwards that might prevent some from enjoying a healthy smoothie or juice.
  • Contributors will help us achieve our dream of creating a healthy option for people who need something on the go.


What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $50,000 to buy materials, equipment, and help our investment money in building the structure of the drive-thru.  $35,000 goes to building the drive-thu, $8,000 goes to adding the power, water, and sewer. $7,000 goes to buying the materials to start up (cups, lids, straws, drawers, knives, soap, mop, radios, etc.)
  • Our unique perks that we offer is that your name will go on the building as a founder of Bear Essential Smoothies.  We will also mail you a t-shirt with our logo and the phrase "I made this happen".  We intend to keep the original founders involved for the life of the franchise and will continually bless those who gave to make this happen.  Future perks: Annual Christmas payout, first rights to invest in future stores, and Bear Essential Merchandise.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will still use all funds we received and still allocate them to the building fund, materials fund, and the utilities fund.  All money received goes to the building of this fantastic smoothie drive-thru.

The Impact

  • This project is valuable to you as the contributor as you are taking steps to open up healthy solutions to the public.  This is going to change every city in which we open up a drive-thru.  This is revolutionary as there are limited options for people who want to eat whole-food smoothies.
  • My wife and I have started over 250 businesses world wide with our own money.  We have a successful track record of starting small and having the ability to scale to the size of the city we are launching in.  We have made the businesses we started into self-replicating models that are able to take the profits they earn and birth a new business from that.  We are experts in small business development.
  • This smoothie bar is bigger than just a drive-thru.  This will be the first of many Bear Essential Smoothie locations throughout the US.  These businesses will use the profits to do the following:  loans to startups, support Christian missionary work, support church planting.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Risk:  Training new hires on smoothie prep
  • Risk:  Balancing and receiving fresh inventory
  • Risk:  Location placement
  • What qualifies my wife and I to overcome these hurdles is that we are constantly faced with small business challenges every day from the 250 other successful small businesses we've started.  I plan to be there, side-by-side with the new hires to ensure the quality and training is excellent.  I plan on creating a customer account with Sysco food deliveries to ensure we get fresh and ready fruits and vegetables all year.  Lastly, I am working with the local Albertson's grocery store to secure a location on a busy road in plain view for maximum visibility for the drive-thru.

Other Ways You Can Help


  • If you are unable to give, you can still help by getting the word out on social media and telling your friends!  
  • You can use the Indiegogo tools to help spread the word about tasty and healthy smoothies coming to a city near you.

Link:  Bear Essential Business Plan Pitch



Short Summary
 
My name is Jared Walther and my background is in nuclear engineering, small business development, and missionary work.  I used to work in the kitchen at Red Lobster and then was promoted to waitstaff.  I have a love for cooking and creating new and exciting recipes. My wife, Stephannie Walther, is a Business Manager and loves to have healthy options to eat.  We are looking to create a business that blesses people here and abroad.  Most of the profits that we earn will be used to fund us as we serve people in Kenya, India, Pakistan, and South Korea.  We help fund businesses for others in these nations so that they are self sufficient.  To date, we have helped start over 250 businesses through our ministry called GROWTH Group (God Reaches Out With These Hands).  We thought it was time we started our first business here in the United States to bless others here as well. This campaign is designed to help us get off our feet and to establish the first "Bear Essential Smoothie" Drive-Thru that will offer 3 different Smoothies and 3 different juices.  We will also provide hard boiled eggs for a source of protein.  This is important to us as we are building this business to provide healthy options to people on the go.  Not everyone has the time or skill to perfectly concoct a healthy smoothie everyday or multiple times a day.  There is the effort of keeping and storing fresh fruit and vegetables, and the clean up afterwards that might prevent some from enjoying a healthy smoothie or juice. Contributors will help us achieve our dream of creating a healthy option for people who need something on the go.     What We Need & What You Get

My wife and I have started over 250 businesses world wide with our own money.  We have a successful track record of starting small and having the ability to scale to the size of the city we are launching in.  We have made the businesses we started into self-replicating models that are able to take the profits they earn and birth a new business from that.  We are experts in small business development. This smoothie bar is bigger than just a drive-thru.  This will be the first of many Bear Essential Smoothie locations throughout the US.  These businesses will use the profits to do the following:  loans to startups, support Christian missionary work, support church planting.
