Risk:  Training new hires on smoothie prep
Risk:  Balancing and receiving fresh inventory
Risk:  Location placement
What qualifies my wife and I to overcome these hurdles is that we are constantly faced with small business challenges every day from the 250 other successful small businesses we've started.  I plan to be there, side-by-side with the new hires to ensure the quality and training is excellent.  I plan on creating a customer account with Sysco food deliveries to ensure we get fresh and ready fruits and vegetables all year.  Lastly, I am working with the local Albertson's grocery store to secure a location on a busy road in plain view for maximum visibility for the drive-thru.    Other Ways You Can Help   If you are unable to give, you can still help by getting the word out on social media and telling your friends!   You can use the Indiegogo tools to help spread the word about tasty and healthy smoothies coming to a city near you.

story:
Imagine being a doctor but not able to help patients. That is Dr. Jedida Maube’s plight. Dr. Jedida Maube always dreamed of becoming a doctor, since childhood she was fascinated by the men and women in pure white coats, she would say, ‘I want to be a doctor and keep everyone alive.’ She was always top of my class and was very good at sciences. When we finished high school, she went to MOI UNIVERISTY SCHOOL OF MEDICINE where she pursued her bachelors degree in medicine.

She began living her dream 2 years ago when she joined VIHIGA DISTRICT HOSPITAL as a resident doctor. Jedida was glad to work and give back to the local community in Vihiga after the support she received from her community in pursuit of her medical dream. However, she cannot do what she loves doing best.

Six months ago, Jedida was diagnosed with Cancer of the colon. She has been undergoing chemotherapy at ST.LUKES HOSPITAL & THE MOI TEACHING & REFERRAL HOSPITAL in ELDORET, KENYA. Unfortunately, she is not responding well to treatment and has thus been referred to India for further treatment at a cost of Ksh.2.5MILLION which is about 27,700 USD.

Jedida’s FAMILY, THE BUTERE GIRLS’ HIGH SCHOOL ALUMNI & THE KENYA MEDICAL PHARMACISTS & DENTISTS UNION have started a campaign to support Jedida receive the medical treatment she needs in India. We cannot do this alone hence need the help of all well wishers. With your contribution, we can send Jedida to India where she can received the specialized treatment. Her medical cover and family financial support has been covering her medical expenses in Kenya, However, her medical cover has been exhausted and her family is unable to financially support her. This why we ask you her crowd to help raise money to support her medical treatment in India.

Jedida is a strong lady, at only 30 years, she is often the one encouraging her visitors when they come to see her. For most of us, it is heart breaking to see her so fragile and with that wig on her head, she had this beautiful thick black hair. ’Come on, don’t look sad, this is only temporary, I will soon be back on my feet to attend to my patients’ she says. Her determination is evident as she had enrolled for her Masters degree, MBChB at MOI UNIVERSITY which she struggles with despite her medical condition.

 Please let us help Jedida help other patients by supporting her medical appeal. For 500USD donations and about, you will receive an African painting, a #teamJedida polo Tshirt and a band. For 200 USD donation you get a #teamJedida polo T-shirt, a band and a pair of African(Maasai) sandals of your choice(either male or female). For any donation below 200USD you get a Tshirt, a band and an African neck piece. All who help towards this cause will also receive personalised thank you cards signed by Dr. JEDIDA ADERA MAUBE.

We thank you and look forward to walking this walk together and winning this battle together.

Here is the link to the official facebook page for authenticity and further details

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Dr-Jedida-Adera-...

We will appreciate your support via Prayer, financially and emotionally. Thank you and God Bless

Brazil Brasilia for #teamJedida

story:
TRAUM TECHNOLOGIES:

LU-KIT

Lucid Dreaming Kit including Sleep Mask, Wrist-Tracker, App and Book
Application will be available for Andoird & iOS !
Wrist-Tracker: 2 different versions available (including: vibration) !


You spend a third of your life sleeping. 80 years of lifetime equal 223600 hours of sleep. What if we told you, that this time could be more than daily routine? More than 3 years of development have led to this moment, where we are able to announce, that our product LU-KIT will change the way you live your life.



  • Our German developers have created an affordable series of products that will teach you LUCID DREAMING.

  • Lucid Dreaming Kit Lu-Kit including Sleep Mask, Wrist-Tracker, App and Book 
  • affordable 99$.


What is LUCID DREAMING?

In a lucid dream, you are aware that you are dreaming. You know that you are currently dreaming. Why would you want that to happen? Having the chance to control your dreams, you can do whatever you want. It’s like a videogame without restrictions and limitation. My favorite: I really adore creating planets and matter while flying through universe. Sounds quite cool, right?

  • Our products give you the chance to master LUCID DREAMING.


When LU-KIT is successfully funded,  this Kit will be available for 99$ and includes:


                                 Wrist-Tracker will also be available with vibration !

As Lucid Dreaming becomes a part of your daily life, the probability of dreaming lucidly increases. This is one of the main reasons to produce a kit with a book, an application and a Wrist-Tracker that may become an important chapter in one's life.
  • 20 subjects have tested our products
  • 90 % of our subjects have dreamt lucidly


We are proud to announce that our LU-KIT-products are working.
But those were prototypes. And we need your help to produce them!

                                                      iOS & ANDROID!


Our mask, our  wrist-tracker and our app use certain sensors and new technologies to detect different stages of sleep aiming to analyze your REM-sleep stage, which is the state with the highest brain-activity. 

And high brain-activity means DREAMING.  After having detected your Dream-state, outer stimuli will influence your dream. Our mask and our app will emit sound and light and our wrist-tracker will send sound. 

We know that there are some people who do not like sound and light as stimuli.

So we decided to design another vibrating version.

Due to your activated Thalamus, a part of your interbrain, which is the relay station of outer stimuli, these outer stimuli will influence and change your dream.

Other information about neurophysiological phenomena and lucid dreaming in our book  (an extract will be released soon to prove its scientificity).

Having willingly influenced your dream, this information about that change can be activated by arousal in hippocampus (due to release of acetylcholine), a part of your memory.

In simple words: You will see something brightly and hear something loudly. And when hearing or seeing this, you will remember that you are wearing your LUKIT-mask or LUKIT-wrist-tracker. You know you are dreaming. You can control your dreams.

There are comparable products on the market, but our LUKIT-products use new technology and the best part: They are affordable. Other products cost up to 300$ per device, which is indefensible. 

Our LUKIT including Sleep Mask, Wrist-Tracker, App and Book will cost 99$, after it is successfully funded.


We need your support!

We need your help to produce our prototypes. Costs of production are immense if you want to have a cheap and affordable price like we do. So please spread our message. Everyone can learn about Lucid Dreaming. Live your Dreams.

Traum Technologies.


Spread the word!

Lucid Dreaming is a gift. And it is your job to spread the word. 

Tell your friends about this campaign! 

Like our Pages on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter.

Thank You.

Daniel Biniara.

story:
Why we need your help?

The reason to turn to you is the adventure we started 3 years ago- the aim to create the first in the world Ecofriendly Park for extreme water sports fully able to be dismantled. Meet project “Magicable”. This will be the first wakeboard park in Bulgaria, as well as the only sports center of its kind in this area of the world. Located across an area of a 14 000 m2 will be 2 wakeboard cables, 14 cabins, fully situated on top of the water, cloakroom, changing room, restaurant, shop, relax zone, camping zone, a study hall for lectures and seminars as well as a stage for events out in the open.

As you can see this is a very ambitious project in which we are putting all our efforts, energy and knowledge.

The place now:

 

In a chart below you may see a detailed description of our costs so far. We already have the place, where we have invested money in cleaning and reconstruction, as well as a preliminary contract for the construction of two cable for wake board at this location. For the latest installment of the first system - 2.0, we need your help !

These money equal 1/3 form the money we need in order to open its doors next season and to start the next step in building the park- to create the infrastructure around the place.The most interesting is that the project will combine sports, outdoor activities and events in an unusual way for the country.

With the realization of this project we will greatly improve the tourism in the area of Pravets. At the same time the artificial lake is located 70 km away on the highway from Sofia which makes it incredibly convenient to reach from the airport of the capital as well as from most big cities of Bulgaria.

Calendar and next steps;

With your help, the park will be able to start next season ( 2018) . We have developed a vision for the project in the future. Detail in steps :

Why help us?

Because the artificial lake „Osikovica” and the area around it need somebody to take care of them. WE are here to do this.

Because we will create a place at which you can practice a new and fun sport out in the open , while breathing fresh air and having fun.

Because you love sport and you believe everyone should be more active in order to live a happy life.

Because we need this sport center in order to develop the region and to make a lot of people very happy.

Because you have never been to Bulgaria and the park will be one more awesome reason to come.

 

So.....We will build park like this one! ( check the video below)

 

The Impact

 We believe than every journey starts with one single step and we have already made that magical step. With your help we can make the next step in the project – putting the two cables for wakeboard.

If we manage to gather 100 %  of the money we will be able to build a two-point cable for wakeboarding, which will be suitable for beginners and we can start organizing training camps for kids.

If we gather 50 % of the money we will make the second payment for the construction of a big cable and we can apply for additional funding.

If we gather more then 25 % of the money we will start building the cabins as well as the other buildings for the park: restaurant, shop, camping site, cloakroom and changing rooms.

Our values:

  • We develop sport
  • We protect the environment
  • We support the development of tourism in the region

Why Bulgaria?

We have all the 4 seasons! And each of them is incredibly beautiful. People love to smile, the food is delicious, the internet is fast and the prices are normal. What more do you need for a nice vacation?

Here you can find snowy mountains, dazzling beaches, and vast meadows perfect for a stroll or even golf, mineral springs, amazing waterfalls and astonishing lakes. As well as many archeological sites, monasteries, completely preserved old cities and historical ruins, also here we have incredibly colorful music, dances and rituals. Here you can get away from your home and feel at home at the same time. To relax, to have fun and to learn something new.

 

Photo credits: Christo Anestev

Photo credits:Nikola Belopitov

Photo credits : Ivaylo Ivanov

Photo credits: Иван Стрижлев

Meet the team:

Partners ( because every magic need a little push) :

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

We will truly appreciate if you share our project with your community, friends and family !

You can find us also on :

 

 

magicable.eu

hello@magicable.eu
